41010019	Nɨ God Moses ganɨngizir arazim gɨfo, ‘Nɨ gumazim mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghan markɨ, nɨ poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim damuam markɨ, nɨ gumazir igharazimɨn biziba okɨman markɨ, nɨ bizibagh ifaran markɨ, nɨ ua bagh biziba inisɨ gumazibagh ifaran markɨ, nɨ uan afeziam ko amebamɨn apengan ikɨ aningɨn akaba baragh.’”
41010020	Ezɨ an a ikaragha kamagh mɨgei, “Tisa, kɨ fomɨram aghɨrimra ikiava arazir kabagh amua iza datɨrɨghɨn ikia kati.”
41010021	Ezɨ Iesus gumazir kamɨn garava, a gifongegha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ bizir vamɨra nɨ tɨghar a damuam. Bizir nɨ itiba bar da amadaghɨva dagɨaba inigh, egh gumazir biziba puvatɨzibar anɨngigh. Egh nɨ Godɨn Nguibamɨn bizir aghuariba iniam. Egh, nan gɨn izɨ.”
41010022	Ezɨ gumazir kam akar kam baregha, an guam mɨsɨngi. A fo, a guizbangɨra bizir avɨriba itir gumazim. A kamaghɨn, an navim bar osemezɨ a ghu.
41010023	Ezɨ Iesusɨn damaziba uan suren gumazibagh aruava, kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Gumazir biziba avɨrasemeziba, me God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn mangɨsɨ bar iburagham!”
41010024	An suren gumaziba an akar kaba baregha, dɨgavir kuram gamizɨma, Iesus ua kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Boriba, gumazim God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn aven mangɨsɨ, a guizbangɨra bar iburagham.
41010025	Kamelɨn tam iniba isair dɨkonir torimɨn aven mangɨsɨ ingangarir dafam damigh aven mangam. Eghtɨ gumazir biziba avɨrasemeziba, me God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn aven mangɨsɨ guizbangɨra bar iburagham!”
41010026	A me mɨgeima, me guizbangɨra dɨgavir kuram gamuava nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh amuava uarira uariv gei, “Kamaghɨn damightɨma, tinara zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuir kam iniam?”
41010027	Ezɨ Iesus men garava kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Bizir kaba gumazimɨn bar osemegham. Bizir kaba Godɨn osemezir puvatɨ. A biziba bar dagh ami.”
41010028	Ezɨ Pita kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ ge, e uan biziba bar da ategha, nɨn gɨn ize.”
41010029	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, gumazitam nan akar aghuim ko na bagh, uan dɨpenim, o uan aveghbuaba, o uan buaramiziba, o uan afeziam ko amebam, o uan boriba, o uan azeniba ategh,
41010030	egh gumazir kam datɨrɨghɨn nguazir kamɨn God guizbangɨra bizir a faragha itiba bar dagh afiragh a danɨngam. A dɨpenir avɨriba ko aveghbuaba ko buaramiziba ko amebaba ko borir avɨriba, ko azenir avɨriba a danɨngam. Eghtɨ Godɨn gɨn zuir gumazibagh asɨghasɨzir araziba a uaghan dar aven ikiam. Eghtɨma dughiar gɨn izamim zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim an a danɨngam.
41010031	Datɨrɨghɨn dughiar kamɨn faragha itir gumazir avɨriba, me gɨn ikɨtɨma, datɨrɨghɨn gɨn itir gumazir avɨriba, me gɨn faragh mangam.”
41010032	Egha me Jerusalemɨn ghuavanagava Iesus farazɨma, an suren gumaziba an gɨn ghua nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh amima, me ko zuir gumazamiziba atiati. Ezɨ Iesus ua uan 12 plan suren gumaziba inigha me mɨriamɨn ghughava, a bativamin bizibar gun me mɨgei.
41010033	A kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia oragh. E nguibar ekiam Jerusalemɨn ghuavanadi. Eghtɨ gumazitam Gumazibar Otarim isɨva, Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba koma ofa gamir gumazir ekiabar anɨngam. Eghtɨ me a isɨ kot datɨghɨva, egh a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghsɨva akabar akɨram, egh me kamaghɨn a mɨkɨm suam, An aremegham. Egh me a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghsɨva, a inigh Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazibar dafaribar arɨgham.
41010034	Egh Kantrin Igharazibar Gumaziba, me dɨbovir akabar a mɨkɨmɨva, a giparɨva, a fozoroghɨva, egh a mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham. An aremeghtɨ, dughiar pumuning ko mɨkezim gɨvaghtɨ a ua dɨkavigham.”
41010035	Ezɨ Sebedin otarimning, Jems ko Jon, Iesus bagha izava kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Tisa, ga bizir mam bagha ifonge. Nɨ ga bagha a damuasa ga nɨn azai.”
41010036	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn aningɨn azara, “Kɨ manmaghɨn guan akurvagham?”
41010037	Aning a ikaragha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ atrivir ekiamɨn otoghɨva egh ga damightɨ gan tav nɨn agharir guvim daperaghtɨ, tav nɨn agharir kɨriam daperagham.”
41010038	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Gua azangsɨzir bizir kam, gua an mɨngarim gɨfozir puvatɨ, egha ia a bagha nan azai. Gua ti kɨ ateramin osɨmtɨzim, uaghan an ateramin gavgavim iti? O osɨmtɨzir dɨpar kɨ ruamim gua uaghan a guruam?”
41010039	Ezɨ aning a ikara, “Are, ga gavgavim iti.” Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn aning mɨgei, “Guizbangɨra, gua kɨ ateramin osɨmtɨzim, gua a iniam, egh osɨmtɨzir dɨpar kɨ ruamim gua a guruam.
41010040	Egha gua nan agharir guvim ko kɨriam dapiasa azangsɨsi, kar nan bizim puvatɨ. Danganir kaba Godɨn bizimra. A danganir kabar dapiamin gumaziba, a me gɨfogha, me bagha danganir kabagh ami.”
41010041	Ezɨ Jems ko Jon bizir kamɨn Iesus mɨgeima, 10 plan suren gumazir igharaziba a baregha, bizir kam bagha Jems ko Jonɨn atari.
41010042	Ezɨ Iesus men diagha, me akuvagha kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia fo, Kantrin Igharazibar atriviba pamten me gamima, me bar men apengan iti. Ezɨ men gumazir dapaniba uan akaba baraghasa puvɨra me abɨraghbɨrasi.
41010043	Eghtɨ arazir kaba ian tongɨn ikian kogham. Gumazir manam ian tongɨn ekiamɨn ikɨsɨ, a ingangarir gumazimɨn mɨn ikɨ.
41010044	Eghtɨ gumazir manam ian faragh mangɨsɨ, a bar ian ingangarir gumazir kɨnimɨn mɨn ikɨ.
41010045	Ezɨ kamaghɨra Gumazibar Otarim iza, gumazamizibar amutɨ me a bagh ingarasa, a izezir pu. Puvatɨ, a me bagh ingarasa ize. A gumazamizir avɨriba bagh ovegh ua me givezegh me iniasa ize.”
41010046	Egha Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko Jerikon izegha, egha gumazamizir avɨrim sara nguibar ekiam ataghrasi. Ezɨ gumazir damazir kurar mam, an ziam Bartimeus (Timeusɨn otarim), a tuavir mɨriamɨn aperaghav ikiava biziba bagha inge.
41010047	Egha an orazima Nasaretɨn gumazim Iesus uaghan iza zuima a dia ghaze, “Iesus Devitɨn Otarim, nan apangkufigh!”
41010048	Ezɨ gumazamizir avɨriba dɨman an anogoregha egha nɨmɨra ikiasava a mɨgei. Ezɨ a pamtem diavɨra iti, “Devitɨn Otarim nan apangkufigh!”
41010049	Ezɨ Iesus tugha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “An diagh.” Ezɨ me gumazir damazir kuramɨn diagha ghaze, “Nɨ uabɨn gavgafigh, egh dɨkafigh! Iesus nɨn dei.”
41010050	Ezɨ a uan korotiar azenan azuim suegha anekunigha zuamɨra dɨkavigha Iesus bagha ize.
41010051	Ezɨ Iesus an azara, “Kɨ nɨ bagh tizim damuasa nɨ ifonge?” Ezɨ gumazir damazir kuram kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Tisa, kɨ ganasa ifonge.”
41010052	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Mangɨ. Nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itima, a nɨ gamizɨ nɨ ua dera.” Ezɨ zuamɨra a ua gari. Egha a Iesusɨn gɨn tuavimɨn zui.
41011001	Egha Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko Jerusalemɨn boroghɨn izava Betfage ko Betanin boroghɨn Olivɨn mɨghsɨamɨn oto. Egha Iesus uan suren gumazir pumuning aning amaga,
41011002	kamaghɨn aning mɨgei, “Gua nguibar munagh itimɨn mangɨ, gua an mangɨva gantɨma donkin igiar mam, me a ikezɨma, a iti. Gumazitam dughiatamɨn a gaperaghava aruizir puvatɨ. Gua an benim fɨrighɨva a inigh kagh izɨ.
41011003	Eghtɨ tav guan azang suam, ‘Gua tizim bagha donki fɨri?’ gua kamaghɨn a mɨkɨm, ‘Ekiam ingangarim an iti. A uam anemangam.’”
41011004	Ezɨ aning ghua garima, me donki dɨpenir tiar akamɨn azenan tuavimɨn a ike. Ezɨ aning a fɨrima,
41011005	gumazir maba tuivighav ikia aningɨn azara, “Gua tizim bagha donkin benim fɨri?”
41011006	Ezɨ Iesus aning mɨkemezɨ moghon aning men akam ikara. Ezɨ gumaziba aningɨn amamangatɨzɨma aning zui.
41011007	Egha aning donki inigha Iesus bagha izeghava uan korotiar azenan azuiba suegha donki gisɨn da ghuani. Ezɨ Iesus a gisɨn apera.
41011008	Ezɨ gumazamizir avɨriba uan korotiar azenan azuiba suegha tuavimɨn da ghuari. Ezɨ marazi ruarimɨn tev seviba aghoregha da arɨsi.
41011009	Egha faragha zuiba ko gɨn zuiba me diava ara kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Hosana! Ia Godɨn ziam fɨ! Gumazir kam Ekiamɨn ziam ko gavgavimɨn izi. God deravɨra a damu.”
41011010	“En ovavim Devit fomɨra en atrivimɨn ikezɨ moghɨn gumazir kam en atrivimɨn ikiasa izi. Eghtɨ God deravɨra a damu. Hosana! Biziba bar dar pɨn itir Godɨn ziam fɨ!”
41011011	Ezɨ Iesus Jerusalemɨn aven ghugha ghua Godɨn Dɨpenir mɨriamɨn ghu. A ghugha biziba dar garava da asavsuisi. Ezɨ aruem gɨvazɨ a suren gumaziba ko me Betanin ghue.
41011012	Amɨmɨzaraghan Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko ua Betani ataghragha, Iesus mɨtiriam an azi.
41011013	A saghon garima temer fighɨn mam dafaribara iti. Ezɨ a roghɨra mangɨ foghasa a dagheba iti, o puvatɨ. Kar fighɨn temeba bamin dughiam puvatɨ. Ezɨ kamaghɨn a ghua ovɨzitamɨn apizir puvatɨ, dafarir kɨnbaram an iti.
41011014	Egha a kamaghɨn temem mɨgei, “Tav gɨn nɨn ovɨzitam rameghan kogham.” An a mɨkemezɨ, an suren gumaziba oraki.
41011015	Egha Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko Jerusalemɨn otivigha, Iesus Godɨn Dɨpenir mɨriamɨn ghuava gumazir asɨzir ofa gamibagh iveziba ko asɨzir ofa gamiba amadiba me batosi. Egha dagɨaba uari ikarvazir gumazibar dakoziba ko kuarazir bunbaba amadibar dabirabiba, da fava egha da ighagharɨsi.
41011016	Egha a tav bizir amaditam inigh Godɨn Dɨpenir mɨriamɨn aven izɨ mangan an anogoroke.
41011017	Egha a men sure gamuava kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn osizirimɨn iti, o puvatɨ? ‘Nan dɨpenimɨn ingangarimɨn mɨngarim kamakɨn, kar nguaziba bar men Gumazamiziba God ko Mɨgeir Dɨpenim.’ Ezɨ ia gumazir okeibar danganir mogomemɨn mɨn a gami.”
41011018	Gumazamizir avɨrim bar an suren mɨgɨrɨgɨaba baregha dɨgavir kuram gami. Ezɨ kamaghɨn ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba ko Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba Iesusɨn atiatigha, egh me a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghasa maghɨra tuaviba buri.
41011019	Ezɨ aruem gevima Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko me Jerusalemɨn nguibar ekiam ategha azenan zui.
41011020	Egha mɨzaraghara Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko ghua garima temer fighɨn biba sara mɨsɨngi.
41011021	Ezɨ Pita nɨrɨgha Iesus mɨgei, “Tisa nɨ gan, temer fighɨn nɨ asɨghasɨghasa mɨkemezim, a mɨsɨngi!”
41011022	Iesus an mɨgɨrɨgɨam ikaragha kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikɨ.
41011023	Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, tina mɨghsɨar kam mɨkɨm suam, ‘Mangɨ uabɨ fegh ongarim mɨkɨnigh,’ egh uan navir averiamɨn igharagh nɨghnɨghan kogh, egh nɨghnɨzir gavgavim a mɨkemezir bizimɨn ikɨ suam, ‘An otivam,’ eghtɨ bizir kam a bagh otogham.
41011024	Kamaghɨn amizɨma kɨ ia mɨgei, ia bizir tizim bagh God ko mɨgeir dughiam an azangsɨgh, egh nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikɨ suam, ‘Kɨ a inigha gɨfa,’ nɨ bizir kam inigham.
41011025	Egh nɨ tugh God ko mɨkɨmɨva egh osɨmtɨzim tinan iti, nɨ an arazir kuram gɨn amadagh, eghtɨ kamaghɨn nɨn Afeziar Ekiar uan nguibamɨn itim nɨn arazir kuraba gɨn amadagham.”
41011027	Egha Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko uamategha Jerusalemɨn otogha Iesus Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn mɨriamɨn aven aruima, ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba ko Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba ko Judan gumazir dapaniba a bagha ize.
41011028	Egha Iesusɨn azara, “Nɨ gavgavir manamɨn amodoghɨn bizir kabagh ami? Egha tina bizir kabar amuasa gavgavim nɨ ganɨngi?”
41011029	Ezɨ Iesus me ikara, “Kɨ azangsɨzir mam ia damuasa ia na mɨkemeghtɨ kɨ gavgavir manamɨn bizir kabagha amimɨn gun ia mɨkɨmam.
41011030	Jonɨn rurim--kar Godɨn bizim, o gumazibar bizim? Na mɨkemegh!”
41011031	Ezɨ me uarira uariv kemegha ghaze, “E suam, ‘An rurim Godɨn ize,’ eghtɨma a kamaghɨn ua en azaragham, ‘Ia manmaghɨn amigha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Jon damuan aghua?’
41011032	Eghtɨ e suam, ‘An rurim gumazibar ize’....” (Gumazamiziba bar moghɨra fo, Jon a guizbangɨra Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim, kamaghɨn me gumazamizibar atiatingi.)
41011033	Egha me Iesusɨn azangsɨzim ikaragha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “E fozir puvatɨ.” Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kamaghɨra, kɨ uan gavgavim inizir tuavimɨn, gun ia mɨkemeghan kogham.”
41012001	Ezɨ Iesus akar isɨn zuibar Judan gumazir dapanibav gei, “Gumazir mam wainɨn azenim oparigha an dɨvazim aghui. Egha wainɨn ovɨziba mɨrmɨramin itarim gukuigha pɨn ikɨ wainɨn azenimɨn ganamin dɨpenimɨn ingari. Egha a wainɨn azenim isa wainɨn azenimɨn ganamin gumazir mabagh anɨngi (eghtɨ me gɨn wain taba uam a ikaragham). Egha saghon igharagha ghu.
41012002	Ezɨ wainɨn ovɨziba kuaramin dughiam otozɨ, wainɨn azenir ghuavim ingangarir gumazir mam amadazɨ a wainɨn ovɨzir taba iniasa wainɨn azenimɨn garir gumaziba bagha ghu.
41012003	Ezɨ me an suiragha, a mɨsuegha anemadazɨ a dafaribara uamatenge.
41012004	Ezɨ a ingangarir gumazir igharazim amadazɨ me a mɨsogha an dapanim abigha aghumsɨzir arazibar a gami.
41012005	Ezɨ a ua mɨkezim amada, ezɨ kam me a mɨsoghezɨ an areme. Ezɨ an avɨrir igharazir maba saram amangi; maba me pura me mɨsoke, maba me me mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghɨre.
41012006	“Ezɨ bar abuananam iti anenemangasa, an otarir kamra, a bar ifongezim. A bar men gɨn anemagava kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, ‘Me nan otarir kamɨn akam baregh deragh a damuam.’ Egha anemadazɨ a ghu.
41012007	Ezɨ wainɨn azenimɨn garir gumaziba kamaghɨn uariv gei, ‘Kar gɨn wainɨn azenir kam iniamin otarim. Aria, e uari inigh a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeka. Egh wainɨn azenir kam, e an ghuaviba ikegham.’
41012008	Egha me an suiragha a mɨsoghezɨ an areme. Ezɨ me a isava wainɨn azenimɨn azenan anekuni.
41012009	“Ezɨ wainɨn azenimɨn ghuavim bar manmaghɨra damuam? A izɨva wainɨn azenimɨn garir gumazir kabav soghtɨma me arɨmɨghiram. Egh wainɨn azenim isɨva igharaz darazir aningam.
41012010	Ia Godɨn Akɨnafarir osizirir kamɨn ganiz, o puvatɨ? ‘Kar dɨpenir akɨnir ingangarir gumaziba aghuazim, a datɨrɨghɨn dɨpenim aterir guarim gava. Kar Ekiam arazir kam gami, ezɨ an en ganganimɨn bar dera.’”
41012012	Ezɨ me fo an akar isɨn zuim me gasara, ezɨ kamaghɨn me an suiragh a iniasa tuaviba buri. Egha me an suighasa gumazamizibar atiatigha, anetegha ghue.
41012013	Egha gɨn Judan gumazir dapaniba Farisin maba ko Herotɨn gɨn zuir darasi amadazɨ, me Iesus bagha ize. Eghtɨ me Iesusɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevitamɨn an suighasa.
41012014	Me izegha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Tisa, e fo, nɨ zurara guizbangɨra mɨgɨava, mɨgɨrɨgɨar vamɨra gumazamiziba bar me ganɨdi. Gumazir ziaba itiba o gumazir kɨniba, nɨ akar vamɨra me mɨgɨava guizbangɨra Godɨn arazibar men sure gami. E Godɨn arazim gɨn mangɨva, gavmanɨn dagɨaba Sisar danɨngam o puvatɨgham? E ivezam, o ivezan kogham?”
41012015	Ezɨ Iesus men ifavarim gɨfogha kamaghɨn men azara, “Ia tizim bagha na gifari? Dagɨatam na bagh a inigh izɨtɨ kɨ an ganika.”
41012016	Ezɨ me dagɨam a bagha a inigha izezɨ a men azara, “Tinan nedazim ko ziamra kara?” Ezɨ me kamaghɨn Iesus ikara, “Sisarɨn nedazim.”
41012017	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kamaghɨra, ia Sisarɨn biziba Sisar danɨngɨva, Godɨn biziba isɨ, God danɨng.” Ezɨ me an ikarvazimɨn dɨgavir kuram gami.
41012018	Ezɨ Sadyusiba, me kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, gumazim aremegh ua dɨkavighan kogham. Egha me azangsɨzir mam sara Iesus bagha ize.
41012019	Me izegha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Tisa, Moses fomɨra kamaghɨn e bagha osiri, gumazim ovegh uan amuim ategh egh boriba puvatɨghtɨ, an aveghbuam an amuir odiarimɨn ikɨva a bagh boriba iniam.
41012020	Ezɨ dughiar mam 7 pla aveghbuaba iti. Avebam amuimɨn ikia boriba puvatɨgha aremezɨma, ua avebamra irim an ikia boriba puvatɨghava uaghan areme. Ezɨ mɨkezim kamaghɨram ami.
41012022	Ezɨ 7 pla aveghbuar kaba bar me an ikia, boritaba inizir puvatɨgha ariaghɨre. Ezɨ abuan, amizim uaghan areme.
41012023	Aveghbuar 7 pla an ike. Egh kamaghɨn ua dɨkavamin dughiam, tinarama an pam?”
41012024	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn me ikara, “Ia Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn osizirim ko Godɨn gavgavim gɨfozir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn ia paza nɨghnɨgha mɨgei?
41012025	Ariaghreziba dɨkavamin dughiam paba amuibar ikian kogham, uaghan me amuiba isɨ pabar arɨghan kogham. Me enselbar mɨn Godɨn Nguibamɨn ikiam.
41012026	“Ezɨ ariaghreziba ua dɨkavizir bizim bagha, ia Mosesɨn Akɨnafarimɨn aven temer isizimɨn eghaghanim ia an gani, o puvatɨ? Eghaghanir kamɨn, God kamaghɨn Moses mɨkeme, ‘Kɨ Abraham, ko Aisak ko Jekopɨn God.’
41012027	God gumazibar nivafɨzir ariaghɨribar God puvatɨ, a gumazibar duar angamra itibar God. Ia bar paza nɨghnɨgha mɨgei.”
41012028	Ezɨ Judan arazibagh fozir gumazir mam izima Sadyusiba Iesus ko uari adozima, a me barasi. An orazima Iesus ikarvazir aghuim me ganɨngizɨma, a Iesusɨn azara, “Godɨn arazir manamra maba bar dagh afiragha, faragha zui?”
41012029	Ezɨ Iesus a ikara, “Arazir bar ekiamra kara: ‘Israel, ia oragh. Ekiam en God, Ekiam uabɨra.
41012030	Ia uan Ekiam, ian God, uan navir averiam ko uan duam ko uan nɨghnɨzim ko uan gavgavim sara bar a gifongegh.’
41012031	Ezɨ arazir anarɨra irimra kara, ‘Nɨ uabɨ gifongezir moghɨn gumazamiziba bar me gifongegh.’ Ua arazitam kamningɨn mɨn ekevegha aning gafirazir puvatɨ.”
41012032	Ezɨ gumazir kam kamaghɨn Iesus ikara, “Nɨ guizbangɨra mɨgɨa ghaze, God uabɨra, tav ua itir puvatɨ.
41012033	E uan navir averiam ko, uan nɨghnɨzim ko uan gavgavimɨn Ekiam gifongegh, egh uabɨ gifongezir moghɨn gumazamiziba bar me gifongegham. E arazir kamningɨn gɨn mangam, eghtɨ arazir kamning ofan me bar avimɨn tueba ko ofa damuamin biziba bar dagh afira.”
41012034	Iesus orazima a deravɨra mɨkemezɨ, Iesus a mɨgei, “Nɨ God biziba bar dagh ativagh dar ganamin dughiamɨn saghon itir puvatɨ.” Egha datɨrɨghɨn tav ua azangsɨzitam ua Iesus damuan atiatingi.
41012035	Egha Iesus Godɨn Dɨpenir mɨriamɨn gumazamizibar sure gamuava, men azara, “Manmagh amizɨ Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, Krais, God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim, a Devitɨn ovavim?
41012036	Devit uabɨ, Godɨn Duam nɨghnɨzir kam a ganɨngizɨ, a kamaghɨn mɨkeme, ‘Ekiam, nan Ekiam kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nan agharir guvim daperagh, egh na ko atrivimɨn ikiam. Egh mangɨ dughiar kɨ nɨn apanibar amightɨ me nɨn apengan ikiam.” ’
41012037	Egha Devit uabɨ ‘Ekiam’ gumazir kam gatɨ. Ezɨ manmaghɨn amizɨ a ua Devitɨn Otarim?” Ezɨ gumazamizir avɨriba an mɨgɨrɨgɨaba baregha bar akonge.
41012038	Ezɨ Iesus gumazamizibar sure gamua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba bagh ganigh. Me korotiar ruaribar aghuigh darutɨ gumazamiziba me biziba amaga dagh ivezi naghɨn ziar ekiaba me danɨngasa, me bar ifonge.
41012039	Egh God ko mɨgeir dɨpenibar dabirabir aghuariba iniva, egh isar ekiabar dughiaba me danganir ziaba itiba iniasa bar ifonge.
41012040	Me amuir odiaribagh ifarava men dɨpeniba okɨa, ghaze e dera. Egha gumaziba men ziaba fasa, egha me God ko mɨgɨa mɨgɨrɨgɨar ruaribagh ami. Kamaghɨn amir gumaziba, men ivezir kuram gumazir arazir kurabagh amibar ivezim bar a gafiragham.”
41012041	Egha Iesus ghua dagɨaba arɨzir danganimɨn boroghɨn aperaghav ikiava gumazamizir avɨribar garima me uan dagɨaba isa Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn dagɨaba arɨzir danganimɨn a da arɨsi. Gumazamizir dagɨar avɨriba itiba dagɨar avɨriba arɨsi.
41012042	Ezɨ biziba puvatɨzir amuir odiarim izava dagɨar muziarir pumuning atɨ, aning dagɨar rubuzir muziarir vamɨra an mɨn ghu.
41012043	Ezɨ Iesus uan suren gumazibar diagha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, biziba puvatɨzir amuir odiarir kam dagɨar muziarir pumuning dagɨaba arɨzir danganim gatɨ, ezɨ an dagɨar pumuning gumazir igharaziba arɨghɨzir dagɨabagh afira.
41012044	Me uan dagɨar avɨribar amodoghɨn dagɨar muziariba anɨngi. Ezɨma a uan dabirabir onganarazimɨn mɨrara dagɨar muziarir abuananam atɨ.”
41013001	Egha Iesus Godɨn Dɨpenim ategha azenan zuima, an suren gumazir mam a mɨgei, “Tisa! Nɨ gan, kar dagɨar bar ekiaba, me dar Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn ingarizɨma, an ganganim bar dera! Godɨn Dɨpenim koma dɨpenir dozir an mɨriamɨn itiba, da bar dɨpenir diriba!”
41013002	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a ikara, “Nɨ dɨpenir dafar kabanaghɨn gari? Da bar ikuvigham. Egh dagɨar kaba, gumaziba bar da pueghtɨ da bar moghɨra dagh iregham. Eghtɨ tam tam gisɨn ikeghan kogham.”
41013003	Egha Iesus Olivɨn mɨghsɨam gisɨn, Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn guam a mɨsuegha aperaghav itima, Pita, Jems, Jon ko Andru me uarira ikiava an azara,
41013004	“E mɨkemegh, dɨpeniba ikuvighamin bizim, a manadɨzoghɨn otivam? Eghtɨ arazir manam faragh otoghtɨma, e fogh suam bizir kaba otivamin dughiam roghɨra ize?”
41013005	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia uari bagh deraghvɨra gan, gumazitam izɨ ia gifaran markɨ.
41013006	Gumazir avɨriba nan ziamɨn izɨ, suam, ‘Kɨ Krais, God ua e iniasa mɨsevezir gumazim,’ egh gumazamizir avɨribagh ifaram.
41013007	“Eghtɨ ia roghɨra itir mɨdorozir ekiabar nɨgɨniba baragh, egh saghon itir mɨdorozir ekiabar akaba baragham. Egh ia dɨgavir kuram damuan markɨ. Arazir kaba otivam, eghtɨ nguazir kam gɨvamin dughiam tɨghar izam.
41013008	Kantrin mamɨn itir darazi dɨkavigh kantrin igharazimɨn itir darazi ko mɨsogham. Eghtɨ atrivir mamɨn adarazi dɨkavigh atrivir igharazimɨn adarazi ko mɨsogham. Danganir mabar dagheba bar puvatɨghtɨma, gumazamiziba mɨtiriamra ikiam. Eghtɨma mɨkɨmkɨziba uaghan otivam. Osɨmtɨzir kaba faragh otivightɨ nguazir kam gɨvamin dughiam tɨghar. Osɨmtɨzir kaba mati, amizim otasa faraghavɨra mɨzazim isi mokɨn.
41013009	“Ia deravɨra uari bagh gan. Gumazitaba ia isɨ nguibabar garir gumazibar anɨngam. Egh me God ko mɨgeir dɨpenibar ia mɨsogham. Egh ia na bangɨn atriviba ko gavmanɨn gumazir ekiabar damazibar tuiva, egh ka amizir biziba ia dar gun me mɨkɨmam.
41013010	Eghtɨ Godɨn akar aghuim gumaziba faragh nguibaba bar dav kɨnigh.
41013011	Eghtɨ gumazitaba dughiar manam ian suiragh ia inigh kotɨn mangɨtɨ, ia faragh mɨkɨmsɨ nɨghnɨghɨva osɨman markɨ. Pura mɨgɨrɨgɨar manam God kotɨn aven nɨ danightɨ, na mɨkɨm. Kar nɨ uabɨ mɨgeir puvatɨ, Godɨn Duam mɨgei.
41013012	“Aveghbuaba uarira uari isɨ apanibar anɨngtɨ me me mɨsoghtɨ me arɨmɨghiram. Eghtɨ afeziaba uan boriba uaghan kamaghɨra dar amuam. Boriba uan ameboghfeziabar akaba batoghɨva ovengamin arazibar me damutɨ, me arɨmɨghiram.
41013013	Eghtɨ gumazamiziba bar nan ziam bangɨn ian aghuagham. Egh tina tugh gavgavigh mangɨ ana aremeghamin dughiamɨn tughtɨ, God ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim gɨn a danɨngam.”
41013014	Egha Iesus mɨgɨa ghua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia gantɨ God bar aghuazir bizim an dɨpenimɨn ikiam. Kar a ikian koghamin danganim. A ikɨtɨ, God uan Dɨpenim ategham. (Nɨ tina osizirir kamɨn ganigh, deravɨra nɨghnɨghɨva a gɨfogh.) God bar aghuazir bizir kam, dughiar kamɨn otoghtɨ, Judian Distrighɨn aven itir darasi me zuamɨram arɨ mɨghsɨabar ghuavanangam.
41013015	Tav dɨpenimɨn avughsir danganimɨn ikeghɨva dɨpenimɨn aven mangɨ uan bizitam inian markɨ.
41013016	Tav azenir ekiamɨn ikeghɨva uamategh dɨpenimɨn mangɨ uan azenan azuir korotiam inian markɨ.
41013017	Naviba adair amiziba ko boriba oteba apir amebaba, mevzika; dughiar izamin kaba bar men ikuvigham!
41013018	Dughiar izamin kaba, da osɨmtɨzir ekiabar dughiaba. God nguazim ko overiamɨn ingarizir dughiamɨn iza datɨrɨkɨn, egh ua kamaghɨn dughiatam otoghan kogham. Ezɨ kamaghɨn ia God ko mɨkɨm, eghtɨ osɨmtɨzir ekiar kaba amozimɨn dughiamɨn otivan markɨ.
41013020	Egha Ekiam uan mɨsevezir gumazamizibagh nɨghnɨgha, dughiar kurar kamɨn dughiar maba aghorezɨ da mong otefe. A ti dar aghorezir puvatɨzɨ gumazamiziba bar ariaghreghai.
41013021	“Dughiar izamim tav ia mɨkɨm suam, ‘Ia gan, Kraisra kara! A God Ua E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazimra,’ o, ‘Ia gan, Kraisra muna!’ an akam baraghan markɨ.
41013022	Gumazitaba izɨva ia gifar suam, ‘Kɨrara, God Gumazamiziba Ua Me Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim,’ o ‘kɨ Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir mam,’ egh me mirakelɨn bar ekiaba koma dɨgavir kuram gamir arazibar amutɨ da otivam. Me kamaghɨn ifonge, me gumazamizibagh ifaraghtɨ, me onganigham. Egh me gavgavim ikɨ, uaghan God ua bagha mɨsevezir gumazamiziba, me uaghan me gifarasa. Kamaghɨn me mirakelɨn kabar amuam. Egh dughiataba me me gifarsɨ damuva avegham.
41013023	Kɨ gɨn otivamin biziba bar dar gun ia mɨkeme. Kamaghɨn ia deravɨra uari bagh gan.”
41013024	Egha Iesus mɨgɨa ghua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Osɨmtɨzir ekiar kabar dughiam gɨvaghtɨ, gɨn izamin dughiamɨn bizir kaba otivam. ‘Aruem mɨtategham, eghtɨ iakinim isiraghan kogham;
41013025	eghtɨ mɨkoveziba overiamɨn asighɨram, eghtɨ overiamɨn itir bizir gavgaviba sɨvaghsɨvagh, uan danganiba ataghragham.’
41013026	Dughiar kamɨn gumaziba gantɨ Gumazibar Otarim gavgavir ekiam ko angazangarir ekiam sara ghuariamɨn tongɨn izam.
41013027	Egh a uan enselba amadaghtɨ me mangɨ nguazim ko overiamɨn danganiba bar ko nguazimɨn oteviba bar dar mangɨva God mɨsevezir gumazamiziba men aku a bagh izam.”
41013028	Egha Iesus mɨgɨa ghua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Temer fighɨn aguaba ua dɨz murtɨ, ia fogh suam, amozimɨn dughiam roghɨra ize. Ia temer fighɨn gan nɨghnɨzim iniam.
41013029	Kamaghɨra ia bizir kabar gantɨ da otivtɨ, ia fogh suam, Gumazibar Otarim a ua izamin dughiam roghɨra ize. A tiar akamɨn tughav iti.
41013030	Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei dughiar kamɨn itir gumazamizir kaba ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨ bizir kaba bar otivam.
41013031	Overiam ko nguazim gɨvagham, eghtɨ nan mɨgɨrɨgɨaba gɨvaghan kogham.”
41013032	Egha Iesus mɨgɨa ghua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Tav fozir puvatɨ, dughiar manamra kɨ ia mɨgeir bizir kaba otivam. Godɨn Nguibamɨn itir enselba ko Godɨn Otarim uaghan fozir puvatɨ. Afeziar Ekiam uabɨra fo.
41013033	“Ia dughiar kamɨn izamin dughiam gɨfozir puvatɨ. Ia deravɨra uari bagh ganɨva mɨzuam.
41013034	Dughiar kam mati gumazim igharagha zui. A uan dɨpenim ategha ghua uan dɨpenim isa uan ingangarir gumazibar dafarim garighava dɨpenimɨn ingangariba me rome. A tiar akamɨn itir gumazimɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, nɨ deravɨra gan.
41013035	“Dɨpenimɨn ghuavim izamin dughiam ia a gɨfozir puvatɨ, a bogarangra izam, o dɨmagarir arɨzimɨn izam, o tuariba akɨtɨ a izam, o amɨnim tiraghtɨ a izam, o? Kamaghɨn ia deravɨra gan.
41013036	Puvatɨghtɨma, a zuamɨram otogh ian gantɨ, ia dakuvɨra ikiam.
41013037	Kɨ ia mɨgeir bizir kaba, kɨ gumazamiziba bar me mɨgei, ‘Ia deravɨra gan!’”
41014001	Dughiar kam, God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiam, koma Yis Puvatɨzir Bretɨn Isam Damuamin Dughiam, dughiar pumuningra ikiavɨra itima, ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba, koma Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba, arazir mogometamɨn Iesusɨn suiragh amɨsueghtɨ an aremeghasa tuaviba buri.
41014002	Me kamaghɨn uariv gei, “E isamɨn dughiamɨn an suighan kogham. E damutɨ isamɨn itir gumazamiziba mɨdorozir ekiatam e damigham.”
41014003	Egha Iesus Betanin nguibamɨn ikiava lepa itir gumazim Saimonɨn dɨpenimɨn aven dagher dakozimɨn apava aperaghav iti. An apava aperaghav itima, amizir mam mughuriar aghuim zuir borer mam. An alabastan ingarizir mɨsevimɨn iti. An ziam nat, an ivezim bar pɨn iti. Amizir kam borer kam inigha Iesus bagha izegha borev sevim abigha borem Iesusɨn dapanim ginge.
41014004	Ezɨ uaghan itir darasi me naviba isiava kamaghɨn uariv gɨavɨra iti, “Tizim bagha kav borer mughuriar aghuim zuim pazava a gami?
41014005	An anemadagha dagɨar avɨriba inighai. An ivezim azenir vamɨran ivezim gafira. Eghtɨ an dagɨaba onganarazibagh amibar akuragham.” Egha me puv an atari, egha an anogorosi.
41014006	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Anetakigh. Ia tizim bagha osɨmtɨzim a garɨsi? Anetakigh! An arazir aghuim na gami.
41014007	Onganarazibagh amiba zurara ia ko ikiam. Ia dughiar manam men akurvaghsɨ, men akurvagh. Kɨ zurara ia ko ikian kogham.
41014008	Kɨ aremeghtɨ a damuamin bizim, a na gami. A faragh mughuriar aghuim zuir borem nan mɨkarzim daghuightɨ me gɨn na mozim darɨgham.
41014009	Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, me nguazir kamɨn danganir manamɨn Godɨn akar aghuim akunɨva egh amizir kam amizir arazim uaghan a mɨkɨmɨva egh a gɨnɨghnɨghɨvɨra ikiam.”
41014010	Ezɨ Judas Iskariot 12 plan aposelɨn mam, a Iesus isɨva ofa gamir gumazir ekiabar dafarim darɨghasa me bagha ghu.
41014011	Ezɨ me an akar kam baregha bar akonge, egha dagɨaba a danɨngasa akar gavgavim arkɨri. Ezɨ an an suiragh me danɨngasa tuaviba buri.
41014012	Yis Puvatɨzir Bretɨn Isam Damuamin Dughiabar faragha zuir dughiam, Judan gumaziba me arazir kam iti. Me faragh God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiam gɨnɨghnɨghɨva sipsipɨn igiam inigh God danighɨva an ofa damuam. Ezɨ Iesusɨn suren gumaziba an azara, “Nɨ danganir manamɨn, e mangɨ, nɨ God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiamɨn isam ramɨsɨ, e bizibar akɨram?”
41014013	Ezɨ a uan suren gumazir pumuning amaga kamaghɨn aning mɨgei, “Gua nguibar ekiamɨn mangɨtɨ gumazitam dɨpar mɨnem ater izɨ gua batoghtɨ, gua an gɨn mangɨ.
41014014	Dɨpenir an aven zuim gua an mangɨva an ghuavim mɨkɨm suam, ‘Tisa kamaghɨn azangsɨsi, “Nan danganir kɨ uan suren gumaziba ko Israelbagh Itazir Dughiamɨn isamar amamim mana?” ’
41014015	Eghtɨ a dɨpenimɨn aven pɨn itir danganir ekiam ian akagham. Danganir kam biziba bar ikia e baghavɨra mɨzuai. Eghtɨ ia danganir kam e uari bagh biziba bar dar akɨr.”
41014016	Ezɨ an suren gumazimning me ategha nguibar ekiamɨn aven ghua garima biziba a mɨgɨrɨgɨamɨn mɨrara ghuzɨ, ezɨ aning maghɨra God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiam bagha dagheba ko bizibar kɨri.
41014017	Ezɨ guaratɨzimɨn Iesus uan 12 plan suren gumaziba ko otifi.
41014018	Egha me dagher dakozimɨn apiaghav ikiava apava, Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, ian tav na isɨva gumazir nan apanim gamibar agharim darɨgham, a uaghan na ko ikiava api.”
41014019	Me an akam baregha, naviba bar oseme. Egha me bar vaghvagha an azangsɨgha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨrara markiama?”
41014020	Ezɨ a me ikaragha kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia 12 pla ian tavra. Gumazir na ko itarir vamɨra bret azuim.
41014021	Ezɨ Gumazibar Otarim, Godɨn Akinafarim mɨkemezir moghɨn, an aremegham. Eghtɨ gumazir Gumazibar Otarim isava apanibar agharim gatɨzim, gumaka! A bar ikuvigham! Amebam a batezir puvatɨzɨ, deraghai!”
41014022	Ezɨ Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko apa ikiava, a bretɨn mam inigha God mɨnabagha egha anebigha, a isa uan suren gumazibagh anɨngi. Egha kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kar nan nivafɨzim. Ia a inigh aneremɨ.”
41014023	Egha a wain apir itarim inigha egha God mɨnabagha me ganɨngizɨ, ezɨ me vaghvagha uarir guri.
41014024	Me wain apima a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kar nan ghuzim, an Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim, a gavgavim a ganɨdi. A gumazamizir avɨriba bagha ire.
41014025	Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, Kɨ uam wainɨn ovɨzimɨn dɨpatam rameghan kogham, kamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨ Dughiar God Bizibagh Ativamimɨn otogham. Eghtɨ dughiar kam, kɨ wainɨn dɨpar igiam ramam.”
41014026	Egha me Godɨn ziam fer ighiar mam gamigha dɨkavigha Olivɨn Mɨghsɨamɨn ghue.
41014027	Egha Iesus kamaghɨn uan suren gumazibav gei, “Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn osizirim kamaghɨn iti, ‘Kɨ sipsipbar garir gumazim a mɨsueghtɨ sipsipba tintinimɨn aregham.’ Kamaghɨn ia bar nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itim gɨvaghtɨma, ia na ategh aregham.
41014028	Kɨ ia mɨgei, kɨ aremegh ua dikavigh ian faragh Galilin Distrighɨn mangam.”
41014029	Ezɨ Pita kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Me bar nɨ ateghtɨ kɨrara puvatɨgham.”
41014030	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Kɨ guizbangɨra nɨ mɨgei, datɨrɨghɨn dɨmagarir kamɨn nɨ uabɨ dughiar pumuning ko mɨkezim nɨ suam, ‘Kɨ a gɨfozir puvatɨ,’ eghtɨ tuarim gɨn akazir pumuning damuam.”
41014031	Ezɨ Pita akar gavgavimra amua ghaze, “Kɨ nɨ ko ovengsɨva ovengam, kɨ bar kamaghɨn mɨkemeghan kogham. Bar puvatɨgham!” Ezɨ suren gumaziba bar kamaghɨram a mɨgei.
41014032	Egha Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko temer olivbar azenim, an ziam Getsemanin ghuegha, Iesus kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia kagh dapiaghɨv kɨtɨ kɨ God ko mɨkɨmam.”
41014033	Egha a Pita, Jems ko Jon me inigha ghu. Ezɨ atiatim puvɨram an anadima, a bar osemegha,
41014034	kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Nan navir averiam, osɨmtɨzim a iteragha ghuaghiri. Ezɨ kɨ aremeghasava ami. Ia kagh ikɨ, deravɨra gan.”
41014035	Egha a mong isɨvagha ghugha, egha uan guam moghɨn nguazim girɨgha kamaghɨn God ko mɨgɨa ghaze, tuavir igharazitam ikɨtɨma God dughiar kurar kam na dam a inigh.
41014036	A kamaghɨn God ko mɨgei, “O Ame, nan afeziam, bizitam bar nɨn osemezir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn osɨmtɨzir kam, nɨ na dam a inigh. Kɨ ifongezir moghɨn puvatɨ, nɨ ifongezir moghɨra, nɨ damu.”
41014037	Ezɨma a uamategha uan suren gumazir pumuning ko mɨkezimɨn bighan ghugha garima me akui. Ezɨ a kamaghɨn Pita mɨgei, “Saimon, nɨ akui? Nɨ tong na ko ikɨ ganɨva dughiar otevimɨn ikeghan kogham?
41014038	Ia na bagh deravɨra gan, egh God ko mɨkɨm, eghtɨ osɨmtɨzitam ia damutɨ, ia ireghan kogham. Kɨ fo, ian navir averiaba ifonge, ezɨ nivafɨziba gavgaviba dar puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn pariam ian azi.”
41014039	Egha a uamategha ghugha faragha God ko mɨkemezɨ moghɨn ua a ko mɨgei.
41014040	Egha a uamategha suren gumaziba bagha iza gari, me akuavɨra iti. Pariam puv men azi. Ezɨ a me gaghurazɨ, me a mɨkɨmamin akabagh asa.
41014041	Ezɨ a dughiar mɨkezimɨn ghugha God ko mɨkemegha uamategha iza me mɨgei, “Ia avughsava akuavɨra iti? Arazir kam atakigh! Dughiam oto. Ia gan, Gumazibar Otarim me a isɨva gumazir arazir kurabagh amibar dafarim darɨghasa.
41014042	Ia dɨkavigh! E mangam! Ia gan. Gumazir na isɨva apanibar anɨngamra muna izi!”
41014043	Egha Iesus Pita, Jems ko Jon mɨgɨavɨra itima, Judas, an suren gumazir 12 plan mam oto. Maburan avɨrim a ko mɨdorozir sababa ko asianiba inigha Iesus bagha izi. Ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba ko Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba ko Judan gumazir dapaniba, me me amangizɨ, me izi.
41014044	Gumazir Iesus isɨ men dafaribar arɨghasava amim faragha ghaze, “Kɨ arazir kam ian akagham. Gumazir kɨ toramim, kar Iesusra. Ia an suiragh, egh deraghvɨra an ganɨva, egh a inigh mangɨ.”
41014045	Ezɨ Judas Iesus bagha ghuavɨra ikia kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Tisa!” Eghava an tore.
41014046	Ezɨ gumaziba izava Iesusɨn agharibagh iregha, pamtem an suiki.
41014047	Ezɨma Iesusɨn boroghɨn itir gumazir mam uan mɨdorozir sabam asigha, ofa gamir gumazibar dapanimɨn ingangarir gumazimɨn kuarim atu, ezɨ an kuarim dutuaghirɨ.
41014048	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ okɨmakɨar gumazim puvatɨ. Ia tizim bagha nan suighasa mɨdorozir sababa koma asianiba atera izi?
41014049	Kɨ zurara ia ko ikia, Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn mɨriamɨn aven sure gami. Ezɨ ia nan suighan aghua. Ezɨ Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn osizirim mɨkemezir moghɨra ia kamaghɨn na gami.”
41014050	Ezɨma Iesusɨn suren gumaziba bar aneteghava are.
41014051	Ezɨ gumazir igiar mam bizitam aruzir puvatɨ, egha inir ghurghurir azenan itimra ikegha Iesusɨn gɨn zui. Ezɨ Iesusɨn apaniba an suirazɨma,
41014052	a uan azenan itir inir ghurghurim ategha bibiamrama arav ghu.
41014053	Ezɨ Iesusɨn apaniba a inigha ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim bagha ghu. Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba ko Judan gumazir dapaniba, ko Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba, me bar iza uari akufa.
41014054	Ezɨ Pita mong tɨzim a gatɨgha Iesusɨn gɨn ghua bar ghua ofa gamir gumazibar dapanimɨn dɨpenimɨn dɨvazimɨn aven ghu. Egha kagh ganganir gumaziba koma aperaghav ikia avimɨn fɨi.
41014055	Ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba koma Judan kotɨn aven itir gumaziba bar Iesusɨn mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghasa akar men akurvaziba buri, egha tam batozir puvatɨ.
41014056	Gumazir avɨriba ifavarir mɨgɨrɨgɨabar Iesus gami, ezɨ men mɨgɨrɨgɨaba voroghɨra zuir puvatɨ.
41014057	Ezɨ marazi dɨkavigha ifavarir akar kamɨn a mɨgei,
41014058	“E orazima, a ghaze, ‘Kɨ Godɨn Dɨpenir gumaziba ingarizim anepɨrigh, egh dughiar pumuning ko mɨkezimɨn igharazitamɨn ingarigham. Godɨn Dɨpenir kɨ ingaramim gumaziba ingarizir puvatɨzim.’”
41014059	Ezɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨar kaba uaghan guizbangɨra voroghɨra zuir puvatɨ.
41014060	Ezɨma ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim dɨkavigha men tongɨn tugha egha Iesusɨn azara, “Nɨ akatam ikarvaghan aghua? Me nɨ gasir akar kam, a guizbangɨra, o?”
41014061	Ezɨ Iesus nɨmɨra ikia men mɨgɨrɨgɨatam ikarazir puvatɨ. Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim uam an azara, “Nɨ Krais, God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim? Nɨ gumazamiziba ziam fer Godɨn Otarim?”
41014062	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Kɨ an Otarimra. Eghtɨ nɨ gantɨ, Gumazibar Otarim gavgavim itir Godɨn agharir guvim daperagh overiamɨn ghuariaba sara izam.”
41014063	Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim uan korotiaba abighava azara, “E tizim bagh ua akar akurvaziba buriam? Markiam!
41014064	Ia uari a barasi, a mɨgɨrɨgɨar kurabar Godɨn ziam gasɨghasɨsi. Ezɨ ia manmaghɨn nɨghnɨsi?” Ezɨ me bar akam a gasa, egha ghaze an aremegham.
41014065	Egha marazi a gipari. Egha me an damaziba avara, egha me uan agharibar a mɨsogha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ mɨkɨm. Tinara nɨ mɨsosi?” Ezɨ ganganir gumaziba a inighava a mɨsoghavɨra iti.
41014066	Dughiar kamra Pita dɨpenimɨn dɨvazimɨn aven vangɨnan itima, ofa gamir gumazibar dapanimɨn ingangarir guivir mam izi.
41014067	Egha Pitan garima an avimɨn fɨima, a dɨkɨravɨram an gari. Egha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ uaghan Nasaretɨn gumazir kam, Iesus ko ike.”
41014068	Ezɨ a uabɨn ghuaragha ghaze, “Kɨ nɨ mɨgeir bizir mam gɨfozir puvatɨ.” Egha dɨvazimɨn tiar akar ekiamɨn otivasa azenan ghu. Ezɨ tuarim ati.
41014069	Ezɨ ingangarir guivir kam kagh an apigha tuivighav itir gumazamiziba ua me mɨgei, “Muna men mav.”
41014070	Ezɨ a ua uabɨn ghuara. Ezɨ mong gɨn, an boroghɨn tuivighav itir darasi Pita mɨgei, “Nɨ Galilin gumazim, kamaghɨn guizbangɨra nɨ men mavɨra.”
41014071	Ezɨ a pamtem mɨgɨa ghaze, Kɨ guizbangɨra mɨgei, kɨ ifaraghtɨma God na gasɨghasigham. Egha kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kɨ gumazir ia mɨgeir kam gɨfozir puvatɨ.”
41014072	A kamaghɨn mɨgɨavɨra itima tuarim uam ake. Ezɨ Pita Iesus a mɨkemezir mɨgɨrɨgɨam ginɨrɨ, “Nɨ faragh dughiar pumuning ko mɨkezimɨn suam, kɨ Iesus gɨfozir puvatɨ, eghtɨ tuarim gɨn dughiar pumuningɨn akegham.” Egha Pita nɨghnɨghava avegha bar puvɨrama azi.
41015001	Egha bar mɨzaraghara, ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba, ko Judan gumazir dapaniba, ko Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba, ko Judan kotɨn aven itir gumazir igharaziba sara, me nɨghnɨzir mam bato. Egha me Iesusɨn dafariba ikegha an akua ghua Pailat ganɨngi.
41015002	Ezɨ Pailat an azara, “Nɨ Judabar Atrivim, o?” Ezɨ Iesus a ikaragha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Are, nɨ deraghavɨra mɨgei.”
41015003	Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba bizir avɨribar a mɨgɨava, a gasi.
41015004	Ezɨ Pailat uam an azara, “Nɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨar kaba ikarvagham, o puvatɨ? Nɨ orasi, me bizir avɨriba nɨ mɨgɨa nɨ gasi.”
41015005	Ezɨ Iesus bar mɨgeir puvatɨzɨma, Pailat dɨgavir kuram gami.
41015006	Ezɨ Pailat amir arazim kamakɨn, azeniba bar isar ekiar kamɨn dughiam, me Pailatɨn mɨkɨmtɨma a kalabusɨn itir gumazir me ifongezim, aneteghtɨ, a mangam.
41015007	Gumazir mam, an ziam Barabas, a gumazir gavman ko mɨsoziba me ko kalabusɨn iti. Me bizir kam bagha kalabusɨn iti. Me gavman ko uariv sogha gumazir mabav soghezɨ me ariaghɨre.
41015008	Ezɨ gumazamiziba Pailat iti naghɨn ghuavanabogha kalabusɨn itir gumazir me ifongezim ateghasa Pailatɨn azangsɨsi. Kar arazir Pailat zurara amim.
41015009	Ezɨ Pailat men azara, “Kɨ Judabar Atrivim ategh ia bagh anemangasa, ia ifonge?”
41015010	Pailat fo, ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba Iesus amir biziba bagha naviba ikuvava, a isa Pailatɨn dafarim gatɨ.
41015011	Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba mɨgɨrɨgɨar navibagh iniviba gumazamizibagh anɨdi. Eghtɨ me Pailatɨn mɨkemeghtɨ a Iesusɨn anogoregh, egh Barabas ateghtɨ a me bagh izam.
41015012	Ezɨ Pailat azara, “Gumazir ia Judabar atrivim arɨzim, kɨ manmaghɨn a damuam?”
41015013	Ezɨ gumazamiziba pamtem dia kamaghɨn mɨgei, “A isɨ ter ighuvimɨn aneguragh!”
41015014	Ezɨ Pailat men azara, “Manmagh su? An arazir kurar manam gami?” Ezɨ me bar pamtem dɨa mɨgei, “Ter ighuvimɨn aneguragh!”
41015015	A me damutɨ men naviba deraghasa, Pailat Barabas ataki. Egha mɨdorozir gumazibav kemezɨ me benibar Iesus fozoroghezɨ Pailat ter ighuvimɨn aneguasa me ganɨngi.
41015016	Egha mɨdorozir gumaziba Iesus inigha gavmanɨn dɨpenir ekiamɨn mɨriamɨn aven ghuaghira mɨdorozir gumaziba bar men diazɨ me iza uari akufa.
41015017	Egha me korotiar aghevir ruarim a garugha egha dɨkonir amianim arkɨrigha an dapanim garu.
41015018	Egha me maghɨra an diava a mɨgei, “Judabar Atrivim, nɨrara atrivir ekiam!”
41015019	Egha me aghorim an dapanim mɨsoghava, egha uaghan a giparavɨra iti. Egha me ifara uan tevir akuribagh isɨn ira mati me guizbangɨra an ziam fe moghɨn ami.
41015020	Me arazir kabar a gamua a dɨpovegha gɨvagha, a da korotiar me a agaghuiziba suegha, ananaba agaghui. Egha me a isa ter ighuvimɨn a gafughasa an akua zui.
41015021	Sairinin gumazir mam Saimon, a Aleksander ko Rufusɨn afeziam, a nguibar igharazimɨn ikegha Jerusalemɨn aven zui. Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba Iesus guamin ter ighuvim a terasa an suirazɨ, an aneteri.
41015022	Egha me ghua danganir mamɨn ziam Golgata, me an otifi. (Danganir kamɨn ziamɨn mɨngarim kamakɨn, Dapanir Agharir Danganim.)
41015023	Egha me wain ko mɨzaziba agevir dɨpam veregha Iesus ganɨdima an an aghua.
41015024	Ezɨ aruem anabozɨ, me a isa ter ighuvimɨn aneguragha a gafu. Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba an korotiaba tuiragh uari danɨngasa satu gikararai. Tina faragh otogh, korotiar manam iniam.
41015026	Egha me an gun mɨgeir akar kam osiri, “A Judabar atrivim.” Me ghaze, a bizir kam bagha kotɨn tughava areme.
41015027	Me gumazir okɨava mɨdorozibagh amizir pumuning, Iesusɨn boroghɨn uaghan aning agura. Me mav isa Iesusɨn agharir guvimɨn itir ter ighuvim gafu, egha mav isa agharir ikɨriamɨn itir ter ighuvim gafu.
41015029	Ezɨ iza zui darasi me dɨbovibar a mɨgɨava uan dapaniba roava ghaze, “Ore! Nɨ, gumazir Godɨn Dɨpenim akarigh aruer pumuning ko mɨkezimɨn uam an ingarasa mɨkemezim,
41015030	datɨrɨghɨn nɨ uabɨ uabɨn akuragh, ter ighuvim ategh izighirɨ!”
41015031	Ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba ko Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba uaghan kamaghɨram a dɨpova uariv gei. Me kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “A igharaz darazir akurvagha uabɨra uabɨn akurvaghan asa!
41015032	Gumazir kam, a ghaze, kɨ God Ua Gumazamiziba Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim ko Israelbar Atrivim, a ter ighuvim ategh izighirɨtɨma, e an ganigh nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikiam.” Gumazir okɨmakɨar an boroghɨn guraghav itimning uaghan mɨgɨrɨgɨar kurar avɨriba puvɨram a mɨgɨavɨra iti.
41015033	Aruem iza pazaghar torimɨn itima mɨtatem nguazimɨn itir nguibaba bar da avaragha, ghua dughiam 3 kloghɨn guaratɨzimɨn tu.
41015034	Egha dughiam 3 kloghɨn itima Iesus tiarir ekiamɨn pamtem kamaghɨn dei, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” Akar kamɨn mɨngarim kamakɨn, Nan God, nan God nɨ tizim bagha na ataki?
41015035	Ezɨ roghɨra tuivighav itir darasi oregha ghaze, “Ia oragh, a Elaijan dei.”
41015036	Ezɨ gumazir mam ivegha ghua dɨpamɨn suizir bizim isa wainɨn afangtɨzim garugha a isa aghorir mam gatɨgha, Iesus damasa an an amadi. Egha a ghaze, “Ia tegh, e ganika, Elaija ti izɨva an akuragham, o puvatɨ.”
41015037	Ezɨ Iesus pamtem diagha duam sue.
41015038	Ezɨ Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn itir inir ekiar guraghav itim pɨn ikegha tongɨra bigha ghuaghira vɨn otogha akuar pumuning irɨ.
41015039	Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumazir 100 plan garir gumazir dapanir mam, Iesusɨn boroghɨn tughav ikia orazi a pamtem diagha manmaghɨn aremezir arazimɨn ganigha ghaze, “Bar guizbangɨra, gumazir kam Godɨn Otarimra!”
41015040	Ezɨ amizir maba mong saghon tuivighav ikia gari. Men tongɨn Makdalan nguibamɨn amizim Maria, ko Jemsɨn igiam ko Josepɨn amebam Maria, ko Salome.
41015041	Amizir kaba Galilin ikegha Iesusɨn akurvagha egha an gɨn arui. Amizir avɨrir maba sara Iesus ko Jerusalemɨn anabogha uaghan iti.
41015042	Datɨrɨghɨn Sabat bagha bizibar kɨrir dughiam. (Eghtɨ guaratɨzim Sabat otogham.) Ezɨ kamaghɨn aruem gevima, Arimatean gumazim Josep, Judabar kotɨn aven itir gumazir aghuir me bar fozim. A uabɨ uaghan God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam bagha mɨzuai. An atiatir puvatɨgha Iesusɨn kuam iniasa ghua Pailatɨn azai.
41015044	Ezɨ Pailat orazi, Iesus aremegha gɨvazɨ, a dɨgavir kuram gami. Egha a mɨdorozir gumazir 100 plan garir gumazim bagha akam amadazɨma a izima an an azara, “Iesus guizbangɨra aremezɨ, o?”
41015045	Ezɨ an an mɨgɨrɨgɨam baregha a fo, Iesus guizbangɨram areme. Ezɨ a Iesusɨn kuam iniasa Josepɨn amamangatɨ.
41015046	Ezɨ Josep inir ghurghurir aghuir mam givezegha izava Iesusɨn kuam adangi. Egha a righa ghua dagɨar torir me dutuzimɨn ghugha anerɨzima Makdalan amizim Maria ko Josepɨn amebam Maria, aning garima, Josep Iesusɨn kuam isa dagɨar torimɨn aven anetɨgha, dagɨar ekiar mam poghpuegha izava an akam dukua.
41016001	Egha Sabatɨn dughiam gɨvazɨma, Makdalan amizim Maria, Jemsɨn amebam Maria, ko Salome mangɨ Iesusɨn kuam daghuasa borer mughuriar aghuaribagh ivese.
41016002	7 pla dughiabar faragha zuir dughiamɨn aruem anadima mɨzaraghara me dagɨar torir matmatiamɨn ghua uarira uariv gei, “Tina dagɨar torimɨn akam gasarazir dagɨam puegham?”
41016004	Egha me ghua garima dagɨar ekiar kam, me a poghpuegha ghu.
41016005	Ezɨ me dagɨar torir akamɨn aven ghua garima gumazir igiar mam korotiar ghurghurir ruarim arugha agharir guvimɨn amadaghan aperaghav iti. Ezɨ me an ganigha bar aguaghfa.
41016006	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia akongan markɨ. Ia Nasaretɨn gumazim Iesus bagha gari. A ter ighuvimɨn aremegha ua dɨkafi! A kagh itir puvatɨ. Ia kagh a irɨghav ikezir danganimɨn gan.
41016007	Egh ia mangɨ, Pita ko an suren gumazir igharazibav kemegh, ‘A ian faragh Galilin mangam. A mɨkemezir moghɨn ia munagh a bativam.’”
41016008	Ezɨma me dɨgavir kuram gamigha aguava azenan ghuegha puv are. Me atiatingi, kamaghɨn me taraziv kemezir puvatɨ.
41016009	Iesus 7 pla dughiabar faragha zuir dughiamɨn mɨzaraghara ua dɨkavigha Makdalan amizim Maria faragha uabɨ isava an aka. Amizir kamnaghra Iesus faragha duar kurar 7 pla an itiba batoke.
41016010	Ezɨ gumazamizir Iesus ko aruava ikeziba, me a bagha bar osemegha puv azia itima, Maria ghugha Iesusɨn gun me mɨgei.
41016011	Ezɨ me orazi, Iesus ua dɨkavigha uabɨ isa Makdalan Marian akazɨ, an an gani. Me kamaghɨn oregha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim amizir kamɨn akabar itir puvatɨ.
41016012	Egha dughiar kamnaghra gɨn Iesus gumazir igharazimɨn mɨn otozɨ suren gumazir pumuning nguibar ekiamɨn azenan zuima an aning bato.
41016013	Ezɨ aning uamategha iza bizir kamɨn gun maraziv kemezɨ, me uaghan nɨghnɨzir gavgavim aningɨn akabar itir puvatɨ.
41016014	Egha gɨn 11 plan suren gumaziba apima Iesus uabɨ isa men aka. Egha a, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim puvatɨzir bizim ko, me navir gavgavim ikia a ua dɨkavizɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨam marazi an ganigha mɨgeima me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn itir puvatɨ, ezɨ bizir kaba bagha Iesus me mɨgɨa men atari.
41016015	Egha a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Mangɨ nguazir kam bar a daruva nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamiziba bar akar aghuim me mɨkɨm.
41016016	Eghtɨ tina nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan ikɨva, egh rueghtɨ, God an akuraghtɨ, a zurara God ko ikiam. Eghtɨ tina nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itir puvatɨ, a Godɨn kotɨn ikɨva ivezir kuram iniam.
41016017	Eghtɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itiba, mirakelɨn arazir kaba uaghan me bativam: me nan ziam duar kuraba batoghɨva, me nguibabar akar fozir puvatɨzibav kɨmɨva, egh kuruziba uan dafaribar dar suigham. Egh me imezir dɨpar ariaghɨritamar ameghtɨ a tong men navibagh asɨghasighan kogham. Egh me uan dafariba isɨ arɨmariar gumazibar arɨghtɨ men arɨmariaba gɨvam.”
41016019	Egha Ekiam Iesus bizir kabar me mɨkemegha gɨvazɨma God a inigha uan nguibamɨn ghuavanabo. Ezɨma a Godɨn agharir guvimɨn amadaghan aperaghav iti.
41016020	Ezɨma an suren gumaziba nguazir kamɨn danganiba bar dar ghuava akam akuri. Ezɨ Ekiam me ko ingara uan akam gavgavim a ganɨga mirakelɨn araziba sara akakasi, kamaghɨn gumazamiziba fo, akar kam guizbangɨra.
42001001	Gumazir aruam, Tiofilus, nɨ fo, gumazir avɨriba God en tongɨn amizir bizibar ganigha, dar gun osirasava ami. E gumazir uari uan damaziba ganizibar akam baraki. Egha me faragha Godɨn akamɨn ingangarir gumazibar otivigha, egha an akam akuri. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ uaghan akar kam osirigh nɨ bagh anemangasa. Egha kɨ deraghavɨra dar mɨngaribagh foghasa ingara ghua dagh foghava, nɨ bagha bar deravɨrama da osiri. Nɨ dar gan fogh suam, bizir nɨ oraghizir kaba da guizɨn biziba.
42001005	Dughiar kamɨn Herot Judian atrivimɨn itima, Godɨn ofa gamir gumazir mamɨn ziam Sekaraia, an Abiyan adarazir gumazir mam. Ezɨma an amuim Elisabet, an Aronɨn ovavim.
42001006	Aning bar deraghavɨra Godɨn araziba koma an akam baragha dar gɨn zui. Ezɨma God aningɨn garima, aning an damazimɨn bar dera.
42001007	Elisabet furabagh ati, kamaghɨn amizɨma aning boriba puvatɨghava, dughiar ruarim pura ikia ghua bar ghuri.
42001008	Ezɨ dughiar mamɨn ofa gamir gumaziba ingarima, Sekaraia uaghan ofa gamir gumazimɨn mɨn Godɨn damazimɨn ingari.
42001009	Ezɨ me Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn ofa gamir gumazibar arazibar gɨntɨgha, gumazim amɨsɨvasa me dagɨabagh da kuri. Ezɨ God anemɨsefe. Eghtɨ Sekaraia Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven mangɨ mɨgharir mughuriar aghuim zuim dapongam.
42001010	Ezɨma mɨgharir mughuriar aghuim zuim dapongamin dughiam otozɨma, gumazamizir Godɨn ziam feba, Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn mɨriamɨn uari akuvagha God ko mɨgei.
42001011	Ezɨma Ekiamɨn Ensel a batogha, mɨgharir mughuriar aghuimɨn ofan danganimɨn agharir guvimɨn amadaghan tughav iti.
42001012	Ezɨ Sekaraia an apigha dɨgavir kuram gamigha bar atiatingi.
42001013	Ezɨma ensel kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Sekaraia, nɨ atiatingan markɨ, nɨ God ko mɨkemezir mɨgɨrɨgɨam, God a baraki. Ezɨma nɨn amuim Elisabet nɨ bagh otarim bategham. Eghtɨ nɨ ziar kam, Jon a datɨgh.
42001014	Egh nɨ bar akuegh navir amɨrɨzimɨn ikɨ. Eghtɨ a Godɨn damazimɨn ziar ekiam iniam, kamaghɨn gumazamizir avɨriba an otoghamin dughiamɨn bar akuegham. Eghtɨ a wain ko dɨpar onganibar aman kogham. Egh a uan amebamɨn navir averiamɨn aven ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨ, Godɨn Duam bar a gizɨvagham.
42001016	Egh a uam Israelɨn gumazamizir avɨriba inigh men Ekiam God bagh mangam.
42001017	Egh Elaijan itir Godɨn Duam ko gavgavir kamra Jon Ekiamɨn faragh mangɨva, afeziabar amutɨma me uan boriba ua dagh fueghɨva, akɨriba ragha God gasaraziba ua me damutɨma me ua nɨghnɨzir aghuibar gumazibar amuva, egh gumazibav kɨmtɨma me uari akɨrɨghasɨ Ekiam mɨzuam ikiam.”
42001018	Ezɨ Sekaraia enselɨn azara, “Kɨ ghurizɨ, nan amuim uaghan ghurigha gɨfa. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ manmaghɨn bizir kam guizbangɨra a gɨfogham?”
42001019	Ezɨ ensel an akam ikara, “Kɨ Gebriel. Kɨ Godɨn damazimɨn tughav iti. God uabɨ na amadazɨma, kɨ akar aghuir kamɨn nɨ mɨkɨmasa ize.
42001020	Nɨ nan akaba baregha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim dar itir puvatɨ. Ezɨ bizir kam bagh nɨ mɨkɨman kogh nɨmɨra ikiam, mamaghɨra ikɨtɨma bizir kaba otivamin dughiam otogham.”
42001021	Ensel Sekaraia mɨgeima, gumaziba ko amiziba azenan ikia Sekaraia mɨzua ghuav amɨragha pura nɨghnɨsi, manmaghɨn amizim a dughiar ruarimɨn Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven iti?
42001022	Ezɨ an azenan otoghava, me mɨkɨman asaghasaki. Ezɨ me fo, a ti Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven irebamɨn mɨn bizitamɨn gani. Egha an akamɨn me mɨgeir puvatɨgha dafaribara me mɨgei.
42001023	Eghava an ingangarir dughiam gɨvazɨma, a uan nguibamɨn ghu.
42001024	Ezɨma dughiar maba ghua gɨvazɨma an amuim Elisabet navim ada 5 plan iakinibar uabɨ modo.
42001025	Egha a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ekiam na bagha bizir kam gami. A nan apangkuvigha nan aghumsɨzim gumazamizibar damazimɨn anedangi.”
42001026	Egha Elisabetɨn navir adasem 6 plan iakinimɨn otozɨma, God ensel Gebriel Nasaretɨn anemada, Galilin Distrighɨn aven itir nguibam.
42001027	Ezɨ ensel ghua, guivir igiar gumazitam koma akuizir puvatɨzim, an ziam Maria, me gumazim Josepɨn ikiasa a ginaba. Josep, an Atrivim Devitɨn ovavimra.
42001028	Ensel a bagha ghuava kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Dughiar aghuarim Maria. Ekiam nɨ gifongegha deravɨra nɨ gamua egha nɨ ko iti.”
42001029	Ezɨ Maria an akam baregha dɨgavir kuram gamigha pura nɨghnɨsi, “Kar akar manmaghɨn amizim?”
42001030	Ezɨ ensel kamaghɨn a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Maria, nɨ atiatingan markɨ, God bar nɨ gifuegha nɨ ko iti.
42001031	Nɨ oragh, nɨ navim asegh otarim bateghɨva, ziar kam Iesus, a datɨgh.
42001032	A ziar ekiam ikɨtɨ, me suam, kar Godɨn bar pɨn itimɨn otarim. Eghtɨ God a damightɨ, a uan ovavim, Atrivim Devitɨn mɨn ikiam.
42001033	Eghtɨ a Jekopɨn adarazir atrivimɨn ikɨvɨra ikiam. Eghtɨ a bizibagh ativamin dughiar kam gɨvaghan kogham.”
42001034	Ezɨma Maria kamaghɨn enselɨn azara, “Kɨ guivir igiar patamɨn itir puvatɨzim. Ezɨma bizir kam manmaghɨn na batogham?”
42001035	Ezɨ ensel an akam ikaragha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Godɨn Duam nɨ bagh izeghtɨ bar pɨn itir Godɨn gavgavim nɨ avaragham. Eghtɨ borim Godɨn damazimɨn zueghtɨ me Godɨn Otarim a darɨgham.
42001036	Bizitam Godɨn aven kozir puvatɨ. Nɨn anabam Elisabet, a ghurigha, egha uaghan navim adai. Me ghaze, an navim asangan kogham, ezɨ an navir adasem datɨrɨghɨn iakinir 6 plan tu.”
42001038	Ezɨ Maria kamaghɨn ensel ikara, “Kɨ Godɨn ingangarir amizim. Nɨ mɨkemezir moghɨra God bizibar na damu.” Ezɨ ensel anetegha ghu.
42001039	Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn Maria uan biziba akɨrighava zuamɨra nguibar ekiar Judian Distrighɨn mɨghsɨamɨn itimɨn ghu.
42001040	Egha a Sekaraian dɨpenimɨn aven ghugha dughiam Elisabet ganɨngi.
42001041	Ezɨ Elisabet Marian tiarim barazima, an borim an navimɨn aven aguaghfa, ezɨma Elisabet Godɨn Duam a gizɨfa.
42001042	Eghava a pamtemɨn tiarim akarigha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ amizibagh afirazɨ God bar bizir aghuim nɨ gami. Egh a uaghan bizir aghuim borir nɨ oteghamim gami.
42001043	Ezɨ God tizim bagha deravɨra na gami, ezɨma nan Ekiamɨn amebam na bagh izi?
42001044	Ezɨ kɨ nɨ barazi, nɨ dughiam na ganɨngizɨma borir na navir averiamɨn itim bar akuegha aguaghfa.
42001045	Nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn iti, ezɨ Ekiam nɨ mɨkemezɨ moghɨn bizibar nɨ gami. Kamaghɨn nɨ bar akongegh.”
42001046	Ezɨ Maria kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ pura Ekiamɨn ingangarir amizim, kamaghɨn amizɨma a na ginɨrɨ. Kamaghɨn nan navim Ekiamɨn ziam fe. Ezɨ nan duam God bagha bar akonge, a nan akurvazim. God a bar gavgavigha bizir bar ekiabar na gami. Ezɨ an ziam bar zuegha dera. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, datɨrɨghɨn tugh mangɨ gumazamiziba na mɨkɨm suam, God deravɨra nɨ gami.
42001050	Ezɨma a gumazamizir an atiatiava an apengan itibar apangkufi. A kamaghɨra datɨrɨghɨn itir gumazamizibar amu gɨn izamin gumaziba ko amizibar amu mamaghɨra ikiam.
42001051	A uan dafarimɨn bizir bar gavgavibagh ami. Gumazir uarira uan ziaba feba, a men agɨrazɨma me are.
42001052	God atrivibar gavgavim dɨkabɨragha gumazir kɨniba fe.
42001053	A bizir aghuiba isava mɨtiriaba azibagh aniga, biziba bar izɨvaziba amangizɨma me pura ghue.
42001054	A uan ingangarir gumazim Israelɨn akura. Egha en ovavibagh amizir akar gavgavim gɨnɨghnɨghavɨra iti. Egha Abrahamɨn apangkuvigha, egh gɨn otivamin gumazibar apangkuvigh mamaghɨra ikiam.”
42001056	Ezɨ Maria iakinir pumuning ko mɨkezimɨn Elisabet ko ikegha gɨn uamategh uan nguibamɨn ghu.
42001057	Ezɨma Elisabet otamin dughiam otozɨma, an otarim bate.
42001058	An boroghɨra itir darasi koma an anababa kamaghɨn oraki, Ekiam an apangkuvigha bizir aghuim a gamizɨma, me a ko bar akonge.
42001059	Ezɨ an 7 plan dughiaba gɨvazɨma, me borimɨn mɨkarzir mogomem aghorasa izi. Egha me an afeziamɨn ziam Sekaraia a darɨghasa.
42001060	Ezɨma an amebam kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Puvatɨ! E Jon a darɨgham.”
42001061	Ezɨ me kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨn anabatam ziar katam itir puvatɨ.”
42001062	Egha me dafarimra an afeziamɨn azangsɨsi, a ziar manatam uan otarim darɨgham.
42001063	Egha Sekaraia an ziam osirasa biziba bagha dafaribara men azangsɨsi. Egha kamaghɨn osiri, “An ziam Jon.” Ezɨma me kamaghɨn ganigha bar aguaghfa.
42001064	Ezɨma an akam zuamɨra kuiaghrɨzɨma an mɨzem fɨriaghrɨzɨma, a maghɨra mɨgɨava Godɨn ziam fe.
42001065	Ezɨma an boroghɨn itir darazi kamaghɨn ganigha, bar atiatingi. Ezɨma Judian Distrighɨn itir nguibar mɨghsɨabar itibar gumaziba bizir otivizir kaba baregha dar gun uariv gei.
42001066	Ezɨ Ekiamɨn gavgavim borir kam ko iti. Ezɨma me bar moghɨra bizir kam baregha, a gɨnɨghnɨgha a bagha azangsɨsi, “Borir kam bar manmaghɨram otogham?”
42001067	Ezɨma an afeziam Sekaraia Godɨn Duam a gizɨvazɨma, a Godɨn nɨghnɨzimɨn gun mɨgei,
42001068	“Ekiam iza uan gumaziba ko amiziba ua me ini, kamaghɨn amizɨma, e an ziam fe, a Israelbar God.
42001069	God en akurvaghasa uan ingangarir gumazim Devitɨn adarazir aven gumazir bar gavgavim amɨsefe.
42001070	Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba bizir kamɨn gun fomɨra kamaghɨn me mɨkeme.
42001071	An en apaniba koma en atara pazav e gamibar dam e iniasa ize.
42001072	Egh apangkuvim en ovavibar akakaghɨva, uan Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim nɨrɨgham,
42001073	akar gavgavir en ovavim Abraham ganɨngizim.
42001074	Egh en apaniba dam e iniva, en amamangatɨghtɨma e an ingarsɨva atiatingan koghɨva,
42001075	eghɨva e an damazimɨn arazir aghuir a ifongezibar gɨn mangam, eghtɨ a ifongezir arazir aghuir kaba en ikiam.
42001076	Ezɨ nɨ nan borim, nɨ faragh mangɨ Ekiam bagh tuavim akɨr. Kamaghɨn amizim, me Godɨn bar pɨn itimɨn akam inigha izir gumazim nɨ darɨgham.
42001077	Godɨn apangkuvim e ko itima, a uan gumazamiziba ua me iniamin fofozim me ganɨga, men arazir kuraba gɨn amadi. Ezɨma aruemɨn angazangarim Godɨn Nguibamɨn ikegh e bagh izighram.
42001079	Egh angazangarim mɨtarmemɨn ikiava aremeghasava amibagh feghɨva, egh navir amɨrɨzimɨn tuavim en suebar akagham.”
42001080	Ezɨma Jon gɨn aghuiga gɨvazɨma an duam uaghan aghua gavgafi. Egha a Judian nguazir gumaziba puvatɨzimɨn iti. Egha ghua an azenim girɨgha Israelɨn gumazibar damazimɨn oto.
42002001	Ezɨ dughiar kam Sisar Ogastus akar gavgavim amadagha ghaze, “Rom garir nguibabar gumazamiziba bar mangɨ uan ziaba osir.”
42002002	Dughiar kam Kwirinius, a Sirian gumazir dapanimɨn itima, ziaba osirir dughiar faragha zuir kam oto.
42002003	Ezɨ gumazamiziba uan ziaba osirasa uan nguibabara zui.
42002004	Ezɨ Josep uaghan Devitɨn anabar mam. Kamaghɨn a Galilin Distrighɨn itir nguibam Nasaret ategha, Judian Distrighɨn itir nguibam Betlehemɨn zui, kar Devitɨn nguibam.
42002005	A mangɨva uan amuir inabazim Maria ko aning uan ziamning osirasa. Dughiar kam Maria borimɨn navim adai.
42002006	Egha aning ghuava Betlehemɨn itima, Maria borim batamin dughiam oto.
42002007	Ezɨ a uan otarir ivariam bate. Egha borim inir avɨzibar a nomke. Dughiar kam dɨpenir akuim izɨfa. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, aning borim isava bulmakauba apir danganimɨn anetɨ.
42002008	Ezɨ sipsipbar garir gumazir maba nguibamɨn azenan ikiava, dɨmagaribar uan sipsipbar gara me geghufi.
42002009	Ezɨ Ekiamɨn enselɨn mam pura me batozɨ, Ekiamɨn angazangarim me gisira. Ezɨ me bar atiatingi.
42002010	Ezɨ ensel kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia atiatingan markɨ. Ia oragh! Kɨ akar aghuim inigha ia bagha izi. Akar aghuir gumazamiziba bar me damightɨ, me bar akongegham.
42002011	Datɨrɨghɨn Devitɨn nguibamɨn akurvazir gumazim ia bagha oto. A God Ua Gumazamiziba Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim, a en Ekiam.
42002012	Ia mangɨ kamaghɨn ganigh fogh, ia gantɨma me borim inir avɨzibar a nomkeghɨva bulmakauba apir danganim datɨghtɨma a irɨghɨv ikiam.”
42002013	Ezɨ maghɨra, Godɨn nguibamɨn enselɨn avɨrir bar dafam otogha enselɨn kam ko me Godɨn ziam fa kamaghɨn mɨgei,
42002014	“Ia bizibar pɨn itir Godɨn ziam fɨ. Eghtɨ nguazimɨn itir gumaziba ko amizir God ifongeziba, me navir amɨrɨzimɨn ikɨ.”
42002015	Ezɨ enselba sipsipbar garir gumaziba ategha Godɨn nguibamɨn ghuezɨma, ezɨ sipsipbar garir gumaziba uarira uariv gei, “Aria, e Betlehemɨn mangɨva Ekiam e mɨkemezir bizir otozimɨn ganika.”
42002016	Egha me zuamɨra ghuava Josep ko Marian api, egha borimɨn garima a bulmakauba apir danganim girɨghav iti.
42002017	Egha sipsipbar garir gumaziba borimɨn ganigha, egha ensel borimɨn gun me mɨkemezir akabar gun gumazir igharazibav gei.
42002018	Ezɨ gumazamiziba sipsipbar garir gumazibar eghaghanim baregha dɨgavir kuram gami.
42002019	Ezɨ Maria bizir kaba uan navir averiam gatɨgha, egha dagh nɨghnɨghavɨra iti.
42002020	Ezɨ sipsipbar garir gumaziba uamatenge. Ensel me mɨkemezɨ me oraghizɨ moghɨn bizibar gari, da otifi. Kamaghɨn me bar akuegha Godɨn ziam fa zui.
42002021	Ezɨ 7 plan dughiaba gɨvazɨma an mɨkarzir mogomem aghoramin dughiam otozɨ me ziam Iesus a gatɨ. Maria tɨghar navim asangam, ensel faragha a gatɨzir ziam.
42002022	Ezɨ Moses Osirizir Arazibar mɨn amebam Godɨn damazimɨn zueghamin dughiam otozɨma, Maria ko Josep borim inigha Ekiam danɨngasa Jerusalemɨn zui.
42002023	Ekiam Moses ganɨngizir arazibar osizirim iti, borir otarir ivariaba me da isɨ ua Ekiam danɨngam.
42002024	Ezɨ aning Ekiamɨn arazir osiriziba mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, aning ofa damuasa, kuarazir bunbar pumuning, o bunbamɨn mɨn gari kuarazir igiar pumuning inigha izi.
42002025	Ezɨ Jerusalemɨn aven gumazir mam, an ziam Simeon, a Godɨn damazimɨn deragha God baghavɨra iti. A Israelɨn gumazamizibar osɨmtɨziba a gɨvamin dughiam bagha mɨzuai iti.
42002026	Godɨn Duam bizir kam azenarama an akagha gɨfa, a faragh Ekiamɨn Krais (Gumazir God Ua Gumazamiziba Iniasa Mɨsevezim), an an ganighɨva, gɨn aremegham.
42002027	Kamaghɨn amizɨma Godɨn Duam nɨghnɨzim a ganɨngizɨma a Godɨn Dɨpenir avɨzimɨn zui. Ezɨ Josep ko Maria Iesus inighava aven iza Ekiamɨn arazir osirizim mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, a damuasa.
42002028	Ezɨ Simeon Iesus inighava uan dafarimningɨn a ifiraghava Godɨn ziam fa kamaghɨn mɨgei,
42002029	“Ekiam, kɨ nɨn ingangarir gumazim. Eghtɨ nɨn akurvazimɨn angazangarim nɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumaziba me danɨngam. Egh ziar ekiam Israelbar anɨngam; me nɨn gumazamiziba. Ezɨ nɨ gumazamizibar damazibar me bagha akurvazir bizir kam gami. Ezɨ nɨ en akuragh ua e iniamin bizir kam, kɨ uan damazimɨn an ganigha gɨfa. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ fomɨra mɨkemezɨ moghɨn nɨ na ateghtɨ kɨ mangɨ, navir amɨrɨzimɨn ikiam.”
42002033	Ezɨ borimɨn amebam ko afeziam Simeon an gun mɨkemezir mɨgɨrɨgɨaba baregha aning nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh ami.
42002034	Ezɨ Simeon ghaze, God bizir aghuiba ia bagh a dar amu, egha Simeon an amebam Maria kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Borir kam God a ginaba, eghtɨ Israelɨn avɨriba God bagh tugh gavgavigham. Eghtɨ avɨriba iregham. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba bizir an amibar ganɨva akar kurabar dav kɨmam.
42002035	Kamaghɨn gumazir avɨribar nɨghnɨzir navimɨn aven itiba azenan otivam. Eghtɨ osɨmtɨzir ekiar mam uaghan nɨn mɨkarzimɨn otivam.”
42002036	Ezɨ Godɨn akam inigha izir amizir mam iti, an ziam Ana, a Panuelɨn guivim, Aserɨn anabam. A faragha pamɨn itima aningɨn 7 plan azeniba, ezɨ an pam aremezɨma, ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn a bar ghuri.
42002037	Egha 84 plan azeniba, a odiarimɨn iti. A Godɨn Dɨpenim ataghrazir pu, egha dɨmagariba ko arueba Godɨn ziam fa, egha dagheba ataghragha God ko mɨgei.
42002038	Egha dughiar kamra a uaghan iza men mɨriamɨn tu. A biziba bagha God mɨnabi. Egha borir kamɨn gun gumazamizir avɨribav gei, me God ua Jerusalemɨn itir gumaziba ko amiziba iniamin dughiam mɨzuai.
42002039	Egha Josep ko Maria biziba bar Ekiamɨn arazir osirizim mɨkemezɨ moghɨn dagh amigha gɨvagha, egha uamategha Galilin Distrighɨn aven itir nguibam Nasaretɨn zui.
42002040	Ezɨ borim aghuiga mɨkarzimɨn gavgafi. Ezɨ fofozir aghuim bar a gizɨfa. Ezɨ bizir aghuiba God a bagha dagh ami.
42002041	Azeniba zurara Iesusɨn amebam ko afeziam, God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiamɨn Isam bagha Jerusalemɨn zui.
42002042	Ezɨ an azenir 12 plan otogha, arazim mɨrara me isam bagha zui.
42002043	Isam gɨvazɨma, an gɨn, an amebam ko afeziam uamategha nguibamɨn zuima, aningɨn otarim Iesus, a Jerusalemra itima aning a gɨfozir puvatɨ.
42002044	Aning ghaze, a ti uan namakaba ko izi. Egha aruer kamɨn ghuavɨra iti. Egha aning maghɨra uan namakaba koma anababar torimɨn a bagha rui.
42002045	Egha aning an apizir puvatɨ, egha aning a bagh ruiasa uamategha Jerusalemɨn zui.
42002046	Dughiar mɨkezimɨn gɨn aning Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn avɨzimɨn an api. A tisabar torimɨn aperaghav iti, egha me baragha azangsɨzibar me gami.
42002047	Gumazir kaba bar an fofozim ko akar ikarvazir kaba baragha egha dɨgavir kuram gami.
42002048	Ezɨ an amebam ko afeziam an apigha, egha dɨgavir kuram gami. Egha an amebam kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nan otarim, nɨ tizim bagha arazir kurar kamɨn ga gami? Ga nɨ bagha bar osemegha nɨ buri.”
42002049	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn aningɨn azara, “Gua tizim bagha na buri? Gua ti fozir puvatɨ, kɨ uan Afeziamɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven ikiam?”
42002050	Ezɨ an aningɨn mɨgeir bizimɨn mɨngarim aning a gɨfozir puvatɨ.
42002051	Egha a aningɨn akam baregha aning ko Nasaretɨn uaghiri. Ezɨ an amebam bizir kaba baregha dagh nɨghnɨghavɨra iti.
42002052	Ezɨ Iesus fofozim ko mɨkarzim sarama aghui. Ezɨ an araziba God koma gumazibagh amima, me a gifonge.
42003001	Dughiar kam Taiberius Sisarɨn 15 plan azenimɨn Romɨn atrivimɨn itim oto. Ezɨ Pontius Pailat Judian Distrighɨn gavmanɨn gumazir dapanimɨn iti, Herot Galilin Distrighɨn gavmanɨn gumazir dapanimɨn iti. Ezɨ an aveghbuam Filip Iturian Distrigh ko Trakonitisɨn Distrighɨn gavmanɨn gumazir dapanimɨn ti, ezɨ Lisanias Abilenen Distrighɨn gavmanɨn gumazir dapanimɨn iti.
42003002	Ezɨma Anas ko Kaiafas Godɨn ofa gamir gumazir dapanimningɨn iti. Dughiar kam Jon, Sekaraian otarim, gumaziba itir puvatɨzir danganimɨn itima, God uan mɨgɨrɨgɨam a ganɨngi.
42003003	Ezɨ Jon Jordanɨn dɨpar mɨriamɨn aruava akam kura kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia uan navibagh iraghɨva rueghtɨ, God ian arazir kuraba gɨn amadagham.”
42003004	Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim Aisaian akɨnafarimɨn osirizir mɨgɨrɨgɨabar mɨrara ghu, a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Gumazir tiarir mam gumaziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn dia ghaze, ‘Ia Ekiam baghɨva tuaviba azenɨva, dar kɨr.
42003005	Kukuniba apemɨva, mɨghsɨaba ko akɨribar amutɨ da magɨrɨ. Tuavir ighuagha aruiba dar amutɨ da voroghɨra ikɨ. Egh tuavir kurabar amutɨ da deragh.
42003006	Eghtɨ nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba bar Godɨn akurvazimɨn ganam.’”
42003007	Ezɨ Jon gumazamizir bɨzir ruasa a bagha izibav gei, “Ia kuruzir divir anababa! Tina ia mɨkemezɨ ia Godɨn adarimɨn arɨ mangasa?
42003008	Ia navim girazir arazibara amu. Egh ia pura Abrahamɨn ovavibar uari arɨgh mɨkɨman markɨ. Kɨ ia mɨgei, God dagɨar kabara amightɨ da Abrahamɨn ovavibar mɨn otivighamin gavgavim iti.
42003009	Sobiam datɨrɨghɨn temer povibar iti, eghtɨ temer dagher ovɨzir aghuiba itir puvatɨziba, God bar da okeghɨva da isɨva avim mɨkɨnam.”
42003010	Ezɨ gumazamiziba Jonɨn azara, “Ezɨ e manmaghɨra damuam?”
42003011	Ezɨ Jon me ikara, “Gumazir korotiar aven azuir pumuning itim, tam isɨ gumazir puvatɨzim danɨngigh. Ezɨ dagheba itiba uaghan kamaghɨra damu.”
42003012	Ezɨ gavmanɨn dagɨaba isir gumaziba uaghan ruasa ize. Egha me azangsɨgha ghaze, “Tisa, e manmaghɨra damuam?”
42003013	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Gumazibar dagɨabagh isɨn ua dagɨataba inian markɨ.”
42003014	Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumazir maba Jonɨn azara, “Ezɨ eia, e manmaghɨn damuam?” Ezɨ a me ikara, “Gumazamizibar dagɨaba okɨmsɨva akar ifavaribar me gasan markɨ. Ia uan ingangarimɨn ivezimra initɨ deragham.”
42003015	Gumazamiziba bizir kabar garima men navir averiaba me ginivima me pura nɨghnɨgha ghaze, Jon ti God Ua Gumazamiziba Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim?
42003016	Ezɨ Jon bar men nɨghnɨziba ikara, “Kɨ dɨpamɨn ia rue. Ezɨ gumazir mam gɨn izam, an gavgavim bar nan gavgavim gafira. An dagarir asuabar beniba kɨ da firan gavgaviba puvatɨ. A Godɨn Duam ko avimɨn ia ruam.
42003017	A witba mɨsevir savol an agharimɨn iti, eghtɨ a uan witba mɨsɨva dar daghebar arɨghɨva, witba mɨsevir dɨpenimɨn witɨn mɨseviba aviva, egh dar mɨseviba avir munger puvatɨzimɨn da akuntɨma, da isiam.”
42003018	Egha Jon mɨgɨrɨgɨar avɨrir maba sara me mɨgɨa men navibagh inifi. Egha kamaghɨn akar aghuim me mɨkɨri.
42003019	Ezɨ dughiar kam Herot gavmanɨn gumazir dapanimɨn ti. A uan aveghbuam Filipɨn amuim Herodias koma akui, egha arazir kurar maba sarama ami. Ezɨ kamaghɨn Jon Herodias bagha Herotɨn guam gatɨgha a mɨkeme.
42003020	Herot uan arazir kurar maba ko kam sara isɨn atɨghava, Jon kalabus gatɨghava an tiam asara.
42003021	Jon gumazamiziba ruer dughiam, Iesus uaghan, Jon a rue. Ezɨ Iesus uan afeziam God ko mɨgeima, overiam kuiaghrɨzɨ,
42003022	Godɨn Duam bunbamɨn nivafɨzim gavagha a bagha izaghiri. Ezɨ tiarir mam overiamɨn otogha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ nan Otarim, Otarir kɨ ifongezim. Kɨ nɨ bagha bar akonge.”
42003023	Dughiar kam Iesus uabɨ 30 plan azeniba. Ezɨ a uan ingangarim maghɨram a gami. Gumaziba ko amiziba ghaze, Iesus Josepɨn otarimra. Ezɨ Josep Helin otarim.
42003024	Ezɨ Heli Matatɨn otarim. Ezɨ Matat Livain otarim. Ezɨ Livai Melkin otarim. Ezɨ Melki Janain otarim. Ezɨ Janai Josepɨn otarim.
42003025	Ezɨ Josep Matatiasɨn otarim. Ezɨ Matatias Amosɨn otarim. Ezɨ Amos Nahumɨn otarim. Ezɨ Nahum Eslin otarim. Ezɨ Esli Nagain otarim.
42003026	Ezɨ Nagai Matɨn otarim. Ezɨ Mat Matatiasɨn otarim. Ezɨ Matatias Seminɨn otarim. Ezɨ Semin Josekɨn otarim. Ezɨ Josek Jodan otarim.
42003027	Ezɨ Joda Joananɨn otarim. Ezɨ Joanan Resean otarim. Ezɨ Resea Serubabelɨn otarim. Ezɨ Serubabel Sealtielɨn otarim. Ezɨ Sealtiel Nerin otarim.
42003028	Ezɨ Neri Melkin otarim. Ezɨ Melki Adin otarim. Ezɨ Adi Kosamɨn otarim. Ezɨ Kosam Elmadamɨn otarim. Ezɨ Elmadam Erɨn otarim.
42003029	Ezɨ Er Josuan otarim. Ezɨ Josua Elieserɨn otarim. Ezɨ Elieser Jorimɨn otarim. Ezɨ Jorim Matatɨn otarim. Ezɨ Matat Livain otarim.
42003030	Ezɨ Livai Simeonɨn otarim. Ezɨ Simeon Judan otarim. Ezɨ Juda Josepɨn otarim. Ezɨ Josep Jonamɨn otarim. Ezɨ Jonam Eliakimɨn otarim.
42003031	Ezɨ Eliakim Melean otarim. Ezɨ Melea Menan otarim. Ezɨ Mena Matatan otarim. Ezɨ Matata Natanɨn otarim. Ezɨ Natan Devitɨn otarim.
42003032	Ezɨ Devit Jesin otarim. Ezɨ Jesi Obetɨn otarim. Ezɨ Obet Boasɨn otarim. Ezɨ Boas Salmonɨn otarim. Ezɨ Salmon Nasonɨn otarim.
42003033	Ezɨ Nason Aminadapɨn otarim. Ezɨ Aminadap Atminɨn otarim. Ezɨ Atmin Arnin otarim. Ezɨ Arni Hesronɨn otarim. Ezɨ Hesron Peresɨn otarim. Ezɨ Peres Judan otarim.
42003034	Ezɨ Juda Jekopɨn otarim. Ezɨ Jekop Aisakɨn otarim. Ezɨ Aisak Abrahamɨn otarim. Ezɨ Abraham Teran otarim. Ezɨ Tera Nahorɨn otarim.
42003035	Ezɨ Nahor Serukɨn otarim. Ezɨ Seruk Reun otarim. Ezɨ Reu Pelekɨn otarim. Ezɨ Pelek Eberɨn otarim. Ezɨ Eber Selan otarim.
42003036	Ezɨ Sela Kainanɨn otarim. Ezɨ Kainan Arpaksatɨn otarim. Ezɨ Arpaksat Siemɨn otarim. Ezɨ Siem Noan otarim. Ezɨ Noa Lamekɨn otarim.
42003037	Ezɨ Lamek Metuselan otarim. Ezɨ Metusela Enokɨn otarim. Ezɨ Enok Jaretɨn otarim. Ezɨ Jaret Mahalalelɨn otarim. Ezɨ Mahalalel Kenanɨn otarim.
42003038	Ezɨ Kenan Enosɨn otarim. Ezɨ Enos Setɨn otarim. Ezɨ Set Adamɨn otarim. Ezɨ Adam Godɨn otarim.
42004001	Iesus, Godɨn Duam bar a gizɨvazɨma a Jordanɨn dɨpam ategha uamategha Galilin Distrighɨn zui. Ezɨma Godɨn Duam a inigha gumaziba itir puvatɨzir danganimɨn zui.
42004002	Ezɨ Iesus danganir kamɨn 40 pla arueba ko dɨmagaribar itima, Satan bizibar a gifari. Iesus dughiar kabar daghetam amezir puvatɨ. Ezɨma dughiar kaba gɨvazɨma mɨtiriam an azi.
42004003	Ezɨma Satan kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ guizbangɨra Godɨn Otarim, nɨ dagɨar kam mɨkemeghtɨma a bretɨn mɨn otogh.”
42004004	Ezɨ Iesus Satan ikaragha ghaze, “Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Gumazamiziba daghebara damɨva dar gavgavimɨn ikian kogham.’”
42004005	Ezɨ Satan Iesus inigha danganir bar pɨn itimɨn ghuavanaboghava, egha zuamɨra nguazir kamɨn nguibaba bar an aka.
42004006	Egha Satan kamaghɨn Iesus mɨgei, “Bizir kaba nan agharimɨn iti, kamaghɨn amizɨma kɨ tina danɨngsɨ fueghɨva, a danɨngam. Kamaghɨn kɨ nguibar kabar ganamin gavgavim ko, dar bizir aghuiba nɨ danɨngam.
42004007	Eghtɨ nɨ tevimning apɨrigh nan ziam fɨtɨ, bizir kaba bar nɨna.”
42004008	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn an akam ikara, “Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Nɨ uan Ekiam God, nɨ an apengara ikɨ an ziamra fam.’”
42004009	Ezɨma Satan Iesus inighava Jerusalemɨn ghughava a isava Godɨn Dɨpenim pɨn mar anefa.
42004010	Egha a kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘A nɨ bagh uan enselbar mɨkemeghtɨma me deraghvɨra nɨn ganam, egh me uan dafaribar nɨ feghtɨma nɨ dagɨatam uan dagarim aseghan kogham!’ Kamaghɨn amizɨma nɨ guizbangɨra Godɨn Otarim, nɨ kagh ikɨ uabɨ ekunigh.”
42004012	Ezɨ Iesus an akam ikara, “Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Nɨ uan Ekiam God a gifar, a gakaghontɨ, a nɨn nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn mangan markɨ.’”
42004013	Ezɨ Satan ifavarir kaba bar Iesus gamigha gɨvagha anetaki. A Iesus ategha ghua dughiar igharazim bagha mɨzuai.
42004014	Ezɨma Iesus Godɨn Duamɨn gavgavimɨn a uamategha Galilin Distrighɨn ghu. Ezɨma an akam bar moghɨra nguibabar ghu.
42004015	Egha a God ko mɨgeir dɨpenibar men sure gamima, me bar an ziam fe.
42004016	Ezɨ Iesus Nasaretɨn ghu, a ikiava aghungizɨ naghɨn. Egha Sabatɨn dughiamɨn a God ko mɨgeir dɨpenimɨn aven ghu, an arazir a zuraram amim. Egha tugha Godɨn Akɨnafarim dɨponasava ami.
42004017	Ezɨ me Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim Aisaian akɨnafarir rɨghizim a ganɨngi. Ezɨma Iesus akɨnafarir rɨghizir kam onegha, mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn api.
42004018	“God akar aghuim gumazir onganarazibav kɨnasa na ginaba, ezɨ kamaghɨn amizɨma Ekiamɨn Duam nan iti. Egha uaghan akar kam kunasa na amada; akar kalabusɨn itiba ataghraghamim ko gumazir damazir kuraba ua ganamim. Egh osɨmtɨzibar apengan itiba kɨ ua me fɨrɨva egh suam, Ekiam gumazamizibagh ifongezir dughiam otogha gɨfa.”
42004020	Ezɨma Iesus akɨnafarim uam a righava, egha a isava ingangarir gumazim ganigha, egha apera. Ezɨma me bar moghɨra God ko mɨgeir dɨpenimɨn aven pamtem an gari.
42004021	Ezɨma a maghɨra kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Datɨrɨghɨn Godɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨar ia oraghizim a guizbangram oto!”
42004022	Ezɨ me an akabagh ifongeghava nɨghnɨzir avɨribar akar aghuir a mɨkemezibagh ami, egha me kamaghɨn azara, “Kar pura Josepɨn otarimra, o?”
42004023	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia ti akar isɨn zuir kam na mɨkɨmam, ‘Dokta nɨ uabɨ uan mɨkarzim akɨrigh!’ Egh e oraghizir bizir nɨ Kaperneamɨn amiziba nɨ kagh uaghan uan nguibamɨn dar amu.”
42004024	Egha a mɨgɨa ghuavɨra ikiava kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba, men adarazi me baraghan aghua.
42004025	Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, Elaijan dughiamɨn, amuir odiarir bar avɨrim Israelɨn iti. Ezɨ amozim izir puvatɨgha ghua azenir pumuning ko mɨkezim ko azenir akuamɨn oto. Ezɨ dagheba bar puvatɨzir dughiam bar nguibabar oto.
42004026	Ezɨ God Israelɨn amizitam bagha Elaija amadazir puvatɨ. A Sidonɨn danganir aven itir nguibar mam, Sarefetɨn itir amuir odiarim baghavɨra anemada.
42004027	Ezɨma Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim Elisan dughiamɨn, lepan avɨrim Israelɨn ti. Ezɨ God men tav gamizɨma a zuegha derazir puvatɨ. Ezɨ Namanra, God a gamizɨma a zuegha dera, a Sirian gumazir mam.”
42004028	Ezɨ gumazir God ko mɨgeir dɨpenimɨn aven itiba bar bizir kam bareghava men naviba Iesus bagha men isi.
42004029	Egha me dɨkavigha, Iesus batoghezɨma a nguibam ategha azenan ghuzɨma, me a inigha nguibam itir mɨghsɨar avarir konim anekunasa zui.
42004030	Ezɨ a men tongɨn ghua munagh otogha ghu.
42004031	Egha Iesus Galilin Distrighɨn aven itir nguibam, Kaperneamɨn ghuaghiri. Egha Sabatɨn dughiamɨn, a gumaziba ko amizibar sure gami.
42004032	Egha an akaba gavgavim dar ti. Egha bizir kam bagha me an suren mɨgɨrɨgɨaba baraghava dɨgavir kuram gami.
42004033	Ezɨma gumazir duar kurar itir mam, a God ko mɨgeir dɨpenimɨn aven iti. Egha a pamtem dia kamaghɨn mɨgei,
42004034	“Iesus, Nasaretɨn gumazim, nɨ manmaghɨra e damuasa ize? Nɨ e gasɨghasɨghasa izi? Kɨ nɨ gɨfo, nɨ God amadazimra, nɨ Godɨn damazimɨn zuezir gumazim!”
42004035	Ezɨma Iesus an atarava a mɨgei, “Nɨ nɨmɨra ikɨ! Eghɨva gumazim ateghɨva azenan izɨ!” Ezɨma duar kuram men damazibar gumazim akunigha azenimɨn izava duatam gumazim gatɨzir puvatɨ.
42004036	Ezɨ me bar aguaghfagha egha uarira uariv gei. “Eei, kar mɨgɨrɨgɨar manam? A mɨgɨrɨgɨar gavgavimɨn duar kuraba batoghezɨma da azenan izi.”
42004037	Ezɨma an amir bizir kaba, dar mɨgɨrɨgɨam bar nguibabar ghu.
42004038	Egha Iesus God ko mɨgeir dɨpenim ategha Saimonɨn dɨpenimɨn ghu. Ezɨ Saimonɨn asamim ariava mɨkarzim puvɨra feima, me an akuravaghasa Iesusɨn azai.
42004039	Ezɨ Iesus amizimɨn mɨn tugha aviraghava akar gavgavimɨn an arɨmariam batoghezɨma arɨmariam ghu. Ezɨ amizim zuamɨra dɨkavighava me bagha daghebagh amuava me ganɨdi.
42004040	Ezɨ aruem ghuaghirima, gumazamiziba me gumazir arɨmariar anabar avɨriba itiba Iesus bagha me inigha ize. Ezɨ a vaghvagha uan dafariba me gisɨn arɨzima me ghuamazi.
42004041	Ezɨ uaghan a duar kurabagh ami da gumaziba ataghragha azenan iza kamaghɨn dei, “Nɨ Godɨn Otarim!” Duar kuraba fo, kar God Gumazamiziba Ua Me Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim. Kamaghɨn amizɨma Iesus mɨkɨman dar anogoroke.
42004042	Ezɨ amɨnim tirazɨma Iesus danganir gumaziba puvatɨzimɨn ghu. Ezɨma gumazamiziba a buria ghuava a batogha, egha a me ategh mangan me an anogorosi.
42004043	Ezɨma a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “God akar aghuim kunasa na amada. Kamaghɨn amizɨma kɨ nguibar igharazibar uaghan dar mangɨ God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn akar aghuim akunam.”
42004044	Egha Judian Distrighɨn a God ko mɨgeir dɨpenibar akam akura ghuavɨra iti.
42005001	Dughiar mamɨn Iesus Genesaretɨn dɨpar akarer mɨriamɨn tughav itima, gumaziba anekuvagha Godɨn akam barasi.
42005002	Ezɨma a dɨpar mɨriamɨn garima osiriba isir gumazibar botɨn pumuning pura iti. Aningɨn ghuaviba uan iver ekiaba rue.
42005003	Ezɨ Iesus botɨn mamɨn ghuavanabo, Saimonɨn bot. Egha an azaragha ghaze, nɨ tong a gɨsɨvaghtɨma a dɨpar mɨriam atakigh. Ezɨ a bot gaperaghav ikia gumaziba ko amizibar sure gami.
42005004	Egha Iesus mɨkemegha gɨvagha Saimonɨn mɨgei, “Bot gɨsɨvagh dɨpar konimɨn mangɨva iver ekiaba osiriba bagh da akunigh.”
42005005	Ezɨ Saimon an akam ikara, “Ekiam, e dɨmagarir kamɨn ingara ghua bar osiritam inizir puvatɨ. Ezɨ nɨ mɨgeima kamaghɨn kɨ iver ekiaba akunam.”
42005006	Ezɨ me Iesus mɨkemezɨ moghɨn amigha, egha me osirir bar avɨriba inizɨma men iver ekiaba maghɨra akarasava ami.
42005007	Ezɨ me uan namakar botɨn igharazimɨn itiba me gikarizɨma me iza men akura, egha me iza botɨn pumuning uaghara aning gaghuizɨma aning bar izɨvagha osemegha maghɨra dɨpamɨn ghuaghiri.
42005008	Ezɨma Saimon Pita, ko a ko itir darasi, me osirir me inizir kabar ganigha kamaghɨn dɨgavir kuram gami. Saimonɨn roroamning Jems ko Jon, Sebedin otarimning. Aning Saimon ko ingarir gumazimning, aning uaghan dɨgavir kuram gami. Kamaghɨn amizɨma Saimon kamaghɨn ganigha, tevimning apɨrigha Iesusɨn suemningɨn boroghɨn irɨ. Egha ghaze, “Ekiam, kɨ gumazir arazir kurabagh amim! Kamaghɨn amizɨma nɨ na ategh mangɨ.” Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn Saimonɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ atiatingan markɨ, datɨrɨghɨn tugh mangɨ, nɨ gumaziba iniam.”
42005011	Ezɨ me uan botba mɨkɨrvegha, dɨpar dadarimɨn ghuavanega, egha biziba bar da ategha Iesusɨn gɨn zui.
42005012	Ezɨma Iesus nguibar ekiar mamɨn itima, gumazir mam lepa bar anegɨrizɨma, a izava oto. Egha a Iesusɨn apighava ira uan guam nguazim mɨtuaghava kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Ekiam, nɨ fueghɨva nɨ na damutɨ, kɨ Godɨn damazimɨn zuegh ua deragham.”
42005013	Ezɨ Iesus uan agharim isa gumazir kam gatɨgha ghaze, “Kɨ ifonge. Nɨn mɨkarzim zuegh, egh ua deragh.” Ezɨma lepa zuamɨra anetaki.
42005014	Egha Iesus akar gavgavim a ganɨngi, “Tavɨn mɨkɨman markɨ. Egh mangɨ, uabɨ Godɨn ofa gamir gumazimɨn akagh, egh Moses mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, nɨ uabɨ zueghsɨ ofa damu. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba fogh suam, nɨn arɨmariam gɨfa.”
42005015	Ezɨma Iesus amizir bizir kabar eghaghanim bar mar ghu. Kamaghɨn gumaziba ko amizir avɨrim a baraghɨva men arɨmariaba ua deraghasa izi.
42005016	Ezɨ Iesus zurara me ataghragha ghua, gumazamiziba itir puvatɨzir danganimɨn ikia God ko mɨgei.
42005017	Dughiar mamɨn Iesus gumaziba ko amizibar sure gami. Ezɨ Farisiba ko Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba, me Galilin Distrigh ko Judian Distrighɨn itir nguibaba bar, ko Jerusalemɨn nguibamɨn ikegha izava apiaghav iti. Ezɨ Ekiamɨn gavgavim uaghan iti, kamaghɨn Iesus men arɨmariabar amutɨma da deragham.
42005018	Ezɨ gumazir maba gumazir soroghafariba aremezim inighava akuriam gatɨghava a inigha dɨpenimɨn aven mangɨ Iesusɨn guamɨn anerɨghasa.
42005019	Ezɨ gumazamiziba bar avɨraseme. Ezɨma me aven mangan iburaghava dɨpenir siriamɨn ghuavanabogha dɨpenir siriamɨn torim gamigha benibar an akuriam dafagha, nɨmɨra anetaghrazima a ghuaghira gumazamizir okuruamɨn tongɨn Iesusɨn guamɨn anetɨ.
42005020	Ezɨma Iesus men nɨghnɨzir gavgavibar ganigha, egha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Namakam, nɨn arazir kuraba kɨ da gɨn amada.”
42005021	Ezɨma Farisiba ko Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba maghɨra uan navir averiabar aven nɨghnɨsi, “Kar gumazir manam Godɨn danganim iniasa mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam gami? Gumazir kɨnitam arazir kuraba gɨn amangam, o puvatɨ? God uabɨra.”
42005022	Ezɨ Iesus men nɨghnɨzibagh fogha, egha a men azara, “Ia tizim bagha bizir kabar uan navir averiabar dagh nɨghnɨsi?
42005023	Kɨ akar manam mɨkɨmam? Pura gumazir kɨnitam kamaghɨn mɨkɨm suam, kɨ nɨn arazir kuraba gɨn amada. Egh uaghan gumazir kɨnitam kamaghɨn mɨkɨman kogham suam, nɨ dɨkavigh mangɨ, egh ua deragh.
42005024	Kɨ arazir kam damightɨma, ia ganigh fogham, Gumazibar Otarim a nguazir kamɨn arazir kuraba gɨn amangamin gavgavim iti.” Egha kamaghɨn gumazir soroghafariba amɨrazim mɨgei, “Kɨ nɨ mɨgei, nɨ dɨkavigh uan akuriam inigh dɨpenimɨn mangɨ.”
42005025	Ezɨma a zuamɨra men damazibar dɨkavigha, irɨghav ikezir akuriam inigha uan nguibamɨn ghuava Godɨn ziam fe.
42005026	Ezɨ me bar dɨgavir kuram gamigha Godɨn ziam fe. Egha agorogem me gizɨvazɨ me kamaghɨn mɨgei, “E datɨrɨghɨn bizir bar igharagha garibar gari.”
42005027	Bizir kabar gɨn Iesus ghua garima gavmanɨn dagɨaba isir gumazir mam, an ziam Livai, a uan dagɨaba isir dɨpenim gaperaghav iti. Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nan gɨn izɨ.”
42005028	Ezɨ Livai dɨkavighava, biziba bar da ateghava an gɨn zui.
42005029	Egha Livai isar ekiam Iesus bagha uan dɨpenimɨn aneru. Ezɨma dagɨaba isir gumazir avɨrim ko gumazir maba sara izava me koma api.
42005030	Ezɨma Farisiba koma Judan arazibagh fozir gumazibar adarasi, me mɨgɨrɨgɨar mabar Iesusɨn suren gumazibagh ami, “Ia tizim bagha dagɨaba isir gumaziba ko arazir kurabagh amir gumaziba koma api?”
42005031	Ezɨ Iesus men akam ikara, “Arɨmariaba puvatɨzir gumaziba, dokta bagha zuir puvatɨ. Gumazir arɨmariaba itibara, me dokta bagha zui.
42005032	Kɨ Godɨn damazimɨn derazir gumaziba bagha izezir puvatɨ. Kɨ, gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amibar dɨmɨva men navibagh iraghasa, kɨ ize.”
42005033	Ezɨ me kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Jonɨn suren gumaziba, me zurara God ko mɨkɨmasa dagheba ataghrasi. Ezɨ Farisin suren gumaziba uakan. Ezɨ nɨnanaba apa mamaghɨra iti.”
42005034	Ezɨ Iesus men akam ikara, “Gumazir amuimɨn ikiamim, a ia ko ikɨtɨ, ia a bagha izezir gumazibav kɨmtɨ me dagheba ategham, o puvatɨgham?
42005035	Egh dughiam izɨtɨma gumazir amuimɨn ikiamim me me dama a inigh mangɨtɨma, eghtɨ dughiar kabar me dagheba ategham.”
