42016016	Egha Iesus ghua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Moses Osirizir Araziba koma Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar akam akura mamaghɨra ikia ghua Jonɨn dughiamɨn tu. Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn, Jon God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn akar aghuim kuri. Ezɨ gumaziba ko amiziba bar moghɨra dughiar kamɨn aven mangasa uari ghasaghasagha uari munakuri.
42016017	Nguazim koma overiam gɨvagham. Eghtɨ God osizirir arazibar akar otevitam, mɨseveghɨrɨghan kogham.
42016018	“Ezɨ nɨ gumazir manam uan amuim ategha amizir igharazimɨn ikɨva mati, nɨ amizir munamɨn mɨkarzim okeme. Ezɨ nɨ gumazir manam nɨ amizir me ikegha taghizimɨn iti, nɨ uaghan amizimɨn mɨkarzim okeme.”
42016019	Egha Iesus mɨgɨa ghua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Dughiar mam, gumazir dagɨaba avɨrasemezir mam iti. Egha a korotiar bar aghuir aghevim arugha dagher aghuiba ikia zurara isabagh amua da apa mamaghɨra iti.
42016020	Ezɨma an tiar akamɨn, gumazir puv biziba bagha azangsɨzir mam, duaba bar a gizɨvazɨma a irɨghav iti, an ziam Lasarus.
42016021	Egh gumazir dagɨaba avɨrasemezir kamɨn dagher oteviba dakozimɨn apengan suaghiriba, a dar amasa gara iti. Ezɨma afiaba uaghan izava an duaba ozɨsi.
42016022	“Ezɨ gumazir puv biziba bagha azangsɨzim aremeghamin dughiam otozɨma, an areme. Ezɨma enselba a inigha ghua Abrahamɨn mɨn anetɨ. Ezɨma gumazir dagɨaba avɨrasemezim uaghan aremezɨma me anefa.
42016023	Ezɨ a helɨn ikia mɨzazir kuram isi. Egha a kogha pɨn garava Abrahamɨn garima, a bar saghon itima Lasarus an mɨn iti.
42016024	Egha an Abrahamɨn dei, ‘Afeziam Abraham, nan apangkufigh. Kɨ mɨzazim isava avimɨn iti. Ezɨ bizir kam bagh Lasarus amadaghtɨma, a uan dafarir puzim dɨpam darugh nan mɨzem orangigh.’
42016025	“Ezɨma Abraham an dɨmdiam ikara, ‘Otarim, nɨ bizir kam ginɨrɨ, nɨ angamra itir dughiamɨn, nɨ bizir aghuiba iti. Ezɨ Lasarus bizir kuraba iti. Ezɨma a datɨrɨghɨn kagh deraghavɨra itima nɨ mɨzazir kuram isi.
42016026	Ezɨ ua bizir mam, ga ko no en tɨzimɨn ruzir konim e abɨki. Ezɨ te kagh ikegh nɨ bagh mangɨsɨ iburagham, o tina magh ikegh kagh izɨsɨ iburagham.’
42016027	“Ezɨ dagɨaba avɨrasemezir gumazim Abrahamɨn akam pamtemɨn a ikara, ‘Kɨ aveghbuar 5 pla iti. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Afeziam, kɨ pamtemɨn nɨn azangsɨsi, Lasarus amadaghtɨma a nan afeziamɨn dɨpenimɨn mangɨ. Egh me mɨkemeghtɨ, me kɨ itir nguibar mɨzaziba isir kamɨn izan markɨ.’
42016029	“Ezɨma Abraham an akam ikara, ‘Me Moses koma Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar osiziriba men iti. Ezɨ me men akaba baragh.’
42016030	“Ezɨma an Abraham mɨgei, ‘Puvatɨ, Afeziam. Gumazir ovengezitam ua dɨkavigh me bagh mangɨtɨma, me navibagh iragham.’
42016031	“Ezɨma Abraham kamaghɨn a mɨgei, ‘Me Moses koma Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar akaba baraghan koghtɨma, tav aremegh ua dɨkavigh izɨ, me mɨkɨmtɨma, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn an akabar ikian kogham.’”
42017001	Egha Iesus kamaghɨn uan suren gumazibav gei, “Bizir gumazamizibagh amima me arazir kurabagh amiba. da guizbangɨra izam. Ezɨ gumazir dagh ami da otivim, a bar kuvigham.
42017002	A ikɨva borir katam arazir kuratam an akagham, kamaghɨn ia a inighɨva dagɨam an fɨrim ikeghɨva a isɨ ongarim mɨkɨnightɨ, an aremeghtɨ, kamaghɨn deragham.
42017003	Kamaghɨn amizɨma ia deravɨra uari bagh gan. “Eghɨva nɨn aveghbuam arazir kuratam damightɨma, nɨ pamtem a mɨkɨm suam, nɨ da atakigh. Eghtɨ a navim gɨraghtɨma, nɨ an arazir kuraba gɨn amada.
42017004	Eghɨva a 7 plan dughiabar arazir kurabar nɨ damighɨva, egh 7 plan dughiabar uamategh nɨ bagh izɨ kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, ‘Kɨ navim gɨra,’ nɨ an arazir kuraba da gɨn amadagh.”
42017005	Ezɨ aposelba kamaghɨn Iesus mɨgei, “Nɨ en nɨghnɨzir gavgavim damightɨma an ekefegh!”
42017006	Ezɨma a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Egh ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavim suvigh zuravarim mastetɨn ovɨzitamɨn mɨn ikɨtɨma, ia temer kam mɨkɨm suam, ‘Nɨ uabɨ asighɨva egh biba sara mangɨva ongarimɨn uabɨ ekaragh,’ eghtɨ a ian akam baragham.”
42017007	Egha Iesus mɨgɨa ghua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ian tav ingangarir gumazitam an azenimɨn ingari o sipsipbar gari. Ingangarir gumazim azenibar ikegh izɨtɨma, eghtɨ a suam, nɨ izɨ daperagh damɨ? Puvatɨ. Ia kamaghɨn mɨgeir puvatɨ.
42017008	Gumazir dapanim kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, nɨ na bagh dagheba isamigh uan inim kegh da tuigh faragh na danightɨ kɨ dar amam, eghtɨ nɨ gɨn damɨ.
42017009	A ingangarir gumazim amizir bizir kaba bagha a mɨnabagham, o puvatɨgham? Puvatɨ.
42017010	Ezɨ ia uaghan, God damuasa ia mɨkemezir biziba bar dagh ami, egh suam, E pura ingangarir gumazir kuraba, ingangarir Ekiam e ganɨngiziba e pura dagh ami.”
42017011	Ezɨ Iesus Jerusalemɨn ghuava, Samaria koma Galilin Distrighɨn tɨzimɨn zui.
42017012	Ezɨ a nguibar mamɨn aven zuima, 10 pla lepa itir gumaziba a bato. Me mong saghon tuivighav ikiava,
42017013	tiarir arozimɨn an dei, “Iesus, Gumazir Ekiam, en apangkufigh.”
42017014	Ezɨma a men apighava, kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia mangɨva, uari isɨva Godɨn ofa gamir gumazibar akagh.” Ezɨma me me bagha ghua tuavir arɨzimɨn men mɨkarziba zuegha dera
42017015	Ezɨ men mav, uabɨn garima an arɨmariam gɨvazɨma a uamategha izava pamtemɨn Godɨn diava egha an ziam fe.
42017016	Egha Iesusɨn suemningɨn apengan irɨghava uan guam nguazim mɨtuaghava, Iesus a gamizir bizim bagha a mɨnaba. A Samarian gumazimra.
42017017	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn azara, “Ezɨ kɨ 10 plan gumazir kaba akɨris ti, o puvatɨ? Ezɨ 9 pla managh iti?
42017018	Ezɨ Judan gumazitam ua iza, a Godɨn ziam fe, o puvatɨ? Gumazir saghuiamɨn izezim uabɨra izava Godɨn ziam fe.”
42017019	Eghava a kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ dɨkavigh mangɨ. Nɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nɨ gamizɨma, nɨ dera.”
42017020	Dughiar mamɨn Farisin gumaziba Iesusɨn azara, “God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam mana dazoghɨn izam?” Ezɨma Iesus men akam ikara, “Ia orasi, God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn arazaraziba ia uan damazibar an ganighan kogham.
42017021	Eghtɨ gumazitam kamaghɨn mɨkɨman kogham suam, ‘A kara,’ o ‘A muna.’ Ezɨ God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam, a ian navir averiamɨn aven iti.”
42017022	Egha Iesus uan suren gumazibav gei, “Dughiam izɨtɨma nɨ Gumazibar Otarim izamin dughiam a bagh gansɨ damuva avegham.
42017023	Gumaziba ia mɨkɨmam, ‘Ara muna!’ o ‘Ara kara!’ Ezɨ ia fo, Gumazibar Otarim izamin dughiam an onɨmarimɨn mɨn taghtagham. Eghtɨma an angazangariba bar overiamɨn ruaghatevimning uagharam aningɨn tagham. Eghtɨ ia ivemarɨv men akaba gɨn mangan markɨ.
42017025	Egh a faragh bizir avɨriba bagh mɨzazim inigham. Eghtɨma datɨrɨghɨn dughiar kamɨn itir gumaziba an aghuagham.
42017026	“Ezɨ bizir Noan dughiamɨn otiviziba, da uaghan kamaghɨn Gumazibar Otarim izamin dughiamɨn otivam.
42017027	Gumazamiziba dagheba ko dɨpaba apava, uarir ikiava mamaghɨra ikia ghua, Noa uan kurimɨn ghuavanabozir dughiam. Ezɨma aperiam izava bar me kuavareme.
42017028	“Ezɨ Lotɨn dughiamɨn kamaghɨra, gumazamiziba dagheba ko dɨpaba apava, dagɨaba bagha biziba amagava, dagh ivezava, dagheba oparava dɨpenibar ingari.
42017029	Ezɨ Lot Sodom ataghizir dughiamɨn, avim koma dagɨar isiba amozimɨn mɨn overiamɨn ikegha suaghira izaghɨra bar moghɨra me kuavareme.
42017030	“Gumazibar Otarim azenimra izighramin dughiam biziba uaghan kamaghɨram otivam.
42017031	Eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn nɨ tina uan dɨpenimɨn avughsɨzir danganim ikɨva, egha uan biziba ataghizɨ da aven iti, nɨ da bagh magɨrɨ da inian markɨ. Kamaghɨra, tina azenibar iti, a bizir tam bagh nguibamɨn mangan markɨ.
42017032	Nɨ Lotɨn amuim gɨnɨghnɨgh!
42017033	Ezɨma tina uan mɨkarzim geghufi, an aremegham. Ezɨ tina na bagha uan mɨkarzim anataki, a gɨn deraghvɨra ikiam.
42017034	Kɨ ia mɨgei, dɨmagarir kamɨn taning uaning inigh mɨsiar vamɨra dakutɨma, God tav inighɨva tav ategham.
42017035	Eghtɨ amizir pumuning uaning inigh maziaba rɨghrɨghtɨma, God tav inighɨva tav ategham.”
42017037	Ezɨ me an azara, “Ekiam managhɨra?” Ezɨma a men akam ikara, “Gumazir kuaba managh iti naghɨn, taragiaba uari akuvagham.”
42018001	Egha Iesus akar isɨn zuir mamɨn uan suren gumazibav gei, egh men akaghtɨ, me zurara God ko mɨkɨm mamaghra ikiam. Egh amɨraghan markɨ.
42018002	Egha a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nguibar ekiar mamɨn aven jasɨn mam iti, a Godɨn atiatir puvatɨ. Egha gumazibagh nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ.
42018003	Ezɨ amuir odiarir mam uaghan nguibar ekiar kamɨn iti. Ezɨ gumazir mam pazava a gamua osɨmtɨziba a garɨsi. Ezɨ a jas bagha zurara izava a mɨgei, ‘Nɨ kotiamɨn nan akuragh.’
42018004	“Ezɨma dughiar avɨrir maba a bizitam gamizir puvatɨ. Eghava abuan a uabɨra uabɨ mɨgei, ‘Kɨ Godɨn atiatir puvatɨ. Egha kɨ gumazibagh nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ.
42018005	Ezɨ amuir odiarir kam dughiar avɨribar na bagha izi. Kɨ bar amɨra. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ ua bagh zuamɨra an osɨmtɨzim akɨrigham, eghtɨ a ua izɨ na damutɨma kɨ bar amɨraghan kogham!’”
42018006	Egha Iesus mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia jasɨn kuramɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨam baragh.
42018007	Ezɨ Godɨn inabaziba, me dɨmagariba ko aruebar a bagha araima, a men osɨmtɨziba bagha iza a da akɨram, o puvatɨgham? A me ataghraghtɨ me pura mangam? Bar puvatɨ.
42018008	Kɨ ia mɨgei, a men osɨmtɨzibar ganɨva, zuamɨra men akuragham. Kamaghɨn amizɨma, Gumazibar Otarim uamateghamin dughiamɨn, a gantɨ, nguazimɨn itir gumazamiziba nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikiam, o puvatɨ?”
42018009	Gumazir mabara uarira uan ziaba fava egha igharaz daraziv gɨa ghaze, me derazir puvatɨ. Ezɨ Iesus kamagh amir gumaziba bagh akar isɨn zuir kam gami,
42018010	“Gumazir pumuning God ko mɨkɨmasa Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn ghu, aningɨn mav Farisi, ezɨ mav dagɨaba isir gumazim.
42018011	Ezɨ Farisin gumazim dɨkavigha tugha uabɨra ua bagha God kamaghɨn a mɨgei, ‘Kɨ nɨ mɨnaba, kɨ gumazir mabar mɨn amir puvatɨ. Me biziba okɨava, arazir kurabagh amuava egha martiar amiziba okɨa me koma akui. Egha kɨ uaghan dagɨaba isi gumazir kamɨn mɨn amir puvatɨ.
42018012	Kɨ wighɨn vamɨran dughiar pumuningɨn nɨ ko mɨkɨmasa dagheba ataghrasi. Egha bizir kɨ isiba, kɨ tongɨra da tuiragha uaghan nɨ ganɨdi.’
42018013	Ezɨ dagɨaba isir gumazim mong munamaghɨn tu. Egha a kogha overiamɨn gari puvatɨgha uan evarim mɨsogha kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Kɨ gumazir kuram, God nɨ nan apangkufigh!’
42018014	Kamaghɨn amizɨma kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, gumazir dagɨaba isir kam, a Godɨn damazimɨn deragha egha dɨpenimɨn ghu. Ezɨ igharazim puvatɨ. Te uarira uan ziaba fe, God me abɨraghtɨ, me apengan ikiam. Eghtɨ te apengan iti, God me feghtɨ me ziar ekiaba iniam.”
42018015	Ezɨ gumazamiziba borir doziba Iesus dafarimning me darɨghasa, me inigha izi. Ezɨma an suren gumaziba kamaghɨn ganigha egha men atari.
42018016	Ezɨ Iesus borir dozibar diazɨ me a bagha zuima a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ tina God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn aven ikɨsɨ, borir dozir kabar mɨn ikɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨma borir doziba ateghtɨma me na bagh izɨ, egh men anogoroghan markɨ.
42018017	Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, gumazitam borir dozir kabar mɨn God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam inighan koghɨva, egh an aven mangan bar iburagham.”
42018018	Ezɨ Judabar gumazir dapanir mam Iesusɨn azara, “Tisan Aghuim, kɨ manmaghɨn damigh zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim iniam?”
42018019	Ezɨ Iesus an akam ikara, “Nɨ manmagh sua gumazir aghuim na garɨsi? Gumazir aghuitam itir puvatɨ. God uabɨra gumazir aghuimra.
42018020	Nɨ God Moses ganɨngizir arazim gɨfo, ‘Nɨ gumazim mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghan markɨ, nɨ poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim damuam markɨ, nɨ gumazir igharazimɨn biziba okɨman markɨ, nɨ bizibagh ifaran markɨ, nɨ ua bagh biziba inisɨ gumazibagh ifaran markɨ, nɨ uan afeziam ko amebamɨn apengan ikɨ aningɨn akaba baragh.’”
42018021	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn Iesus mɨgei, “Kɨ fomɨram aghɨrimra ikiava arazir kabagh amua iza datɨrɨghɨn ikia kati.”
42018022	Ezɨma Iesus kamaghɨn oregha, egha a mɨgei, “Nɨ bizir vamɨra nɨ tɨghar a damuam. Bizir nɨ itiba bar da amangighɨva dagɨaba inigh, egh gumazir biziba puvatɨzibar anɨngigh. Egh nɨ Godɨn Nguibamɨn bizir aghuariba iniam. Egh, nan gɨn izɨ.”
42018023	A biziba bar avɨraseme, kamaghɨn amizɨma, a Iesusɨn akam baregha bar oseme.
42018024	Ezɨ Iesus an gara egha a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Gumazir biziba avɨrasemeziba, me God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn mangɨsɨ bar iburagham!
42018025	Kamelɨn tam iniba isair dɨkonir torimɨn aven mangɨsɨ ingangarir dafam damigh aven mangam. Eghtɨ gumazir biziba avɨrasemeziba, me God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn mangɨsɨ guizbangɨra bar iburagham!”
42018026	Ezɨ marazi kamaghɨn oregha an azara, “Kamaghɨn damightɨma, tinara zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuir kam iniam?”
42018027	Ezɨ Iesus me ikara, “Bizir kaba gumazimɨn bar osemegham. Bizir kaba Godɨn osemezir puvatɨ. A biziba bar dagh ami.”
42018028	Ezɨ Pita a mɨgei, “Nɨ ge, e bizir e itiba bar da ategha, nɨn gɨn ize.”
42018029	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, gumazitam God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam bagha uan dɨpenim, o uan amuim, o aveghbuaba, o ameboghfeziaba, o boriba ataki,
42018030	egh datɨrɨghɨn itir dughiar kamɨn God bizir avɨriba me faragha inizir bizibagh afiragh me danɨngam. Egh dughiar gɨn otivamim me zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim iniam.”
42018031	Egha Iesus 12 plan suren gumaziba inighava me uarira ikiava a me mɨgei, “Ia oragh! E nguibar ekiam Jerusalemɨn ghuavanadi. Eghtɨ Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba, Gumazibar Otarimɨn gun mɨkemezir osizirir biziba bar, guizbangɨra otogham.
42018032	Eghtɨ me a isɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazibar dafaribar arɨgham. Eghtɨ me a dɨpova a mɨkɨmam. Egh aghumsɨzir arazibar a damuam. Egh a giparɨva, eghɨva a ifozoregh egh a mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham.
42018033	Eghtɨ dughiar mɨkezim a ua dɨkavigham.”
42018034	Ezɨma an suren gumaziba bizir katam gɨfozir puvatɨ, a bizir tizim mɨgei. Dar mɨngarim men monge, ezɨ me bar fozir puvatɨ.
42018035	Egha Iesus Jerikon boroghɨra izima, gumazir damazir kurar mam tuavir mɨriamɨn aperaghav ikia biziba bagha azangsɨsi.
42018036	Egha an orazima gumazamizir avɨrim iza zuima, a men azara, kar tizim.
42018037	Ezɨ me a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nasaretɨn gumazim Iesus iza zui.”
42018038	Ezɨ a dia mɨgei, “Iesus, Devitɨn Otarim, nɨ nan apangkufigh!”
42018039	Ezɨ faragha zuiba me an atarava egha a mɨgɨa ghaze, nɨ nɨmɨra ikɨ. Ezɨ a bar pamtem dia mɨgei, “Devitɨn ovavim, nɨ nan apangkufigh!”
42018040	Ezɨ Iesus tugha akar gavgavim gumazibav gɨa ghaze, “Gumazir munam inigh na bagh izɨ.” Ezɨ a roghɨra izima, Iesus an azara,
42018041	“Kɨ tizim nɨ bagha a damuasa, nɨ ifonge?” Ezɨ an a ikara, “Ekiam, kɨ ganasa ifonge.”
42018042	Ezɨ Iesus a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ gan. Nɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nɨn akurazɨ, nɨ dera.”
42018043	Ezɨ a zuamɨra gari. Egha Iesusɨn gɨn ghua Godɨn ziam fe. Ezɨma gumazamiziba an ganigha, me uaghan Godɨn ziam fe.
42019001	Ezɨ Iesus Jerikon nguibamɨn ghuava, aneteghasa tuavimɨn zui.
42019002	Gumazir mam nguibar kamɨn iti, an ziam Sakius. A dagɨaba isir gumazibar gumazir dapanim, a dagɨaba bar avɨraseme.
42019003	A Iesusɨn ganasa, a manmaghɨra garir gumazim. Sakius bar gumazir otevim, egha gumazamizir avɨrimɨn tongɨn iti. Egha kamaghɨn a Iesusɨn garir puvatɨ.
42019004	A fo, Iesus tuavir kamra izam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a ivegha faragha ghua, Iesusɨn ganasa temer fighɨn ghuavanabo.
42019005	Ezɨ Iesus danganir kamɨn oto. Egha kogha temer kam gisɨn gara, kamaghɨn Sakiusɨn mɨgei, “Sakius nɨ zuamɨra izighirɨ. Datɨrɨghɨn kɨ nɨn dɨpenimɨn ikiam.”
42019006	Ezɨ a zuamɨra izaghrɨghava, bar akonge. Egha Iesus inigha uan dɨpenimɨn zui.
42019007	Ezɨ gumaziba bar an ganigha, egha me kamaghɨn mɨgɨava ngavamadi, “A ghua gumazir kuramɨn dɨpenimɨn iti.”
42019008	Me dɨpenimɨn ikiava, Sakius tughava, kamaghɨn Ekiam mɨgei, “Ekiam, Nɨ oragh! Datɨrɨghɨn kɨ uan biziba bar da tuiragham. Egh taba kɨ gumazir biziba puvatɨzibar anɨngam. Egh kɨ gumazir tam gifaraghɨva, an bizitam okemeghɨva, kɨ datɨrɨghɨn uamategh bizir pumuning ko pumuning a danɨngam.”
42019009	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Gumazir kam a uaghan Abrahamɨn ovavim. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, datɨrɨghɨn God dɨpenir kamɨn gumazamiziba bar men akura.
42019010	Gumazibar Otarim, gumazir ovengeziba bagha ruiava men akurvaghasa ize.”
42019011	Gumazamiziba ikia Iesus barazima, a mɨgei. A Jerusalemɨn boroghɨn itima, me ghaze, datɨrɨghɨra God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam otogham. Kamaghɨn amizɨma, an akar isɨn zuir mam me mɨgei.
42019012	A kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Gumazir aruar mam nguibar saghuiamɨn mangasa, eghtɨ me a damightɨma an atrivimɨn ikiam. A gɨn uamategh uan nguibamɨn izeghɨva, men ganam.
42019013	A mangasa, a uan ingangarir gumazir 10 plan diagha, 20 kina, 20 kina bar moghɨra me rome. Egha kamaghɨn me mɨgei, ‘Ia dagɨar kaba inighɨva uari bagh dagɨar ingangaribar amu ikɨtɨ, kɨ uamategham.’
42019014	“An apengan itir gumaziba me bar navir kuram an iti. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me akam inigha zuir gumaziba amadazɨma me nguibar gumazir aruam ghuzɨmɨn ghu. Me kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘E gumazir kam en atrivimɨn otivan, e aghua.’
42019015	Ezɨ gumazir igharaziba gumazir aruar kam a gamizɨma an atrivimɨn otogha, egha gɨn uamatenge. A uamategha izegha, kamaghɨn me mɨgei, ‘Gumazir kɨ fomɨra dagɨaba anɨngiziba, men diagh. Kɨ foghasa me manmaghɨn nan dagɨabagh isɨn dagɨaba ini.’
42019016	“Ezɨma gumazir faragha zuim iza kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Ekiam, kɨ nɨn 20 kinan kamɨn dagɨar ingangarim gamighava a gisɨn 200 kina ini.’
42019017	Ezɨ atrivim kamaghɨn a mɨgei, ‘Nɨ nan ingangarir gumazir aghuim, egha nɨ ingangarir bar aghuim gami. Nɨ bar deraghvɨra bizir muziarim gami, kamaghɨn kɨ datɨrɨghɨn bizir ekiam nɨ danightɨma, nɨ nguibar ekiar 10 plan ganam.’
42019018	“Ezɨma ingangarir gumazir igharazim iza mɨgei, ‘Ekiam, kɨ nɨn 20 kinan kamɨn dagɨar ingangarim gamigha datɨrɨghɨn a gisɨn 100 kina ini.’
42019019	Ezɨ atrivim a mɨgei, ‘Kɨ nɨ atɨghtɨ nɨ nguibar ekiar 5 plan ganam.’
42019020	“Ezɨ ingangarir gumazir mɨkezim iza mɨgei, ‘Ekiam nɨn 20 kina ikia kati. Kɨ a isa inir avɨzimɨn a nomkezɨma, a kati.
42019021	Kɨ nɨ gɨfo, nɨ gumazir atarim. Gumazir igharaziba amir biziba, nɨ pura da isi. Egha dagher me opariziba, nɨ uaghan pura da isi. Kamaghɨn kɨ nɨn atiati.’
42019022	“Ezɨma atrivim kamaghɨn ingangarir gumazim mɨgei, ‘Nɨ ingangarir gumazir kuram! Nɨn akamra kɨ nɨ tuisɨgham. Nɨ kamaghɨn na gɨnɨghnɨsi, kɨ ti gumazir atarim. Egha kɨ gumazir igharaziba amir biziba, kɨ ti pura da isi. Egha dagher me opariba, kɨ ti uaghan pura da isi?
42019023	Manmaghɨn amizɨma, nɨ nan dagɨaba benk gatɨzɨ puvatɨ, eghtɨ kɨ uamategh izɨva ua da iniva dagɨataba a gisɨn ua da iniam?’
42019024	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn an boroghɨn tuivighav itir gumazibav gei, ‘Ia ada 20 kina inighɨva gumazir 200 kina itim danɨngigh.’
42019025	Me kamaghɨn a mɨgei, ‘Ekiam, a 200 kina inigha gɨfa.’
42019026	“Ezɨma a ghaze, ‘Kɨ ia mɨgei! Gumazitam bizir taba ikɨtɨ, kɨ avɨritaba uam a danigham. Eghtɨ gumazitam biziba puvatɨghɨva, eghtɨ bizir muziarim a itim, kɨ ada da inigham.
42019027	Nan apaniba, kɨ men atrivimɨn ikian me nan aghua, ia me inigh kagh izɨva nan damazimɨn me mɨsueghtɨ me arɨmɨghregh.’”
42019028	Iesus akar isɨn zuim gamigha gɨvagha, uan darorim gamua tuavir Jerusalemɨn ghuzim ghuavanadi.
42019029	Iesus Betfage ko Betanin boroghɨn oto, mɨghsɨam Oliv gisɨn. Egha uan suren gumazir pumuning amaga,
42019030	kamaghɨn aningɨn mɨgei, “Gua nguibar munagh itimɨn mangɨ. Gua nguibar kamɨn mangɨ gantɨma donkin igiar mam me a ikezɨma, a iti. Gumazitam dughiatamɨn a gaperaghava aruizir puvatɨ. Gua an benim fɨrighɨva donki inigh kagh izɨ.
42019031	Tav kamaghɨn guan azaragham, ‘Gua tizim bagha donkin kam fɨri?’, eghtɨ gua suam, ‘Ekiam ingangarim an iti.’”
42019032	Egha Iesus aning amadazɨma aning ghua garima, biziba bar moghɨra Iesus mɨkemezɨ moghɨn iti.
42019033	Ezɨ aning donkin benim fɨrima, an ghuaviba aningɨn azara, “Gua tizim bagha donkin benim fɨri?”
42019034	Ezɨma aning kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Ekiam ingangarim an iti.”
42019035	Egha aning donki inigha Iesus bagha izi. Egha aning uan azenan azuir korotiar ruariba donki gisɨn da ghuani. Egha aning Iesusɨn akurazɨma a donki gisɨn apera.
42019036	A donki gaperagha zuima, gumazamiziba uan korotiar ruariba suava tuavim mɨghuari.
42019037	A iza danganir tuavir Olivɨn mɨghsɨamɨn ghuaghirimɨn boroghɨn izima, an gɨn aruir darazi me God amizir mirakelbar ganighava da bagha bar akongegha pamtem Godɨn ziam fe.
42019038	Me kamaghɨn araghasi, “God uan ziamɨn atrivim amada! God deravɨra a damu! Navir amɨrizim Godɨn Nguibamɨn iti. Ia Godɨn ziam fɨ!”
42019039	Ezɨ Farisin marazi gumazamizir kabar tongɨn ikia, kamaghɨn Iesusɨn mɨgei, “Tisa, nɨ uan suren gumazibav kɨmtɨma, me nɨmɨra ikɨ! Me kamaghɨn mɨkɨman markɨ!”
42019040	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ ia mɨgei, me nɨmɨra ikɨtɨma dagɨaba uari araghasam!”
42019041	Iesus Jerusalemɨn boroghɨra iza, egha an gara a bagha azi.
42019042	Egha a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Jerusalem, kɨ kamagh sua, nɨ amua datɨrɨghɨn navir amɨrizɨmɨn bizibagh foghai. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a datɨrɨghɨn nɨn modo.
42019043	Dughiam izɨtɨ, eghtɨ nɨn apaniba nguazir dɨvazim ingarightɨ, a nɨ arughtɨma, nɨ arɨmangɨghan kogham.
42019044	Eghɨva nɨ Jerusalem me nɨn borir nɨn aven itiba sarama asɨghasigham. Nɨ Godɨn dughiar nɨn akuraghasa izezim, nɨ a gɨfozir puvatɨ. Bizir kam bagh dɨpenimɨn ingarizir dagɨatam, me aneteghtɨ, a tam gisɨn keghan kogham.”
42019045	Egha a Godɨn Dɨpenir avɨzimɨn aven ghuava, biziba amadiba me batosi.
42019046	A kamaghɨn mɨgei, “God fomɨra Aisaian akɨnafarimɨn aven kamaghɨn osiri, ‘Nan dɨpenim God ko mɨgeir dɨpenimra, ezɨ ia a gamizɨma, an okɨmakɨar gumaziba modir danganimɨn mɨn oto.’”
42019047	A zurara Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven men sure gami. Ezɨma ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba ko Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba ko gumazir dapaniba, me a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghasa.
42019048	Ezɨ gumazamiziba a baraghasa bar ifongegha, bar an boroghɨn iti. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, an apaniba a mɨsoghan ibura.
42020001	Dughiar mamɨn Iesus Godɨn Dɨpenir avɨzimɨn aven ikiava, gumazamizibar sure gamuava akar aghuim akuri. Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba, koma Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba, ko Judan gumazir aruaba, me izava anekufa.
42020002	Egha me kamaghɨn mɨgei, “E mɨkemegh, nɨ gavgavir manamɨn bizir kabagh ami? Tina gavgavir kam nɨ ganɨngi?”
42020003	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn men akam ikara, “Kɨ uaghan azangsɨzitam ia damuasa. Ia na mɨkɨm, Jonɨn rurim, a Godɨn ize o gumazibar ize?”
42020005	Ezɨ me uarira uariv gei, “E suam, ‘An rurim Godɨn ize,’ eghtɨ, a kamaghɨn mɨkɨm suam, ‘Ia manmaghɨn amigha ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Jon damuan aghua?’
42020006	E suam, ‘An rurim gumazibar ize,’ eghtɨ gumaziba dagɨabar e ginivightɨma, e arɨghregham. Me kamaghɨn fo Jon a Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim.”
42020007	Egha me Iesus ikara, “E fozir puvatɨ, Jonɨn rurim manmaghɨn ize.”
42020008	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kamaghɨra, kɨ uan gavgavim inizir tuavimɨn, gun ia mɨkemeghan kogham.”
42020009	Egha Iesus mɨgɨavɨra ikia akar isɨn zuir kam gumazamizibav gei, “Gumazir mam wainɨn azenim oparigha, egha azenimɨn garir gumazir mabar dafarim garɨgha ghaze, me gɨn a givezam. Egha a ghua dughiar ruarimɨn saghon iti.
42020010	Egha wainɨn ovɨziba kuarir dughiamɨn a ingangarir gumazir mam amadagha ghaze, me wainɨn ovɨzir andɨzir taba a danɨngam. Ezɨ azenimɨn garir gumaziba a mɨsueghava anemadazɨma, a dafaribara uamatenge.
42020011	Ezɨ a ingangarir gumazir igharazim amada, ezɨ me uaghan a mɨsuegha aghumsɨzir arazibar a gamigha, anemadazɨ a dafaribara uamatenge.
42020012	Ezɨ a ua mɨkezim amadazɨ, me bar puv a mɨsuegha a isa azenim mɨkɨni.
42020013	“Ezɨ wainɨn azenir ghuavim uabɨra uabɨ mɨgei, ‘Kɨ manmaghɨn damuam? Kɨ uan otarir ifongezim amangam. Eghtɨ me ti a mɨsueghan kogham.’
42020014	Ezɨ wainɨn azenimɨn garir gumaziba otarir kamɨn ganigha, kamaghɨn uariv gɨa ghaze, ‘Kar otarir gɨn azenir kam iniamim. E a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeka. Eghtɨ wainɨn azenir kam enanam.’
42020015	Egha me a isa azenim mɨkɨnigha a mɨsoghezɨma an areme.” Egha Iesus ghua kamaghɨn gumazamizibav gei, “Wainɨn azenir ghuavim manmaghɨra azenimɨn garir gumazir kabar amuam?
42020016	A izɨva azenimɨn garir gumazir kabav soghtɨ, me arɨmɨghiram. Eghtɨ a wainɨn azenim isɨva igharazibar anigam.” Ezɨ gumazamiziba bizir kam baregha mɨgei, “Bar puvatɨgham!”
42020017	Ezɨ Iesus merara gara ghuava azara, “Ezɨ Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir kam, an mɨngarim manmakɨn? ‘Kar dɨpenir akɨnir ingangarir gumaziba aghuazim, a datɨrɨghɨn dɨpenim aterir guarim gava?’
42020018	Nɨ tina temer guarir kam gisɨn irɨghɨva dɨpɨrigh irɨgham, eghtɨ a tina gisɨn irɨghtɨma gumazir kam bar mɨsarighregham.”
42020019	Ezɨ Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba, ko ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba Iesus bar kaghɨram an suighasa tuaviba buri. Me fo, an akar isɨn zuir kam me gasara, ezɨ me an suighan gumazamizibar atiati.
42020020	Egha me bar deravɨra a bagha garava, egha moga garir gumaziba amadazɨ, me ifara mati me guizɨn mɨgei. Me kamagh sua, me Iesusɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevitamɨn an suiraghɨva, egh a isɨ Romɨn gavmanɨn gumazir ekiam danigam.
42020021	Ezɨ moga garir gumazir kaba an azangsɨsi, “Tisa, e fo nɨ bizir aghuibav gɨava sure gamuava, ziabagh nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ. Nɨ gumazamiziba Godɨn arazibar mɨrara guizbangɨra men sure gami.
42020022	Nɨ e mɨkɨm. E gavmanɨn dagɨaba Sisar danɨngam, o puvatɨgham?”
42020023	Ezɨ a men nɨghnɨzir ifavaribagh fogha, egha a me mɨgei, “Dagɨatam nan akagh. Tinan nedazim ko ziam an iti?”
42020025	Ezɨ me kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Sisarɨn ziam koma nedazim an iti.” Ezɨ a me mɨgei, “Kamaghɨra ia Sisarɨn biziba Sisar danɨngɨva, Godɨn biziba isɨ, God danɨng.”
42020026	Ezɨ me gumazamizibar tongɨn, a mɨkemezir mɨgɨrɨgɨaba bagha an suighan ibura. Egha me purama an mɨgɨrɨgɨabagh nɨghnɨghava nɨmɨra iti.
42020027	Sadyusin maba azangsɨzir mam sara Iesus bagha ize. (Me kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, aremeziba ua dɨkavan kogham.)
42020028	Egha me Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Tisa, Moses e bagha akɨnafarim osira ghaze, gumazitamɨn aveghbuam amuimɨn ikɨva boriba puvatɨghɨva aremeghtɨ, anarɨra irir aveghbuam an amuir odiarimɨn ikɨva a bagh boriba iniam.
42020029	Ezɨ 7-plan aveghbuaba iti. Egha men mav faragha amuimɨn ikia boriba puvatɨgha areme.
42020030	Ezɨ anarɨra irim an ikia kamaghɨra, ezɨ mɨkezim kamaghɨra ghu. Kamaghɨra, 7 plan aveghbuaba bar ariaghregha, me boriba puvatɨ.
42020032	Abuan amizir kam uaghan areme.
42020033	Fomɨra me bar amizir kamɨn ike. Kamaghɨn a ua dɨkavamin dughiamɨn, a tinan amuim gavagham?”
42020034	Ezɨ Iesus men akam ikara, “Dughiar kamɨn gumaziba ko amiziba me poroghamibagh ami.
42020035	Eghtɨ gumazamizir God inabaziba, me uaghan dughiar izamim ko ua dɨkavamin dughiam, me poroghamibar amuan kogham.
42020036	God me damightɨma, me ua dɨkavigham. Me ua dɨkavightɨ e fogh suam me Godɨn boribara, egh me enselbar mɨn ikiam. Kamaghɨn me uam arɨmɨghɨran koghɨva, egh kamaghɨn me poroghamibar amuan kogham.
42020037	Ezɨ Moses uabɨ temer avimɨn eghaghanimɨn aven en aka, aremeziba ua dɨkavam. A kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Ekiam, Nɨ Abraham ko Aisak ko Jekopɨn God.’
42020038	Kamaghɨn e fo, God aremezibar God puvatɨ, a gumazir angamra itibar God. Ezɨma an damazimɨn an boriba bar angamra iti.”
42020039	Ezɨ Judan arazibagh fozir gumazir maba kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Mar mɨgɨrɨgɨar aghuim, Tisa.”
42020040	Egha me uam an azangsɨghan atiati.
42020041	Ezɨ Iesus gumazamiziba kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Manmaghɨn amizɨ gumazamiziba ghaze, God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim Krais, a Devitɨn ovavim?
42020042	Devit uabɨ Ighiabar Akɨnafarimɨn aven mɨkeme, ‘Ekiam, nan Ekiam kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nan agharir guvimɨn amadaghan daperagh.
42020043	Egh mangɨ dughiar kɨ nɨn apaniba, me damutɨma me nɨn apengan ikiamim.” ’
42020044	Egha Devit ‘Ekiam’ a gatɨ. Manmaghɨn amizɨ, a Devitɨn ovavim?”
42020045	Ezɨ gumazamiziba orazima a uan suren gumaziba kamaghɨn me mɨgei,
42020046	“Ia Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba bagh gan. Me uari fava korotiar ruarir kaba aghuraruasa ifonge. Ezɨ gumazamiziba maketɨn danganimɨn men ziaba fasa me bar akonge. Egha God ko mɨgeir dɨpenir averiamɨn dabirabir aghuariba iniva, egha isar ekiabar dughiabar me danganir ziaba itiba iniasa bar ifonge.
42020047	Me amuir odiaribagh ifara, men dɨpeniba okɨa, ghaze e dera. Egha gumaziba men ziaba fasa, egha me God ko mɨgɨa mɨgɨrɨgɨar ruaribagh ami. Kamaghɨn amir gumaziba, men ivezir kuram gumazir arazir kurabagh amibar ivezim bar a gafiragham.”
42021001	Ezɨ Iesus damazimning fegha garima dagɨaba itir gumaziba uan dagɨaba isa Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn dagɨaba arɨzir danganim garɨsi.
42021002	Ezɨ a garima dagɨaba puvatɨzir amizir pam aremezir mam uaghan uan dagɨar muziarimning, atɨ.
42021003	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, biziba puvatɨzir amuir odiarir kam dagɨar muziarir pumuning dagɨaba arɨzir danganim gatɨ, ezɨ an dagɨar pumuning gumazir igharaziba arɨghɨzir dagɨabagh afira.
42021004	Me uan dagɨar avɨribar amodoghɨn dagɨar muziariba anɨngi. Ezɨma a uan dabirabir onganarazimɨn mɨrara dagɨar muziarir abuananamning atɨ.”
42021005	Ezɨma an suren gumazir maba Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn garava kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Me dagɨar bar aghuibar an ingarighava, Afeziar Ekiam danɨngamin bizir aghuir maba an kuruke.”
42021006	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia datɨrɨghɨn garir bizir kabanagh, dughiam izɨtɨma dagɨar kaba, gumaziba bar da pueghtɨ da bar moghɨra daghregham. Eghtɨ tam tam gisɨn ikeghan kogham.”
42021007	Ezɨ me an azara, “Tisa, bizir kaba manadɨzoghɨn otivam? Eghtɨ arazir manam faragh otoghtɨma, e fogh suam, dughiar kam roghɨra ize?”
42021008	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia uari bagh deraghvɨra gan, ia men ifavariba baraghan markɨ. Gumazir avɨriba nan ziamɨn izɨva suam, ‘Kɨrara!’ ezɨ, ‘Dughiam roghɨra ize!’ Men gɨn mangan markɨ.
42021009	Egh ia inogoviba ko adoghadozir mɨdorozir akaba baraghɨva, atiatingan markɨ. Bizir kabanagh faragh otivigham, eghtɨma nguazir kam gɨvamin dughiam datɨrɨghɨra otoghan kogham.”
42021010	Egha a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Nguibaba uarira uariv soghtɨma, dakoziba uarira uariv sogham.
42021011	Eghtɨ mɨkɨmkɨzir gavgaviba, koma dagheba otevir dughiaba koma arɨmariar gavgaviba nguibar tabar otivtɨma, atiatingamin biziba koma overiamɨn pɨn arazarazir ekiaba otivam.
42021012	“Eghtɨ bizir kaba gɨn otivam, me faragh ian suiraghɨva arazir kurabar ia damuam. Me ia kotiam darɨghsɨ ia inighɨva God ko mɨgeir dɨpeniba koma kalabuziabar aven mangam. Eghtɨma ia nan gɨn zuir gumaziba me bizir kam bangɨn ia inighɨva atriviba koma gavmanɨn gumazir ekiabar damazimɨn mangam.
42021013	Eghtɨ kar dughiar aghuir ia nan akam me mɨkɨnamim.
42021014	Eghtɨ ia deraghvɨra nɨghnɨgh. Ia faragh me mɨkɨmsɨ akabagh nɨghnɨghan markɨ.
42021015	Eghtɨ kɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuiba koma mɨgɨrɨgɨar aghuiba ia danɨngtɨma, ia mɨgɨrɨgɨar aghuibara damutɨma, ian apanitam ian akaba batoghɨva ia adoghan kogham.
42021016	“Eghtɨ ian ameboghfeziaba, ko aveghbuaba, ko anababa, ko namakaba merara, ia inighɨva gumazir kurabar dafaribar atɨghtɨ, me ian taraziv soghtɨ ia arɨmɨghregham.
42021017	Eghtɨ gumazamiziba bar nan ziam bangɨn ian aghuagham.
42021018	Egh me bar tong arazitam ia damuan kogham. Kamaghɨn ian dapanarɨzitam asighɨran kogham.
42021019	Ia tugh gavgavighvɨra ikɨva, dabirabir bar aghuim iniam.”
42021020	Egha Iesus ghua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ Jerusalemɨn nguibamɨn gantɨma mɨdorozir gumaziba izɨva a kontɨma, nɨ fogham a gasɨghasɨghamɨn dughiam roghɨra ize.
42021021	Egh gumazir Judian itiba arɨ mɨghsɨabar mangɨtɨma, Jerusalemɨn nguibamɨn itiba azenan mangɨtɨma, Jerusalemɨn azenan itir gumaziba uam an aven mangan markiam.
42021022	Kar osɨmtɨzibar dughiam, God da isɨva Israelbar anɨngɨva, men arazir kuraba ikarvagham. A fomɨra osirizir moghɨn otogham.
42021023	Aiee! Amizir naviba adaiba koma oteba boribagh anɨdiba dughiar izamiba bar men osemegham! Eghtɨma God gumazir kabar atartɨma, osɨmtɨzir ekiam nguazir kam bativam.
42021024	Eghtɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba mɨsozir sababar tarazigh inivtɨma me arighɨrɨtɨ, me tarazi suighɨva, me amangtɨma me nguibar Israelɨn azenan itibar mangam. Eghtɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumaziba Jerusalem bar pazɨva an itir bizibar amu mangɨ dughiar me Jerusalemɨn ganamin dughiam gɨvagham.”
42021025	Egha Iesus ghua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Eghtɨ arazaraziba aruem ko iakinim ko mɨkoveziba bativam. Eghtɨ ongarim dɨpɨr tɨngaghɨvɨra ikɨtɨma nguazimɨn gumazamiziba bar atiatigh okam nɨghnɨgham.
42021026	Eghtɨ overiamɨn biziba bar nɨgham, kamaghɨn gumaziba atiatingɨva damaziba men isirtɨma me daighirɨva, egh me otivamin biziba bagh mɨzuamɨva nɨghnɨgham.
42021027	Egh me dughiar kamɨn Gumazibar Borimɨn gantɨ, a ghuariamɨn tongɨn gavgavim ko angazangarir ekiam sara izam.
42021028	Eghtɨ bizir kabanagh otivighrɨtɨma ia dɨkavigh, uan dapaniba fegh gan! God ua ia iniamin dughiam roghɨra ize!”
42021029	Egha Iesus kamaghɨn akar isɨn zuimɨn me mɨgei, “Ia temer fighɨn ganɨva temer maba sara gan.
42021030	Temeba dafariba asitɨma ia fogham, aruem ganamin dughiam roghɨra ize.
42021031	Kamaghɨra ia bizir kabar gan fogh suam, God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam roghɨra ize.
42021032	“Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei dughiar kamɨn itir gumazamizir kaba ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨ bizir kaba bar otivam.
42021033	Overiam ko nguazim gɨvagham, eghtɨ nan mɨgɨrɨgɨaba gɨvaghan kogham.”
42021034	Egha Iesus ghua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia uari bagh ganigh! Isaba ko, dɨpar onganiba ko nguazir kamɨn biziba, ia puv dagh nɨghnɨghtɨ, da ia dɨkabɨntɨ, dughiar otivamin kam puram otoghɨva, mati asɨzibar azuazimɨn mɨn ian suigham.
42021035	Eghtɨ dughiar kam nguibaba koma nguazir kamɨn gumaziba bar me bativam.
42021036	Ia zurara uari bagh gan Afeziam ko mɨkɨmvɨra ikɨtɨma, a gavgavim ia danɨngtɨma ia bizir otivamin kabagh itavragham. Egh ia Gumazibar Otarimɨn damazimɨn tuivam.”
42021037	Egha dughiabar zurara Iesus, Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven men sure gamuava, guaratɨzibar Olivɨn mɨghsɨamɨn ghuava dɨmagaribar an iti.
42021038	Ezɨ gumaziba bar Iesus baraghasa, mɨzarazibar Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn arui.
42022001	Datɨrɨghɨn Yis Puvatɨzir Bretɨn Isam Damuamin Dughiam roghɨra izi. An ziam, God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiam.
42022002	Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba, ko Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba, me gumazibar atiatighava, kamaghɨn me Iesusɨn mɨsoghasa tuaviba buri.
42022003	Iesusɨn 12-plan gumazir mam Judas, an ziar mam Iskariot. Satan an navir averiamɨn ghu. Ezɨ a Iesus isava Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn garir gumazir ekiaba, ko ofa gamir gumazir ekiabar dafaribar arɨghasa ghua me koma mɨgɨrɨgɨabagh ami.
42022005	Ezɨ me an mɨgɨrɨgɨam gifuegha ivezim a danɨngasa, akabar kɨri.
42022006	Ezɨ Judas ivezim inian ifuegha Iesus isɨva men dafaribar arɨghasa tuaviba buri. A ghaze, Iesus uabɨra ikɨtɨ, an an suiragh men dafarim darɨgham.
42022007	Yis Puvatɨzir Bretɨn Isam Damuamin Dughiam datɨrɨghɨn oto. Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn me God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiamɨn isam bagha sipsipɨn nguzim mɨsuegh anemɨ ikɨva, a gɨnɨghnɨghasa.
42022008	Ezɨ Iesus Jon koma Pita amadagha kamaghɨn aning mɨgɨa ghaze, “Gua mangɨva e God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiamɨn isam ramamin daghebar kɨr.”
42022009	Ezɨ aning an azara, “Ga managh a bagh danganim akɨram?”
42022010	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn aning mɨgei, “Gua nguibar ekiamɨn aven mangɨtɨ, gumazitam maghɨra mɨner dɨpam ater izɨ gua batoghtɨma, gua an gɨn a zuir dɨpenimɨn mangɨ.
42022011	Egh dɨpenimɨn ghuavim mɨkɨm suam, ‘Tisa kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nan danganir kɨ uan suren gumaziba ko God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiamɨn isam ramamim mana?” ’
42022012	Eghtɨ a ghuriamɨn aven danganir bar ekiatam guan akagham, dakoziba koma dapiagh damamin dabirabiba ko biziba bar ikɨtɨ, gua magh bizibar kɨr.”
42022013	Ezɨ aning ghua garima, biziba bar Iesus mɨkemezɨ moghɨrama otifi. Ezɨma aning God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiam bagha dagheba ko bizibar kɨri.
42022014	Ezɨ damamin dughiam otozɨ, Iesus uan aposelba ko me dagher dakozimɨn mɨn apiaghav iti.
42022015	Egha a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, kɨ ua God Israelbagh Itazir Dughiamɨn isamɨn dagher katam rameghan kogham. Kamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨ, God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn otogham. Kamaghɨn amizɨma kɨ ia ko isar kam ramasa bar ifonge. Egh kɨ gɨn mɨzazim iniam.”
42022017	Egha Iesus wain apir itarim inighava Ekiam mɨnabagha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ ia mɨgei, kɨ uam wainɨn ovɨzimɨn dɨpar katam raman kogham, kamaghɨra ikɨtɨma God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam otogham. Kamaghɨn, ia kagh a inigh ia uari danɨng.”
42022019	Egha a bret inigha, Ekiam mɨnabagha anebighava me ganɨga kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kar nan nivafɨzim, kɨ ia bagha anenɨngi. Ia anemɨ, na gɨnɨghnɨgh.”
42022020	Me amegha gɨvazɨma, ezɨ kamaghɨra a wainɨn apir itarim inighava kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Itarimɨn aven itir wainɨn kam, an Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir Igiam, kɨ uan ghuzimɨn a gamizɨma, a ia bagha iri.
42022021	Eghtɨ ia gan, dafarir na inighɨva gumazir kurabar dafarim darɨgham, a kara na ko dakozim gaperaghavtɨ.
42022022	Eghtɨ Gumazibar Borim tuavir Afeziam faragha a bagh atɨzimɨn gɨn mangam. Ezɨ gumazir a inigha gumazir kurabar dafarim gatɨzim, gumaka, a bar ikuvigham.”
42022023	Ezɨ me akar kam baregha uarira uarir azangsɨsi, “Tina bizir kam damuam?”
42022024	Egha aposelba uari adogha ghaze, tinara en faragham?
42022025	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kantrin Igharazir Gumazibar atriviba, me uan gavgaviba ko ziaba fava, arazir kuraba gumazibagh amuava, egha kamaghɨn mɨgei ‘E gumazibar akurvasi.’
42022026	Ia kamaghɨn damuan markɨ. Gumazir ian torimɨn ikia ian faragha zuim, a uabɨ apengan ikɨva, borimɨn mɨn uabɨ arɨgh. Ezɨ gumazir ian faragha zuim, ian ingangarir gumazimɨn mɨn ikɨ.
42022027	Tinara ekefe, gumazir pura dagher dakozimɨn aperaghav itim o gumazir dagheba anɨdim? Gumazir pura dagher dakozimɨn aperaghav itim. Ezɨma kɨ ian torimɨn ikia mati ian ingangarir gumazim.
42022028	“Kɨ osɨmtɨziba aterima ia na ko iti.
42022029	Kamaghɨra nan afeziam Atrivimɨn mɨn na atɨzɨma, kɨ uaghan atrivibar mɨn ia arɨghasa.
42022030	Eghtɨ nan atrivir dughiamɨn aven ia na ko atrivimɨn dabirabir aghuaribar apiaghɨva Israelbar anabar 12 plan ganam.”
42022031	Egha Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Saimon, Saimon, Satan nɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim tuisɨgh a gɨfoghasa, Godɨn azara.
42022032	Ezɨ kɨ nɨ bagha Afeziar Ekiam ko mɨkemegha gɨfa, nɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim irɨghan kogham. Egh nɨ uamategh na bagh izɨva, egh uan aveghbuaba gavgavim me danɨng.”
42022033	Egha Pita kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze “Ekiam, kɨ nɨ ko kalabusɨn mangam o aremeghasa ifuegha iti.”
42022034	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn Pitan akam ikara, “Kɨ nɨ mɨgei, nɨ datɨrɨghɨn dughiar pumuning ko mɨkezimɨn mɨkɨm suam, nɨ na gɨfozir puvatɨ, eghtɨ tuarim maghɨrama akam.”
42022035	Egha Iesus men azara, “Kɨ dughiar kamɨn ia amadagha bizir kataba sara ia amadazɨr puvatɨ, dagɨaba azuir mɨtariba koma ruagha aruir mɨtariba koma dagarir asuaba. Ezɨ ia bizitamɨn otevez o puvatɨ?” Ezɨ me kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Puvatɨ.”
42022036	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Eghtɨ ia datɨrɨghɨn uan dagɨar mɨtariba ikɨva, da inigh, egha ruagha aruir mɨtariba ikɨva, uaghan da inigh. Eghtɨ ia mɨdorozir sababa puvatɨghɨva, ia uan initam amadaghɨva tam givesegh.
42022037	Kamaghɨn Godɨn Akɨnafarim ghaze, ‘Gumaziba an gara ghaze, a gumazir kuram.’ Kɨ ia mɨgei, bizir kaba na bativam. Are, Afeziar Ekiamɨn akɨnafarim osirizir moghɨn biziba na bativavɨra iti.”
42022038	Ezɨ me mɨgei, “Ekiam, nɨ gan. E mɨdorozir sabar pumuning kagh iti.” Ezɨma a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “A gɨfa.”
42022039	Egha Iesus nguibar ekiam, Jerusalem, ategha, Olivɨn mɨghsɨam bagha zui. A zurara ami moghɨn. Ezɨ an suren gumaziba an gɨn zui.
42022040	Egha me danganir kamɨn otivigha a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia uari bagh God ko mɨkɨm. Eghtɨma osɨmtɨzir ekiar kam ia damutɨma, ia ireghan kogham.”
42022041	Egha a me ategha mong saghon ghua, mati gumazim dagɨam akuri moghɨn, egha a tevimning apɨrigha kamaghɨn God ko mɨgei,
42022042	“Afeziam, nɨ ifueghava na da osɨmtɨzir kam inigh. Egh nan ifongiamɨn gɨn mangan markɨ. Nɨ uan ifongiamɨn gɨn mangɨ.”
42022043	Ezɨ ensel mam Godɨn Nguibamɨn ikegha izava gavgavim a ganɨdi.
42022044	Ezɨ Iesus nɨghnɨghava bar oseme, egha a pamtem Afeziam ko mɨgei. Ezɨ an doriba otivaghira mati ghuzim nguazim giri.
42022045	An Afeziam ko mɨkemegha, dɨkavighava uamategha uan suren gumaziba bagha zui. Egha a men garima, me bar osemeghava akuavɨra iti.
42022046	Ezɨ a me mɨgei, “Ia tizim bagha akui? Ia dɨkavighɨva Afeziam ko mɨkɨm. Eghtɨ osɨmtɨzir ekiam ia damutɨma, ia ireghan kogham.”
42022047	Egha Iesus mɨgɨavɨra itima maburan gumazir bɨzim oto. An 12 plan gumazir mam Judas men faragha iza tuavim men aka. A Iesusɨn boroghɨra izeghava an torasava ami.
42022048	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn an azara, “Judas kar nɨ Gumazibar Otarimɨn toreghɨva a inighɨva, gumazir kurabar dafarim darɨghasa?”
42022049	Ezɨ suren gumaziba Iesus ko ikia garima arazim otivasava amima, me kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ekiam, e uan mɨdorozir sababar me mɨsogham, o?”
42022050	Ezɨ men mav mɨdorozir sabam inighava, ofa gamir gumazibar ekiamɨn ingangarir gumazir mam mɨsoghava, an kuarim bar anetuzɨ a irɨ.
42022051	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Arazir kam atakigh!” Egha an an kuarimɨn suirazɨ, a dera.
42022052	Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazibar ekiaba, ko Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn garir gumazir ekiaba, ko Judan gumazir dapaniba me iza Iesusɨn suighasava amim, a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia mɨdorozir sababa ko asianiba inigha iza mati ia okɨmakɨar gumazim o mɨdorozir gumazim buri?
42022053	Kɨ zurara ia ko Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven itima, ia dafarim na garɨzir puvatɨ. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn ian dughiam. Datɨrɨghɨn mɨtarmemɨn gavgavim oto.”
42022054	Ezɨ Iesusɨn apaniba an suighava a inigha ofa gamir gumazibar dapanimɨn dɨpenimɨn zui. Ezɨma Pita men gɨn ghua mong gɨrara iti.
42022055	Ezɨma me dɨpenimɨn dɨvazimɨn aven avim atɨghava apiaghav itima, Pita uaghan me koma aperaghav iti.
42022056	Ezɨ ingangarir guivir mam avir angazangarimɨn an garima, a me koma aperaghav itima, a mɨghɨgha an garava kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Gumazir kam a ko ike.”
42022057	Ezɨma Pita kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Puvatɨ! Amizim, kɨ a gɨfozir puvatɨ.”
42022058	A mong ikezɨma gɨn ua mav izava an apigha kamaghɨn a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ uaghan men mav.” Ezɨ Pita kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ai! Kɨ bar puvatɨ!”
42022059	Dughiam mong ghugha gɨvazɨma, gumazir igharazim izava pamtem ghaze, “Guizbangɨra kav, a Galilin gumazimra. Kamaghɨn e guizbangɨra fo, a uaghan a ko ike.”
42022060	Ezɨ Pita kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Aiee! Nɨ tizim mɨgei? Kɨ bar fozir puvatɨ!” Eghava a mɨgɨavɨra itima tuarim ake.
42022061	Ezɨ Ekiam raghrɨghava mɨghɨgha Pitan garima, a mɨkemezir akabagh inɨrɨ, “Nɨ datɨrɨghɨn dughiar pumuning ko mɨkezimɨn mɨkɨm suam, ‘Nɨ na gɨfozir puvatɨ,’ eghtɨ tuarim maghɨrama akegham.”
42022062	Egha Pita inɨrɨghava azenimɨn ghua bar puvɨrama azi.
42022063	Ezɨ gumazir Iesusɨn suighiziba dɨbovir akabar a mɨgɨava a mɨsosi.
42022064	Egha me inir avɨzimɨn an damazimning ikegha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim, nɨ e mɨkɨm! Tina nɨ mɨsoke?”
42022065	Egha me akar kurar avɨrir maba saram a mɨkeme.
42022066	Ezɨ amɨnim tirazɨma, Judan kotɨn aven itir gumazir aruaba (ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba, ko Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba) me bar iza uari akuvaghav itima, me Iesus inighava men damazimɨn zui.
42022067	Ezɨ me kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ e mɨkɨm, kar nɨ Krais, God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim, o ti puvatɨ?” Ezɨ, a kamaghɨn me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kɨ ia mɨkemeghtɨma, ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan ikian kogham.
42022068	Eghtɨ kɨ ian azaraghtɨma, ia na mɨkemeghan kogham.
42022069	Eghtɨ datɨrɨghɨn ko gɨn izamin dughiaba, Gumazibar Otarim gavgaviba bar itir Godɨn agharir guvimɨn daperaghɨv ikiam.”
42022070	Ezɨ me bar an azara, “Kar nɨ Godɨn Otarim?” Ezɨma a me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia guizbangɨra mɨgei, kɨ an Otarimra.”
42022071	Egha me kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “E tizim bagh uamategh gumaziba inightɨ me gumazir kamɨn arazibar gun e mɨkɨmam? A uabɨ bizir kam mɨkemezɨma e an akatorim baregha gɨfa.”
42023001	Egha gumazir bɨzim bar dɨkavigha Iesus inigha Pailat bagha zui.
42023002	Egha me dɨkavigha a gifara, kamaghɨn a mɨgɨa ghaze, “E gumazir kamɨn garima an en gavmanɨn ikura. Egha an e dagɨaba Sisar danɨngan bar en anogoregha, kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, a uabɨ atrivim ko God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim, Krais.”
42023003	Ezɨ Pailat Iesusɨn azara, “Nɨ Judabar atrivim, o?” Ezɨ Iesus ghaze, “Are, mɨgɨrɨgɨar nɨ mɨgeim, a guizbangɨra.”
42023004	Ezɨ Pailat kamaghɨn ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba koma gumazamizibav gɨa ghaze, “Kɨ gumazir kamɨn arazir kuratamɨn apizir puvatɨ.”
42023005	Ezɨ me bar gavgavigha kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “A Galilin Provinsɨn ikegha nguibabagh aruava men sure gamua men navibagh inivava da fe. Egha datɨrɨghɨn a Judian Provinsɨn izegha kagh otogha kamaghɨn amuavɨra iti.”
42023006	Ezɨ Pailat mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam baregha, kamaghɨn men azara, “Kar Galilin gumazim?”
42023007	Iesus Herot garir Provinsɨn ikezɨma, Pailat kamaghɨn foghava, anemadazɨ a Herot bagha ghu. Dughiar kamɨn Herot uaghan Jerusalemɨn iti.
42023008	Herot fomɨra Iesusɨn ganasa ifuegha, an ganizir puvatɨgha, dughiar kamɨn an an ganigha, bar akonge. Egha Iesusɨn akaba baregha an mirakelɨn tamɨn ganasa.
42023009	Egha Herot azangsɨzir avɨravɨribar Iesus gamima, a bar an azangsɨzitam ikarazir puvatɨ.
42023010	Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba, ko Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba, me roghɨra tuivighava, an atarava, akaba pamtem a gasi.
42023011	Egha Herot uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko an atarava dɨbovir akar kurabar a mɨgei. Egha me atrivimɨn inir aghuir mam inigha a gikegha, uam anemadazɨ, a Pailat bagha zui.
42023012	Fomɨra Herot Pailatɨn anɨngaghe, egha dughiar kam aning ua uaning ini.
42023013	Ezɨ Pailat, ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba, ko gumazir dapanir ekiaba, ko gumazamiziba, men deima me bar uari akuvagha iti.
42023014	Ezɨma a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia gumazir kam inighava na bagha ize. Egha ia kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘A gumazamizibav geima me gavmanɨn ikura.’ Ezɨ kɨ ian damazimɨn arazir kabanagh bagha an azangsɨki. Ia oragh! Kɨ gumazir kamɨn arazitam batozir puvatɨ. Ia purama a gifari.
42023015	Ezɨ Herot uaghan nɨghnɨzir kam ikiava, gumazir kam e bagha uam anemada. Ia oraki! An arazir kuratam damighɨva, an ovengam. Gumazir kam arazir kuratam gamizir pu, an ovengan kogham.
42023016	Kamaghɨn, kɨ purama a fozoregh, an ateghtɨma a mangam.”
42023018	Ezɨ amiziba ko gumaziba bar moghɨra tuai, “Gumazir mamɨn mɨsokegh! Egh Barabas ateghtɨ a e bagh izɨ!”
42023019	(Barabas a fomɨra Romɨn gavmanɨn ikuragha Jerusalemɨn nguibamɨn aven mɨdorozim fore. Ezɨ gumazir maba ariaghɨre. Ezɨ me a isa kalabus gatɨ.)
42023020	Ezɨ Pailat Iesus ateghtɨ a mangasa ua me mɨgei.
42023021	Ezɨ me kamaghɨn tuai, “A mɨsokegh! A mɨsokegh! A isɨ ter ighuvim gafugh!”
42023022	Ezɨ dughiar mɨkezim a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Manmagh su? An arazir kurar manam gami? Kɨ an arazir kuratamɨn apizir puvatɨ. An arazir kuratam damighɨva an ovengam. Gumazir kam arazir kuratam gamizir puvatɨ. Kɨ purama a fozoreghɨva aneteghtɨ, a mangam.”
42023023	Ezɨma me bar moghɨra gavgavigha dei, “Iesus isɨva ter ighuvim gafugh!” Ezɨ men dɨmdiaba bar Pailatɨn akam gafira.
42023024	Ezɨma Pailat men akamɨn gɨn ghugha, Iesusɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, an ovengam.
42023025	Gumazamiziba me Pailatɨn deima a Barabas ataki. Gumazir kam a gavman ikuragha mɨdorozim forezɨma, gumazir maba ariaghɨre. Ezɨ me a isa kalabus gatɨ. Ezɨma Pailat gumazamizibar nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn ghuava, Iesus isava mɨdorozir gumazibar dafarim gatɨ.
42023026	Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba Iesus inigha zuima, gumazir mam an ziam Saimon, a Sairinɨn gumazir mam. A Jerusalemɨn mangasa iza me gitavɨrazɨma, me an suira. Egha me ter ighuvim an dɨpɨzim gatɨgha a mɨgeima a Iesusɨn gɨn zui.
42023027	Ezɨma gumazir avɨrim an gɨn ghua, amiziba a bagha aziava azir akar ighiar amɨrɨzibagh ami.
42023028	Ezɨma Iesus raghrɨgha kamaghɨn me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia Jerusalemɨn amiziba, ia na bagh arangan markɨ. Ia uari ko uan boriba bagh arang!
42023029	Gɨn dughiatam otoghtɨma, me kamaghɨn mɨkɨm suam, ‘Amizir furabaghatiba ko amizir tɨghar boriba batamiba ko, amizir oteba boribagh anɨngizir puvatɨziba, me bar akuegham.’
42023030	‘Egh me dughiar kamɨn kamaghɨn mɨghsɨabav kɨmam, “Ia e gisɨn irɨghɨva, e mongegh!” ’
42023031	Me datɨrɨghɨn arazir kamɨn temer angamtɨzim damighɨva arazir mana tamɨn temer mɨdiarɨm damuam?”
42023032	Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba gumazir kurar pumuning Iesus ko aningɨn mɨsueghtɨma me aremeghasa aning inigha izi.
42023033	Egha me ghua danganir mamɨn oto, an ziam Dapanir Agharim. Egha me danganir kam Iesus isava tememɨn anegura. Me uaghan gumazir kuramning agurazɨma, mam an guvimɨn itima, mam an kɨriamɨn iti.
42023034	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Afeziam, me amir biziba me dagh fozir puvatɨ. Nɨ men arazir kuraba gɨn amadagh.” Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba Iesusɨn korotiaba iniasa satu gikararai.
42023035	Ezɨ gumazamiziba an gara tuivighav itima, gumazir dapanir ekiaba uaghan an gara mɨnbaba sighsirava kamaghɨn a mɨgei. “A gumazir mabar akurvakis. Egh a guizbangɨra God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim, gumazir God inabazim, a uabɨ uabɨn akuragh.”
42023036	Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba izava uaghan a dɨpovava, egha wainɨn dɨpar mɨsozim a ganigha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ guizbangɨra Judabar atrivir gumazim, nɨ uabɨ uabɨn akuragh!”
42023038	Egha mɨdorozir gumaziba osizirir mam Iesusɨn dapanim gisɨn anegura. An osiziriba kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Gumazir kam Judabar Atrivir Gumazim.”
42023039	Ezɨ gumazir kurar mam ter ighuvimɨn guraghav ikia, atara kamaghɨn Iesusɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ guizbangɨra God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim, nɨ uabɨn akurvaghɨva ga sarama akuragh!”
42023040	Ezɨ gumazir kurar igharazim atarava kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ ovengasava amuava, Godɨn atiati, o puvatɨ?
42023041	Me deragha ga gami, ga uan arazir kurabagh ipuri. Ezɨma gumazir kam arazir kuratam gamizir puvatɨ.”
42023042	Egha gumazir kam kamaghɨn Iesus mɨgei, “Iesus, nɨ gɨn atrivimɨn ikiamin dughiam nɨ na ginɨrɨgh.”
42023043	Ezɨma Iesus a mɨgei, “Kɨ guizbangɨra nɨ mɨgei, nɨ datɨrɨghɨn na ko Godɨn Nguibar Aghuarimɨn ikiam.”
42023044	Ezɨ aruem dughiar kamɨn garir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, mɨtatem 12 kloghɨn nguazim bar anevaragha ghua 3 kloghɨn tu. Ezɨma Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn itir inir ekiam tongɨra bɨki.
42023046	Ezɨ Iesus pamtem kamaghɨn dei, “Afeziam, kɨ uan duam nɨn dafarim garɨsi.” A kamaghɨn mɨkemeghava uan duam sue.
42023047	Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir ekiam kamaghɨn ganighava Godɨn ziam fe. Egha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Guizbangɨra, kar gumazir aghuim, a bizitam pazava a gamizir puvatɨ.”
42023048	Ezɨ gumazamizir iza itiba bizir kabanaghɨn gari da otivima, me azia, uan afarɨzibav mɨsogha, egha uan dɨpenibar zui.
42023049	Ezɨma Iesus gɨfozir gumaziba, ko amizir an gɨn Galilin izeziba, me mong saghon tuivigha ikia, bizir kabar gari da otifi.
42023050	Ezɨ gumazir mam, an ziam Josep, a Judian Provinsɨn nguibam Arimatean ikegha ize. A gumazir aghuim, a Godɨn damazimɨn derazir mam, a Kaunsel memban mam. Egha a men nɨghnɨziba ko arazibar gɨn mangan aghua. A God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam a baghavɨra muza iti.
42023052	Egha Josep Iesusɨn kuam iniasa ghua Pailatɨn azarazɨma, Pailat an amamangatɨ.
42023053	Ezɨ a Iesusɨn kuam tememɨn anedegha, inir ghurghurimɨn a righa, a inigha ghuava dagɨar torir me fomɨra gumazir kuatam atɨzir puvatɨzim gatɨ.
42023054	Kar dughiar bizibar kɨrim, ezɨ Sabatɨn dughiam roghɨra ize.
42023055	Ezɨ amizir Iesusɨn gɨn Galilin izeziba, me Josepɨn gɨn ghua dagɨar torimɨn gari. Egha me uaghan garima, Josep manmaghɨn Iesusɨn kuam atɨ.
42023056	Egha me ganigha gɨvaghava, uamategha uan dɨpenibar ghuava bizir mughuriaba itiba ko boreba isa da arɨsi. Egha Godɨn osizirim mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, me Sabatɨn dughiamɨn avughsi.
42024001	Ezɨ Sanden bar mɨzaraghara, amiziba borer mughuriar aghuir me arɨghɨziba, inighava dagɨar torimɨn zui.
42024002	Egha me gari, me torim avarazir dagɨam, me a puegha ghu.
42024003	Egha me aven ghua Iesusɨn kuam bagha garava avenge.
42024004	Egha me kamaghɨn ganigha nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh amua tuivighav itima, gumazir pumuning zuamɨra aningɨn korotiaba onɨmarimɨn mɨn taghtagha men mɨn tughav iti.
42024005	Ezɨ amiziba bar atiatigha avigha nguazimɨn gari, ezɨ gumazimning kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia tizim bagha gumazir angamra itim gumazir ovengezibar danganimɨn a buri?
42024006	A kagh itir puvatɨ; a ua dɨkafi! A ia ko Galilin ikia ia mɨkemezir bizim, ia a gɨnɨghnɨgh,
42024007	‘Gumazibar Otarim, me a isɨ gumazir arazir kurabagh amibar dafarim datɨghtɨ, me a isɨ ter ighuvimɨn a guragham. Eghtɨ a dughiar mɨkezimɨn ua dɨkavigham.’”
42024008	Ezɨ a mɨkemezir akaba me a dagh inɨrɨ.
42024009	Egha me mozim ategha uamategha ghua bizir kabar gun Iesusɨn suren gumazir 11 plan mɨgɨava igharaz darazi sara mɨkeme.
42024010	Amizir bizir kabar gun Iesusɨn 11 plan aposelba ko igharaz daraziv kemeziba. Makdalan nguibamɨn amizim Maria, ko Joana, ko Maria a Jemsɨn amebam, koma amizir igharazir maba uaghan me ko ikia bizir kabar gun aposelbav mɨgei.
42024011	Ezɨ me amizibav gɨa ghaze, me ti onganighama, egha kamaghɨn me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim men akabar itir puvatɨ.
42024012	Egha Pita kamaghɨn oregha dɨkavigha ivegha mozimɨn ghu. Egha an aviragha, mozimɨn gara bizitamɨn apizir puvatɨgha inir ghurghuribara gari da ireghav iti. Egha a uamategha ghua nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh amua ghaze, kar manmaghɨn amizir bizim.
42024013	Ezɨ dughiar kamra gumazir pumuning Emeusɨn nguibamɨn zui, Emeusɨn nguibamɨn ikegha Jerusalemɨn zuir tuavimɨn ruarim, a 11 kilomita.
42024014	Ezɨ aning bizir otivizir kabar gun uaningra uaningɨn mɨgei.
42024015	Egha aning bizir kabav gɨa uaningɨn azangsɨzima, Iesus uabɨ otogha aning ko me zui.
42024016	Ezɨ aning an garava egha deragha a gɨfozir puvatɨ.
42024017	Ezɨ an aningɨn azara, “Gua tizibar uaningɨn mɨgɨa tuavimɨn zui?” Ezɨ aning tughava an garava bar osemegha aziasava ami.
42024018	Ezɨ aningɨn mav, an ziam Kliopas, an azara, “Jerusalemɨn izezir gumaziba bar bizir kam gɨfo. Ezɨ nɨ ti uabɨra dughiar gɨvazibar Jerusalemɨn bizir kabagh fozir puvatɨ?”
42024019	Ezɨ Iesus aningɨn azara, “Bizir tiziba?” Ezɨ aning a ikaragha ghaze, “Ga Nasaretɨn Iesus bativizir bizibav gei. A Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir mam, ezɨ an akaba ko ingangariba God ko gumaziba bar men damazimɨn bar gavgafi.
42024020	Ezɨ en ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba ko en gumazir aruaba a isa gavmanɨn dafarim gatɨzɨ, me a mɨsoghezɨ an areme, ezɨ me ter ighuvimɨn a gura.
42024021	Ezɨ e faragha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim kamaghɨn an iti, a God Ua Israelba Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim. “Ezɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨar mam ua iti, bizir kaba otivigha gɨvazɨ, ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn an aremezir dughiar mɨkezim oto.
42024022	Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn en amizir maba mɨzaraghara mozimɨn ghuegha an kuamɨn apizir puvatɨ. Egha iza e mɨkemezɨ, e bar aguaghfa. Egha me ghaze, e irebamɨn mɨn enselbar garima, me kamaghɨn e mɨgɨa ghaze, a ua dɨkafi.
42024024	Ezɨ en marazi mozimɨn ghuegha amiziba mɨkemezɨ moghɨn bizibar gari da iti, ezɨ me an apizir puvatɨ.”
42024025	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn aning mɨgei, “Gua gumazir onganimning! Gua Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazimɨn akaba nɨghnɨzir gavgavim koma navim zuamɨrama adar itir puvatɨ.
42024026	Ezɨ gua ti fozir puvatɨ? God Ua Gumazamiziba Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim, faragh mɨzaziba inigh egh gɨn Godɨn damazimɨn ziar ekiam iniam.”
42024027	Egha Iesus aning geghari. A faragha Moses osirizir akabav gɨa, ghua Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar akaba bar aning mɨgei. A Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn itir akar an gun mɨkemeziba, dar mɨngariba bar aningɨn sure gami.
42024028	Egha me nguibar me ikiamimɨn boroghɨra ghuava, Iesus aning bada ghuavɨra itima,
42024029	aning a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Aruem bar gɨvazɨma amɨnim pɨri. Nɨ ga ko dakuam.” Ezɨma a ghuava aning koma akui.
42024030	Egha Iesus damasa aning koma aperaghav ikia, bret inighava Afeziar Ekiam mɨnabagha, bret abigha aning ganɨdi.
42024031	Ezɨ aning datɨrɨghɨn an garava a gɨfofozima, a pura puvatɨ.
42024032	Ezɨma aning maghɨra uaningɨn mɨgei, “A tuavimɨn ga batogha Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn akabar ga mɨgeima, gan navimning dɨkafi.”
42024033	Egha aning dɨkavigha zuamɨra ghua Jerusalemɨn uamategha ghua garima, 11 pla Iesusɨn suren gumaziba, me marazi ko me uari akuvagha itima,
42024034	aning kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Bar guizbangɨra! Iesus aremegha dɨkavigha ghua Saimon bato!”
42024035	Ezɨ aning maghɨra tuavimɨn otivizir bizibar gun me mɨgɨava ghaze, a bret abɨghizɨma aning an ganighava a gɨfo.
42024036	Iesusɨn suren gumazir 11 pla ko marazi, bizir kabar gun uariv geima, Iesus pura men tongɨn tughav ikia, a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Navir amɨrizim ia ko iti.”
42024037	Ezɨ me bar atiatigha ghaze, me duamɨn gari.
42024038	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia tizim bagha atiatiava nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh ami?
42024039	Ia kagh nan dafariba ko dagaribar gan. Egh ia fogh suam, kar kɨ Iesus uabɨ. Egh ia nan suigh ia fogh. Duam aghariba ko nivafɨziba puvatɨ. Ezɨ ia nan gari, kɨ da iti.”
42024040	A kamaghɨn mɨkemegha uan dafariba ko dagariba men akakasi.
42024041	Egha me bar akuegha tintinibar nɨghnɨgha, egha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itir puvatɨ. Ezɨ a men azara, “Ia damamin daghetam iti?”
42024042	Ezɨ me osirir tuazimɨn akuam a ganɨngizɨma,
42024043	a men damazibar a inighava anepi.
42024044	Egha a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Fomɨra Moses Osirizir Araziba, ko Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar osiziriba, ko Devitɨn ighiaba, da nan gun mɨkemezir biziba, da bar moghɨra guizɨn otivam. Kar bizir kɨ ia ko ikia ia mɨkemeziba.”
42024045	Egha a nɨghnɨzir aghuiba me ganɨngizɨma me Afeziar Ekiamɨn Akɨnafarimɨn akabar mɨngaribagh fo.
42024046	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Afeziar Ekiamɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨkeme, God Ua Gumazamiziba Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim, Krais, an aremegh dughiar pumuning ko mɨkezimɨn ikegh uamategh mozimɨn dɨkavigham.
42024047	Egh ia nan ziamɨn ia nan akam inigh mangam. Ia Jerusalem ikeghɨva nan akam inighɨva nguazimɨn mɨkebaba bar dar mangɨ. Ia gumazamizibav kɨmtɨ, me navibagh iraghtɨ kɨ men arazir kuraba gɨn amadagham.
42024048	Ia uari uan damazibar bizir kabar ganizɨ moghɨn dar gun mɨkɨm.
42024049	Ia oragh. Afeziam faragha akam akɨragha ghaze, a uan Duam isɨ ia danɨngam. Ezɨ kɨ a mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, ia bagh anemangam. Kamaghɨn ia nguibar ekiamɨn ikɨ. Egh mamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨ dughiar God ko itir gavgavim izighrɨtɨma ia a iniam.”
42024050	Egha Iesus uan suren gumaziba inigha ghuava Betanin boroghɨn itir danganimɨn tu. Egha a uan agharim ghufegha arazir aghuim me damuasava Godɨn azai.
42024051	An arazir aghuim me damuasa Godɨn azavɨra itima, God a inigha uan Nguibamɨn ghuavanadi.
42024052	Ezɨma me an ziam fa bar akuegha uamategha Jerusalemɨn zui.
42024053	Egha me Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven ikiava an ziam fa mamaghɨra iti.
43001001	Bar fomɨra fomɨra, biziba bar tɨghar otivamin dughiam, Akam iti. Akar kam God ko iti, egha a uabɨ God.
43001002	Bar fomɨra fomɨra Akam God ko iti.
43001003	Ezɨ Akar kamɨn, God biziba bar dar ingarizɨma, da otifi. Ezɨ bizitam tuavir igharazi tamɨn otozir puvatɨ. Akam uabɨ bizibagh amizɨma, da otifi.
43001004	Egha Akar kamra, a zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarimɨn mɨngarim. Ezɨ ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarir kam, a uaghan gumazamiziba angazangarim me ganɨdi.
43001005	Ezɨ angazangarir kam a mɨtatemɨn isima, mɨtatem anevaraghava egha anemungezir puvatɨ.
43001006	Ezɨ God gumazir mam amada, an ziam Jon.
43001007	An akam akunasa ize. An angazangarir kamɨn akamɨn gun mɨkɨmtɨma, gumazamiziba bar moghɨra a baraghɨva egh nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikiam. A ingangarir kam damuasa ize.
43001008	Egha Jon uabɨ angazangarir kam puvatɨ. An angazangarir kamɨn akamɨn gun mɨkɨmasa ize.
43001009	Ezɨ angazangarir kam guizbangɨn angazangarim. Egha nguazir kamɨn izegha gumazamiziba bar angazangarim me ganɨdi.
43001010	Akam nguazir kamɨn iti. An gavgavimɨn, God nguazir kamɨn ingari, ezɨ nguazimɨn itir gumazamiziba a gɨfozir puvatɨ.
43001011	A uan nguibamra ghuzɨma an anababa an aghuagha a inizir puvatɨ.
43001012	Ezɨ gumazamizir maba a ini, egha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ziamɨn iti. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a me gamizɨma me Godɨn boribar mɨn otifi.
43001013	Me amebaba ko afeziabar ghuzibar otifi, o mɨkarzibar ifongiamɨn, o gumazimɨn ifongiamɨn Godɨn boribar otivizir puvatɨ. Bar puvatɨ. God uabɨ me gamizɨma me an boribar otifi.
43001014	Akam uabɨ gumazimɨn mɨn oto. A bar Godɨn Otarir vamɨra, ezɨ God a gamizɨ a Godɨn gavgavim ko angazangarim ini. Ezɨ God anemadazɨma an en tongɨn iti. Ezɨ e an gavgavim ko angazangarimɨn gani. Ezɨ apangkuvim ko guizɨn akam bar a gizɨfa.
43001015	Ezɨ Jon gumazir kamɨn gun me mɨgei. Egha pamten dia ghaze, “A gumazir kam, kɨ faragha an gun ia mɨkemegha gɨfa. Kɨ kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Gumazir nan gɨn izim, a bar fomɨra iti, ezɨ nan amebam gɨn na bate. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, an gavgavim bar nan gavgavim gafira.’”
43001016	Ezɨ apangkuvim bar a gizɨfa, ezɨ a uan apangkuvimɨn a dughiar avɨribar bar deravɨra e gami.
43001017	Guizbangɨra, Moses Osirizir Araziba, God e bagha da isa Moses ganɨngizɨ, ezɨ Moses e ganɨngi. Ezɨ God, Krais Iesusɨn aven apangkuvim ko guizbangɨn arazim en aka.
43001018	Gumazitam bar Godɨn ganizir puvatɨ. Ezɨ kar Godɨn Otarir vamɨra, a uabɨ God, egha a bar Godɨn boroghɨra iti. A uabɨra God en aka.
43001019	Ezɨ Judan gumazir aruaba, me ofa gamir gumazir maba ko Livain gumazir maba amadazɨ, me Jerusalem ategha Jon bagha iza kamaghɨn an azara, “Nɨ tinara?”
43001020	Ezɨ Jon bighavɨra mɨgɨa akam modir puvatɨ. A kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ God Ua Gumazamiziba Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim puvatɨ.”
43001021	Ezɨ me an azara, “Nɨ tinara? Nɨ ti Elaija, o?” Ezɨ a mɨgei, “Puvatɨ.” Ezɨ me mɨgei, “Nɨ ti Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir kamra, e nɨ mɨzuai.” Ezɨ an akam ikara, “Puvatɨ.”
43001022	Kamaghɨn amizɨma, me uam an azara, “Nɨ bar tinara? E ikarvazir aghuitam inigh mangɨva gumazir e amadazɨbav kɨmam. Nɨ manmaghɨra uabɨ mɨgei?”
43001023	Ezɨ Jon kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ gumazir kamɨn tiarim, kɨ gumaziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn ikia egha kamaghɨn dɨa mɨgei, ‘Ia Ekiam bagh tuavim akɨr.’” (Kar akar Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim Aisaia fomɨra osirizim.)
43001024	Gumazir kaba, Farisiba me amangizɨ me ize.
43001025	Egha me kamaghɨn Jon azara, “Nɨ Gumazir God Ua Gumazamiziba Iniasa Mɨsevezim puvatɨgh, egh nɨ Elaija puvatɨgh, egh nɨ Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir kam puvatɨgha, egha nɨ tizim sua gumazamiziba rue?”
43001026	Ezɨ Jon kamaghɨn men akam ikara, “Kɨ dɨpamɨn me rue. Ezɨ gumazir mam ian tongɨn iti, ia a gɨfozir puvatɨ.
43001027	A gumazir kam, a nan gɨn izi. Kɨ an dagarir asuabar beniba fɨran ibura.”
43001028	Jon Betanin nguibamɨn ikia akar kam me mɨkeme, nguibar kam Jordanɨn dɨpamɨn vongɨn iti. Danganir kamɨn Jon gumazamiziba rue.
43001029	Ezɨ amɨmɨzarakan Jon Iesusɨn garima an a bagha izi. Ezɨ Jon kamaghɨn mɨgei. “Ia munagh gan! Munar Godɨn Sipsipɨn Nguzim. A nguazimɨn itir gumazamizibar arazir kuraba gɨn amadi!
43001030	A gumazir kam, kɨ fomɨra kamaghɨn an gun mɨkeme, ‘Gumazir nan gɨn izim, a bar fomɨra iti, ezɨ nan amebam gɨn na bate. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, an gavgavim bar nan gavgavim gafira.’
43001031	Kɨ uabɨ a gɨfozir puvatɨ, a tina. Kɨ gumazir kam aghurightɨma, Israelɨn gumazamiziba a gɨfoghasa, kamaghɨn kɨ iza dɨpamɨn gumazamiziba rue.”
43001032	Ezɨ Jon ua kamaghɨn an gun mɨgei, “Kɨ garima Godɨn Duam kuarazir bunbamɨn mɨn Godɨn Nguibam ategha mɨghegha izaghira gumazir kam gisɨn iti.
43001033	Kɨ uabɨ a gɨfozir puvatɨ. God dɨpamɨn gumazamiziba ruasa na amadazɨ kɨ ize. A faragha kamaghɨn na mɨkeme, ‘Nɨ gantɨma, Godɨn Duam izighrɨghɨva, gumazitam gisɨn ikiam, a gumazir kamra, a Godɨn Duamɨn gumazamiziba ruam.’
43001034	Kɨ uabɨ bizir kamɨn ganigha egha an gun kamaghɨn ia mɨgei, gumazir kamra, a Godɨn Otarim.”
43001035	Egha amɨmɨzarakan Jon uan suren gumazir mamning ko ua danganir kamɨn tuivighav iti.
43001036	Ezɨ a garima Iesus a gitavɨrazɨma, Jon aning mɨgei, “Gua gan! Kar Godɨn Sipsipɨn Nguzim!”
43001037	Ezɨ suren gumazir kamning a barazima a kamaghɨn akar kam mɨkemezɨma, aning ghua Iesusɨn gɨn zui.
43001038	Ezɨ Iesus ikɨgha gara aningɨn azara, “Gua tizim buri?” Ezɨ aning an azara, “Rabi, nɨ dɨpenir manamɨn iti?” (Ziar kam “Rabi” an mɨngarim kamakɨn, “Tisa.”)
43001039	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn aning mɨgei, “Gua izɨ ganigh.” Ezɨ aning ghua dɨpenir a itimɨn gari. Dughiam, 4 kloghɨn guaratɨzim. Ezɨ dughiar kam aning a ko iti.
43001040	Egha Andru, a Iesusɨn gɨn zuir gumazir kamningɨn mav. A Saimon Pitan aveghbuam.
43001041	Egha Andru Iesus ategha maghɨra ghua uan aveghbuam Saimon batogha, egha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “E Mesaian gani.” (Ziar kam “Mesaia” a kamakɨn, “Gumazir God Ua E Iniasa Mɨsevezim.”)
43001042	Egha Andru Saimon inigha Iesus bagha ghu. Ezɨ Iesus an gara egha mɨgei, “Nɨ Saimon, Jonɨn Otarim. Eghtɨ me gɨn ziam ‘Sifas’ nɨ darɨgh nɨ dɨponam.” (Ziar kam “Sifas,” a ziar kam “Pitan” mɨrara ghu. An mɨngarim kamakɨn, “Dagɨam.”)
43001043	Egha amɨmɨzarakan, Iesus Galilin Distrighɨn mangasa. Egha a ghua Filip batogha, kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ nan gɨn izɨ!”
43001044	(Filip a Betsaidan nguibamɨn gumazir mam. Andru ko Pitan nguibam, Betsaida.)
43001045	Ezɨ Filip ghua Nataniel batogha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “E gumazir kamɨn ganigha gɨfa, Moses fomɨra Judabar Arazibar Akɨnafarimɨn osira gumazir kamɨn gun osiri. Ezɨ Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba uaghan gumazir kamɨn gun osiri. A Nasaretɨn nguibamɨn gumazim Iesus, a Josepɨn otarim.”
43001046	Ezɨ Nataniel kamaghɨn an azara, “Ti akurvazir bizir aghuitam Nasaretɨn nguibamɨn otivam? Ti puvatɨgham!” Ezɨ Filip a mɨgei, “Nɨ izɨ ganigh.”
43001047	Ezɨ Iesus garima Nataniel a bagha izi. Ezɨ a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia ganigh. Gumazir izir kam, a guizbangɨra Israelɨn gumazim. Ezɨ ifavarir akatam ko ifavarir arazir tam an itir puvatɨ.”
43001048	Ezɨ Nataniel kamaghɨn Iesusɨn azara, “Nɨ manmaghɨn na gɨfo?” Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn an akam ikara, “Filip tɨghar nɨn dɨmamin dughiamɨn, nɨ temer fighɨn povimɨn itima, kɨ nɨn gani.”
43001049	Ezɨ Nataniel akar kam baregha egha kamaghɨn a ikara, “Tisa, nɨ Godɨn Otarim! Nɨ Israelbar Atrivim!”
43001050	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Kɨ kamaghɨn nɨ mɨgei, nɨ temer fighɨn povimɨn itima, kɨ nɨn gani. Ezɨ bizir muziarir kamɨn, nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan iti. Nɨ gɨn bizir ekiabar gantɨ da bizir kam bar a gafiragham.”
43001051	Egha Iesus ua kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, ia gɨn Godɨn Nguibamɨn gantɨ a kuighrɨgham, eghtɨ ia Godɨn enselbar gantɨ da Gumazibar Otarim bagh ghuavanangɨva, ua izighram.”
43002001	Dughiar pumuning gɨvazɨma, gumazir mam Kanan nguibamɨn ikia amizimɨn ikiasa, ezɨ amuimɨn ikiamin isam oto. Kanan nguibam a Galilin Distrighɨn aven iti. Dughiar kam Iesusɨn amebam uaghan iti.
43002002	Ezɨ me uaghan Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko men diazɨma me uaghan amuimɨn ikiamin isar kamɨn ghuegha iti.
43002003	Ezɨ wainɨn dɨpam gɨvazɨma, Iesusɨn amebam kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Me ua wainɨn dɨpaba puvatɨ.”
43002004	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Amebam, kar nɨn bizim, a nan bizim puvatɨ. Nan dughiam a tɨgharɨ.”
43002005	Ezɨ an amebam ingangarir gumazibav gei, “A bizitam damusɨ ia mɨkɨmtɨ, ia a damu.”
43002006	Ezɨ dɨpenir kamɨn 6 plan dagɨar mɨner ekiaba iti, da ekevegha egha vaghvagha 100 litan dɨpaba dar iti. Judaba uan rurir arazibar gɨn ghua dɨpar kabagh rue.
43002007	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn ingangarir gumazibav gei, “Ia mɨner kabar dɨpaba tuigh.” Ezɨ me da tuizɨma da bar izevegha akabagh imara.
43002008	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia datɨrɨghɨn mɨner nguzim inigh dɨpatam tuighɨva a inighɨva gumazir isamɨn faragha zuim bagh mangɨ.” Ezɨ ingangarir gumaziba maba inigha zui.
43002009	Ezɨ dɨpar kam wainɨn dɨpamɨn otogha gɨfa, ezɨ gumazir isamɨn faragha zuim anepava a barasi, egha a fozir puvatɨ, me managh wainɨn dɨpar kam ini. Ezɨ ingangarir gumazir dɨpam tuiziba, merara fo. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, isamɨn faragha zuir gumazim a gumazir amuimɨn ikiasava amim, an dia,
43002010	egha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Gumaziba bar wainɨn dɨpar aghuim faragha me ganɨdi. Ezɨ gumaziba wainɨn avɨrim amegha gɨvazɨma, me gɨn wainɨn dɨpar mong afangizim anɨdi. Ezɨ no, nɨ wainɨn dɨpar aghuimɨn anogoregha, egha datɨrɨghɨra nɨ a inigha izi!”
43002011	Kar mirakelɨn arazir faragha zuir Iesus amizim. A Galilin Distrighɨn aven itir nguibam Kanan, mirakelɨn arazir kam gami. Ezɨ mirakelɨn kamɨn, Iesus bar uan gavgavir ekiam aka. Ezɨ an suren gumaziba an ganigha egha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an iti.
43002012	Ezɨ bizir kabar gɨn, Iesus uan amebam ko aveghbuaba ko an suren gumaziba, me Kanan ategha Kaperneamɨn nguibamɨn ghuaghiri. Egha me dughiar mabar nguibar kamɨn iti.
43002013	Ezɨ Israel bagh Itazir Dughiamɨn Isam otivasa roghɨra izima, ezɨ bizir kam bagha Iesus Jerusalemɨn nguibar ekiamɨn ghu.
43002014	Egha a Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn avɨzimɨn aven ghua bizibar garima, gumaziba dagɨaba iniasa bulmakauba ko sipsipba ko kuaraziba amadi. Ezɨ a garima dagɨaba uari ikarvazir gumaziba apiaghav iti.
43002015	Ezɨ Iesus beniba inigha bɨzimɨn mɨn a da ike. Egha a gumaziba ko men sipsipba ko bulmakauba bar me batoke, ezɨ me Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn avɨzim ategha zui. Ezɨ a dagɨaba uari ikarvazir gumazibar dakoziba akuri da ira dagɨaba akɨziragha tintinibar zui.
43002016	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn gumazir dagɨaba bagha kuaraziba amadiba pamten me mɨgei, “Ia kuaraziba inigh mangɨ! Ia nan Afeziamɨn dɨpenim biziba amadir danganimɨn mɨn a damuan markɨ.”
43002017	Ezɨ an suren gumaziba an amizir arazir kamɨn ganigha, egha me Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn itir akar mam ginɨrɨ. Akar kam a kamakɨn, “Nan navir averiam bar nɨn dɨpenim gɨfuegha egha a baghavɨra iti.”
43002018	Ezɨ Judan gumazir aruaba Iesus amizir arazir kamɨn ganigha, egha me kamaghɨn an azara, “Nɨ mirakelɨn arazir manam damigh en akagh suam, nɨ gavgavim ikia gatɨrɨghɨn arazir kam gami?”
43002019	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn men akam ikara, “Ia Godɨn dɨpenir kam apɨrightɨ, eghtɨ kɨ dughiar pumuning ko mɨkezimɨn uam an ingarightɨma a tugham.”
43002020	Ezɨ Judaba kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Me 46 plan azenibar Godɨn Dɨpenir kamɨn ingari. Eghtɨ nɨ ti dughiar pumuning ko mɨkezimɨn a ingarightɨ a tugham, o?”
43002021	Ezɨ Iesus mɨgeir Godɨn dɨpenir kam, an mɨkarzimra.
43002022	Ezɨ God gɨn mozimɨn a gamizɨma a ua dɨkafi, ezɨ an suren gumaziba ua akar a fomɨra mɨkemezir kam ginɨrɨ. Egha akar Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn itim ko akar Iesus mɨkemezir kam nɨghnɨzir gavgavim dar iti.
43002023	Ezɨ Iesus Israel bagh Itazir Dughiamɨn Isamɨn Jerusalemɨn itima, gumazamizir avɨrim mirakelɨn arazarazir Iesus amizibar gani. Kamaghɨn amizɨma me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an iti.
43002024	Ezɨ Iesus, a bar men araziba ko nɨghnɨzibagh fo. Kamaghɨn, a nɨghnɨzir gavgavim men itir puvatɨ.
43002025	A uabɨ gumazibar navir averiabar aven itir nɨghnɨzibagh fogha gɨfa. A fofozitamɨn otevezir puvatɨ, eghtɨ gumazitam gumazibar arazibar gun a mɨkɨman kogham.
43003001	Gumazir mam iti, an ziam Nikodemus, a Farisin mam, egha a Judabar gumazir aruar mam.
43003002	Dɨmagarir mam gumazir kam Iesus bagha izegha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Tisa, e fo, God tisan mɨn nɨ amadazɨma nɨ ize. E fo, God gumazitam ko ikian koghtɨma, eghtɨ gumazir kam mirakelɨn nɨ amir kaba, a tam damuva avegham.”
43003003	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn an akam ikara, “Kɨ bar guizbangɨra nɨ mɨgei. Gumazitam ua gumazir igiamɨn otoghan koghɨva, a God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn aven ikian kogham.”
43003004	Ezɨ Nikodemus an azara, “Manmaghɨra gumazim ghurigha gɨvagha egha ua igiam gava? A ti uamategh uan amebamɨn navir averiamɨn mangɨtɨ an amebam uam a bategham?”
43003005	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a ikara, “Kɨ guizbangɨra nɨ mɨgei, gumazitam dɨpam ko Godɨn Duamɨn ua gumazir igiamɨn otoghan kogh, egh a God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn aven ikian kogham.
43003006	Nguazir kamɨn itir amiziba boriba batima, borir igiaba otifi. Ezɨ Godɨn Duam gumazimɨn duam gamima, a gumazir igiamɨn oto.
43003007	Nɨ akar kɨ nɨ mɨkemezimɨn nɨ dɨgavir kuram damuan markɨ, ‘Ia ua igiabar otifigh.’
43003008	Amɨnim a uan ifongiamɨn gɨn tɨgha egha pura tintinibar vua zui. Nɨ an nɨgɨnim barasi, egha nɨ fozir puvatɨ, a managh iza egha ua managh zui. Kamaghɨra, Godɨn Duam gumaziba bar me gamima me igiabar otifi.”
43003009	Ezɨ Nikodemus kamaghɨn an azara, “Bizir nɨ mɨgeir kam, a manmaghɨn otogham?”
43003010	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn an akam ikara, “Manmaghɨn ami? Nɨ Israelbar tongɨn itir tisan ekiam, egha nɨ ti bizir kabagh fozir puvatɨ, o?
43003011	Kɨ guizbangɨra nɨ mɨgei, e fozir bizim e a mɨgei. Egha e bizir e ganizimɨn gun mɨgei. Ezɨ ia, e mɨkemezir akam akɨrim ragha a gasara.
43003012	Kɨ nguazir kamɨn bizibar ia mɨkeme, ezɨ ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim dar itir puvatɨ. Eghtɨ kamaghɨn kɨ Godɨn Nguibamɨn bizibar ia mɨkɨmtɨ, ia manmaghɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim dar ikiam?
43003013	Gumazir igharazitam Godɨn Nguibamɨn ghuavanabozir pu. Puvatɨ. Gumazibar Otarim uabɨra Godɨn Nguibam ategha zaghirɨ.
43003014	“Fomɨra Moses gumaziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn ikia kuruzimɨn nedazir aghorimɨn itim a ghufe, eghtɨ kamaghɨra me Gumazibar Otarim ghufam.
43003015	God kamagh sua, gumazir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Gumazibar Otarimɨn itiba, me bar zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim iniam. Bizir kam bagh me Gumazibar Otarim ghufam.
43003016	“God Otarir bar vamɨra iti. Egha God nguazimɨn itir gumazamiziba, bar me gifonge. A kamagh sua, gumazamiziba bar nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an Otarimɨn ikɨva ovengan koghɨva, zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim iniam. Bizir kam bagha an Otarir bar vamɨran kam me ganɨngi.
43003017	God uan Otarim nguazimɨn gumazamizibar jasɨn mɨn me tuisɨghasa anemadazir puvatɨ. A men akurvaghasa anemada.
43003018	Gumazim nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Otarimɨn ti, a kotiaba puvatɨ. Ezɨ gumazim nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikian aghua, a kotɨn ikia bar ovegha gɨfa. A nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn Otarir vamɨran kamɨn itir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn an ovegha gɨfa.
43003019	Ezɨ Godɨn kotiamɨn mɨngarimɨn arazim kamakɨn, Godɨn angazangarim nguazimɨn izegha gɨfa. Ezɨ gumazamiziba, me amir araziba bar ikufi, kamaghɨn amizɨ me mɨtatem bagha bar ifonge, me angazangarimɨn aghua.
43003020	Gumazir arazir kurabagh amiba bar, angazangarimɨn apaniba. Men arazir kuraba azenim giran me aghua, kamaghɨn amizɨ me angazangarimɨn izir puvatɨ.
43003021	Ezɨ gumazir guizbangɨn arazim gamim, a Godɨn angazangarimɨn izi. A kamaghɨn ifonge, Godɨn angazangarim deravɨra kamaghɨn gumazamizir igharazibar akagham, a Godɨn gavgavimɨn uan ingangarim gami. Ezɨ kamaghɨn gumazir kam Godɨn angazangarimɨn aven izi.”
43003022	Ezɨ bizir kabar gɨn Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko me Judian Distrighɨn zui. A me ko danganir kam ikia gumazamiziba rue.
43003023	Jon Ainonɨn nguibamɨn ikia gumazamiziba rue, Salimɨn nguibamɨn boroghɨra. Dɨpar avɨrim danganir kamɨn ti, ezɨ gumazamizir avɨrim rurim iniasa izi.
43003024	(Dughiar kam Herot Jon tɨghar a isɨ kalabus darɨgham.)
43003025	Ezɨ akavdorozir mam Jonɨn suren gumaziba ko Judan gumazir mamɨn tongɨn oto. Me uari adogha ghaze, e rurir arazir manamɨn gɨn mangɨ, Godɨn damazim zuegham?
43003026	Egha suren gumaziba Jon bagha ghuegha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Tisa, gumazir kam fomɨra nɨ ko Jordanɨn dɨpamɨn vongɨn ike, ezɨ nɨ an gun mɨkeme, gumazir kam datɨrɨghɨn gumazamiziba ruema, gumazamiziba bar a bagha zui.”
43003027	Ezɨ Jon kamaghɨn ikara, “Godɨn uan Nguibamɨn itim, bizitam gumazim danigan koghtɨ, an a inighan kogham.
43003028	Kɨ fomɨra akar kam ia mɨkeme, ezɨ ia uari a baraki, ‘Kɨ God Ua E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim puvatɨ. God na amadazɨma kɨ an faragha ize.’
43003029	Gumazitam amizitamɨn ikiam, eghtɨ amizir kam a gumazir kamɨn amuim. Ezɨ gumazir kamɨn namakam, a tugha gumazir amuimɨn itimɨn akam baraghasa bar akonge. Ezɨ kamaghɨra agorogem nan navir averiam bar a gizɨfa.
43003030	An ziam bar ekevegh mamaghɨra ikɨtɨ, eghtɨ nan ziam bar magɨrɨgh.
43003031	“Gumazir Godɨn Nguibamɨn pɨn ikegha izezim, a bar bizibagh isɨn iti. Ezɨ nguazir kamɨn gumazim, a nguazir kamɨn bizibagh amua egha nguazir kamɨn bizibav gei. Ezɨ gumazir Godɨn Nguibamɨn izezim a bar bizibar isɨn iti.
43003032	A bizir a ganiziba ko oraghizibar gun mɨgei. Ezɨ gumazitam a mɨkemezir akar katam inigha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itir puvatɨ.
43003033	Ezɨ gumazim an akam inigha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikia, egha tuavir kamɨn kamaghɨn men aka, God a guizɨn akam mɨgei.
43003034	Gumazir God amadazir kam, God uan Duam isa bar a ganɨngi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a Godɨn akam akuri.
43003035	Afeziam uan Otarim bar a gifonge, egha biziba bar an agharim gatɨzɨ a bar dagh atifa.
43003036	Gumazim nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Otarimɨn ti, a zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim iti. Ezɨ gumazim Otarimɨn akamɨn gɨn zuir puvatɨ, a zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim inian kogham, Godɨn anɨngagharim an ikɨvɨra ikiam.”
43004001	Ezɨ Farisiba kamaghɨn oraki, Iesus gumazamizir avɨriba rue ezɨ gumazamizir kaba an suren gumazibar otifi. Ezɨ men dɨbobonim Jonɨn suren gumazibar dɨbobonim gafira.
43004002	(Guizbangɨra, Iesus uabɨ gumazamiziba ruer puvatɨ. An suren gumaziba me rue.)
43004003	Iesus kamaghɨn fo, Farisiba orazima gumazir avɨriba an suren gumazamizibar otifi, kamaghɨn a Judian Distrigh ategha uamategha Galilin Distrighɨn ghu.
43004004	Ezɨ tuavir a zuir kam, a Samarian Distrigh abigha ghu.
43004005	Egha a ghua Samarian Distrighɨn aven itir nguibar mamɨn oto, an ziam Sikar. Ezɨ Sikarɨn nguibam, a nguazir Jekop uan otarim Josep ganɨngizimɨn boroghɨra iti.
43004006	Jekop fomɨra kuizir mozir dɨpam iti, a nguibar kamɨn ti. Ezɨ Iesus iza ghua bar amɨra. Egha a mozir dɨpar kamɨn boroghɨn apera. Ezɨ dughiam an aruer arɨzimɨn ghu.
43004007	Ezɨ Samarian amizir mam, a dɨpam tuasa izi, ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ dɨpatam na danɨngam, o?”
43004008	(Dughiar kamɨn Iesusɨn suren gumaziba daghebagh ivezasa nguibamɨn ghu.)
43004009	Ezɨ Samarian amizim a mɨgei, “Nɨ Judan gumazim ezɨ kɨ Samarian amizim. Manmagh sua, nɨ dɨpam ramasa na mɨgei?” (Amizir kam fo, Judaba me Samarian gumazamiziba ko itir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn an akar kam Iesus mɨgei.)
43004010	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn amizim ikara, “Nɨ, God gumazamizibagh anɨngizir bizir aghuim gɨfoghɨva, egh gumazir dɨpam bagha nɨ mɨgeir kam gɨfoghɨva, egh nɨ an azaraghtɨ, a dɨpar ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim anɨdim nɨ danigam.”
43004011	Ezɨ amizim a mɨgei, “Gumazir ekiam, nɨ mɨneba pu. Mozir dɨpar kam bar kone. Eghtɨ dɨpar ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim anɨdim, nɨ managh a inigham?
43004012	En ovavim Jekop mozir dɨpar kam e ganɨngi. Egha a uabɨ uan boriba ko bulmakauba ko an asɨziba, me bar mozir dɨpar kam ame. Ezɨ nɨ ghaze, nɨ ti Jekop gafira, o?”
43004013	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn an akam ikara, “Gumaziba bar dɨpar kam ramegh, men kuariba ua pɨram.
43004014	Ezɨ gumazitam kɨ danɨngamin dɨpar kam ramegham, an kuarim dughiatamɨn uam an pɨran kogham. Puvatɨ. Dɨpar kɨ danɨngamin kam, a dɨpar nguazimɨn averiamɨn ikiava otivi moghɨra, an navir averiamɨn otivam. Egh dɨpar ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim anɨdir kam otiv mamaghɨra ikɨva, egh zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim a danɨngam.”
43004015	Ezɨ amizim kamaghɨn Iesus mɨgei, “Gumazir ekiam, dɨpar kam na danɨng. Eghtɨ nan kuarim gɨn ua pɨran kogham, eghtɨ kɨ ua kagh izɨ dɨpam tuan kogham.”
43004016	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ mangɨ uan pamɨn diaghɨva egh gua kagh izɨ.”
43004017	Ezɨ amizim a ikara, “Kɨ paba puvatɨ.” Ezɨ Iesus a mɨgei, “Are, nɨ deragha mɨgei, nɨ paba puvatɨ.
43004018	Guizbangɨra, nɨ faragha 5 pla paba iti. Ezɨ gumazir nɨ datɨrɨghɨn itim, a guizbangɨra nɨn pam puvatɨ. Nɨn akar kam a bar guizbangɨra.”
43004019	Ezɨ amizim a mɨgei, “Gumazir Ekiam, kɨ datɨrɨghɨn fo, nɨ Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir mam.
43004020	En ovaviba me mɨghsɨar kamɨn uari akuva, egha Godɨn ziam fe. Ezɨ ia Judaba ghaze, danganir gumaziba mangɨva Godɨn ziam fam, a Jerusalemɨn iti.”
43004021	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Amizim, nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan ikɨ. Dughiatam otoghtɨma ia mɨghsɨar kamɨn Afeziamɨn ziam fan koghɨva, egh uaghan Jerusalemɨn nguibamɨn an ziam fan kogham.
43004022	Ia Samariaba ia fozir puvatɨzir God, ia an ziam fe. Ezɨ e Judaba e fozir God, e an ziam fe. E fo, Godɨn gumazamizibar akurvazir ingangarim, a faragh Judabar agharimɨn ikegh egh gɨn gumazamizir igharaziba bagh mangam.
43004023	Ezɨ dughiar otivamim, an otogha gɨfa, ezɨ gumazamiziba bar guizbangɨra Afeziamɨn ziam fasa, me an Duamɨn gavgavim ko guizbangɨn arazimɨn an ziam fam. Ezɨ Afeziam, gumazamizir kamaghɨn amiba, me an ziam fasa a bar ifonge.
43004024	God, a Duam. Ezɨ gumazir an ziam feba, me Godɨn Duamɨn gavgavim ko guizbangɨn arazimɨn an ziam fe.”
43004025	Ezɨ amizim kamaghɨn Iesus mɨgei, “Kɨ fo, Mesaia a izam (a God Ua E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim.) A izamin dughiam, a biziba bar e mɨkɨmam.”
43004026	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Kar kɨrara, datɨrɨghɨn nɨ ko mɨgei.”
43004027	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgeima, dughiar kamɨn an suren gumaziba uamategha izi. Me an garima an amizir mam ko uaning mɨgeima, ezɨ me okam nɨghnɨsi. Egha tav kamaghɨn amizimɨn azarazir puvatɨ, “Nɨ tizim iniasa?” Egha tav Iesusɨn azarazir puvatɨ, “Nɨ tizim sua amizir kam ko mɨgei?”
43004028	Ezɨ amizir kam uan mɨnem ataki, egha uamategha nguibamɨn ghu. Egha kamaghɨn gumazamizibav gei,
43004029	“Ia izɨ gumazir mamɨn ganigh. Kɨ fomɨra amizir araziba, a bar dar na mɨkeme. Ka ti gumazir kamra, God Ua E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim?”
43004030	Egha me nguibam ategha, Iesus bagha izi.
43004031	Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn, Iesusɨn suren gumaziba agakaghora kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Tisa, nɨ damɨ.”
43004032	Ezɨ a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Dagher kɨ damamim, ia a gɨfozir puvatɨ.”
43004033	Ezɨ an suren gumaziba uarira kamaghɨn uariv gei, “Gumazitam ti a bagha dagheba inigha iza a ganɨngi?”
43004034	Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Nan daghemra kara, kɨ Godɨn ifongiamɨn gɨn zui, a gumazir na amadazɨ kɨ izezim. Ezɨ kɨ a na ganɨngizir ingangarim, a gɨvagham.
43004035	Ia kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘4 plan iakiniba gɨvaghtɨ, e dar gɨn azenibar aghoram.’ Ezɨ kɨ ia mɨgei, ia tintinibar ganɨva egh deravɨra azenibar gan. Dagheba aghuigha gɨfa, ezɨ azenibar aghoramin dughiam otogha gɨfa!
43004036	Gumazir dagheba isim, a datɨrɨghɨn uan ivezim isi, egha zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim bagha dagheba akufi. Kamaghɨn amizɨma, gumazir dagheba oparim ko gumazir dagheba isim aning vɨrara bar akuegham.
43004037	Akar kam a guizbangɨra, ‘Gumazir mam azenim opari, ezɨ gumazir igharazim an dagheba isi.’
